sql:
select * from comapplicant where COMAPP_COMPANYNAME='^' and COMAPP_ORG_SCODE='^'
select facility_catid, facility_parent from facility_master where upper(facility_catdesc)=upper('^')
select comapp_id, comapp_companyname, comapp_companyid, comapp_comtype, ind_name, org_name from comapplicant, industry_master, organisations where comapp_companyid like '%^%' and comapp_indcode=ind_no and upper(comapp_companyname) like upper('%^%') and comapp_renew='N' and comapp_org_scode=org_scode and org_code like '^' order by comapp_companyname, org_name, comapp_comtype
select comapp_id, comapp_companyname, comapp_companyid, comapp_crptaddress1, comapp_crptaddress2, comapp_crptcity, comapp_crptstate, comapp_crptpin, comapp_crptphone, comapp_crptfax, comapp_businessnature, comapp_corpstructure, comapp_companyrole, to_char(comapp_yrsinbusiness,'DD/MM/YYYY') as comapp_yrsinbusiness, comapp_ownership , comapp_totemployees, comapp_contact, comapp_email, comapp_group, comapp_corppremises, comapp_regpremises, comapp_regadd1, comapp_regadd2, comapp_regcity, comapp_regstate, comapp_regphone, comapp_regfax, comapp_regpin, comapp_indcode, comapp_bankdealing, comapp_indtype, scale, comapp_admadd1, comapp_admadd2, comapp_admcity, comapp_admstate, comapp_admphone, comapp_admfax, comapp_admpin, comapp_comtype, comapp_ssitype, comapp_org_scode, exp_desc groupdesc, comapp_corpdist, comapp_facdist, comapp_regdist, comapp_admindist, comapp_rbino, comapp_selrel, comapp_grpscl, comapp_reldet, comapp_subnbfc, comapp_relempno, comapp_borrel, auth_captial, company_status, company_staff, company_inland, company_introtitle, company_introname, comapp_regcountry, comapp_subcapital, comapp_totalshares, cbs_companycode, comapp_oldid, comapp_pubtype, org_name, con_country,comapp_ieccode,comapp_irbid,comapp_cin from comapplicant, exposure, organisations, countrysetup where exp_id(+)=comapp_group and exp_type(+)='Group' and comapp_org_scode=org_scode and con_countrycode(+)=comapp_regcountry and comapp_id='^'
select comapp_id, comapp_companyname, comapp_companyid, comapp_crptaddress1, comapp_crptaddress2, comapp_crptcity, comapp_crptstate, comapp_crptpin, comapp_crptphone, comapp_crptfax, comapp_factaddress1, comapp_factaddress2, comapp_factcity, comapp_factstate, comapp_factpin, comapp_factphone, comapp_factfax, comapp_businessnature, comapp_corpstructure, comapp_companyrole, to_char(comapp_yrsinbusiness,'DD/MM/YYYY') as comapp_yrsinbusiness, comapp_ownership , comapp_totemployees, comapp_contact, comapp_email, comapp_group, comapp_corppremises, comapp_factpremises, comapp_regpremises, comapp_regadd1, comapp_regadd2, comapp_regcity, comapp_regstate, comapp_regphone, comapp_regfax, comapp_regpin, comapp_indcode, comapp_bankdealing, comapp_indtype, relatives, scale, emp, relationship, comapp_exp, comapp_admadd1, comapp_admadd2, comapp_admcity,comapp_admstate,comapp_admphone,comapp_admfax,comapp_admpin, comapp_comtype, comapp_ssitype ,comapp_org_scode, comapp_org_code,org_code, (select exp_desc from exposure where exp_id = comapplicant.comapp_group and exp_type='Group') groupdesc, comapp_corpdist, comapp_facdist, comapp_regdist, comapp_admindist,comapp_rbino, comapp_selrel, comapp_grpscl, comapp_reldet, comapp_subnbfc, comapp_relempno, comapp_borrel, auth_captial, company_status, company_staff, company_inland, company_introtitle, company_introname, comapp_regcountry, comapp_subcapital, comapp_totalshares from comapplicant,organisations where comapp_id='^' and comapp_org_scode=org_scode
select comapp_companyname, comapp_regadd1||' '||comapp_regadd2 as regoffaddress, regcity.city_name as comapp_regcity, regstate.state_name as comapp_regstate, comapp_regpin, comapp_regphone, comapp_regfax, comapp_group, comapp_crptaddress1||' '||comapp_crptaddress2 as corpoffaddress, comapp_crptcity , comapp_crptstate, comapp_crptpin, comapp_crptphone, comapp_factaddress1||' '||comapp_factaddress2 as factoffaddress, comapp_factcity, comapp_factstate, comapp_factpin, comapp_factphone , to_char(comapp_yrsinbusiness,'DD/MM/YYYY') as comapp_yrsinbusiness, comapp_ownership, comapp_businessnature, comapp_bankdealing,(select exp_desc from exposure where exp_id = a.comapp_group and exp_type='Group') as groupcomp, comapp_companyid from comapplicant a, laps_cities regcity,laps_states regstate where comapp_id =(select demo_comappid from com_demographics where demo_appno = '^' and demo_apptype='N') and regcity.city_code(+)=comapp_regcity and regstate.state_code(+)=comapp_regstate
select comapp_companyname, comapp_regadd1||', '||comapp_regadd2 as regoffaddress, regcity.city_name as comapp_regcity, regstate.state_name as comapp_regstate, comapp_regpin, comapp_regphone, comapp_regfax, comapp_group, comapp_crptaddress1||', '||comapp_crptaddress2 as corpoffaddress, comapp_crptcity , comapp_crptstate, comapp_crptpin, comapp_crptphone, comapp_factaddress1||', '||comapp_factaddress2 as factoffaddress, comapp_factcity, comapp_factstate, comapp_factpin, comapp_factphone , to_char(comapp_yrsinbusiness,'DD/MM/YYYY') as comapp_yrsinbusiness, comapp_ownership, comapp_businessnature, comapp_bankdealing,(select exp_desc from exposure where exp_id = a.comapp_group and exp_type='Group') as groupcomp, comapp_companyid from comapplicant a, laps_cities regcity,laps_states regstate where comapp_id =(select demo_comappid from com_demographics where demo_appno = '^' and demo_apptype='N') and regcity.city_code(+)=comapp_regcity and regstate.state_code(+)=comapp_regstate
select app_no from applications, com_demographics where app_no=demo_appno and upper(app_status) in ('PA', 'PR', 'CA', 'CR') and demo_comappid=^
insert into comapplicant (comapp_id, comapp_companyname, comapp_companyid, comapp_crptaddress1, comapp_crptaddress2, comapp_crptcity, comapp_crptstate, comapp_crptpin, comapp_crptphone, comapp_crptfax, comapp_businessnature, comapp_corpstructure, comapp_companyrole, comapp_yrsinbusiness, comapp_ownership, comapp_totemployees, comapp_contact, comapp_email, comapp_group, comapp_corppremises, comapp_regpremises, comapp_regadd1, comapp_regadd2, comapp_regcity, comapp_regstate, comapp_regphone, comapp_regfax, comapp_regpin, comapp_indcode, comapp_bankdealing, comapp_indtype, comapp_comtype, comapp_ssitype, comapp_org_scode, comapp_org_code, scale, comapp_admadd1, comapp_admadd2, comapp_admcity, comapp_admstate, comapp_admphone, comapp_admfax, comapp_admpin, comapp_rbino, comapp_subnbfc, auth_captial, cbs_companycode, company_status, company_staff, company_inland, company_introtitle, company_introname, comapp_regcountry, comapp_subcapital, comapp_totalshares, comapp_oldid, comapp_pubtype,comapp_ieccode,comapp_irbid,comapp_cin) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update comapplicant set comapp_companyname=?, comapp_companyid=?, comapp_crptaddress1=?, comapp_crptaddress2=?, comapp_crptcity=?, comapp_crptstate=?, comapp_crptpin=?, comapp_crptphone=?, comapp_crptfax=?, comapp_businessnature=?, comapp_corpstructure=?, comapp_companyrole=?, comapp_yrsinbusiness=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), comapp_ownership=?, comapp_totemployees=?, comapp_contact=?, comapp_email=?, comapp_group=?, comapp_corpprees=?, comapp_regpremises=?, comapp_regadd1=?, comapp_regadd2=?, comapp_regcity=?, comapp_regstate=?, comapp_regphone=?, comapp_regfax=?, comapp_regpin=?, comapp_bankdealing=?, comapp_indcode=?, comapp_indtype=?, scale=?, comapp_admadd1=?, comapp_admadd2=?, comapp_admcity=?, comapp_admstate=?, comapp_admphone=?, comapp_admfax=?, comapp_admpin=?, comapp_comtype=?, comapp_ssitype = ?, comapp_org_scode=? ,comapp_org_code=?, comapp_rbino=?, comapp_subnbfc=?, auth_captial=?, CBS_COMPANYCODE=?, company_status=?, company_staff=?, company_inland=?, company_introtitle=?, company_introname=?, comapp_regcountry=?, comapp_subcapital=?, comapp_totalshares=?, comapp_pubtype=?,comapp_ieccode=?,comapp_irbid=?,comapp_cin=? where comapp_id=?
select * from applications, facilities where borrower_id='^' and facility_appno=app_no
delete comapplicant where comapp_id=?
insert into comapplicant (comapp_id, comapp_companyname, comapp_companyid, comapp_crptaddress1, comapp_crptaddress2, comapp_crptcity, comapp_crptstate, comapp_crptpin, comapp_crptphone, comapp_crptfax, comapp_businessnature, comapp_corpstructure, comapp_companyrole, comapp_yrsinbusiness, comapp_ownership, comapp_totemployees, comapp_contact, comapp_email, comapp_group, comapp_corppremises, comapp_regpremises, comapp_regadd1, comapp_regadd2, comapp_regcity, comapp_regstate, comapp_regphone, comapp_regfax, comapp_regpin, comapp_indcode, comapp_bankdealing, comapp_indtype, comapp_comtype, comapp_ssitype, comapp_org_scode, comapp_org_code, scale, comapp_admadd1, comapp_admadd2, comapp_admcity, comapp_admstate, comapp_admphone, comapp_admfax, comapp_admpin, comapp_rbino, comapp_subnbfc, auth_captial, cbs_companycode, company_status, company_staff, company_inland, company_introtitle, company_introname, comapp_regcountry, comapp_subcapital, comapp_totalshares, comapp_oldid) select ?, comapp_companyname, comapp_companyid, comapp_crptaddress1, comapp_crptaddress2, comapp_crptcity, comapp_crptstate, comapp_crptpin, comapp_crptphone, comapp_crptfax, comapp_businessnature, comapp_corpstructure, comapp_companyrole, comapp_yrsinbusiness, comapp_ownership, comapp_totemployees, comapp_contact, comapp_email, comapp_group, comapp_corppremises, comapp_regpremises, comapp_regadd1, comapp_regadd2, comapp_regcity, comapp_regstate, comapp_regphone, comapp_regfax, comapp_regpin, comapp_indcode, comapp_bankdealing, comapp_indtype, comapp_comtype, comapp_ssitype, comapp_org_scode, comapp_org_code, scale, comapp_admadd1, comapp_admadd2, comapp_admcity, comapp_admstate, comapp_admphone, comapp_admfax, comapp_admpin, comapp_rbino, comapp_subnbfc, auth_captial, cbs_companycode, company_status, company_staff, company_inland, company_introtitle, company_introname, comapp_regcountry, comapp_subcapital, comapp_totalshares, comapp_oldid from comapplicant where comapp_id=?
update comapplicant set comapp_renew=? where comapp_id=?
select comapp_id, comapp_sno, comapp_detailtype, comapp_name, comapp_add, comapp_city, comapp_state, comapp_pincode, comapp_phoneno, comapp_fax, comapp_factpremises,comapp_dist,to_char(comapp_Leaserentage,'DD/MM/YYYY') as comapp_Leaserentage from comappfactorydetails where comapp_id='^' order by comapp_detailtype
select comapp_id, comapp_sno, comapp_detailtype, comapp_name, comapp_add, comapp_city, comapp_state, comapp_pincode, comapp_phoneno, comapp_fax, comapp_factpremises, comapp_dist from comappfactorydetails where comapp_sno='^' and comapp_id='^'
select comapp_id, comapp_sno, comapp_detailtype, comapp_name, comapp_add, comapp_city, comapp_state, comapp_pincode, comapp_phoneno, comapp_fax, comapp_factpremises,comapp_dist,to_char(comapp_Leaserentage,'DD/MM/YYYY') as comapp_Leaserentage from comappfactorydetails where comapp_id='^' and comapp_detailtype='^' order by comapp_detailtype
select NVL(max(comapp_sno),0)+1 as snomax from comappfactorydetails where comapp_id='^'
insert into comappfactorydetails(comapp_id, comapp_sno, comapp_detailtype, comapp_name, comapp_add, comapp_city, comapp_state, comapp_pincode, comapp_phoneno, comapp_fax, comapp_factpremises,comapp_dist,comapp_Leaserentage) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))
update comappfactorydetails set comapp_detailtype=?, comapp_name=?, comapp_add=?, comapp_city=?, comapp_state=?, comapp_pincode=?, comapp_phoneno=?, comapp_fax=?, comapp_factpremises=?,comapp_dist=?,comapp_Leaserentage=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') where comapp_id=? and comapp_sno=?
delete from comappfactorydetails where comapp_id=? and comapp_sno=?
insert into comappfactorydetails(comapp_id, comapp_sno, comapp_detailtype, comapp_name, comapp_add, comapp_city, comapp_state, comapp_pincode, comapp_phoneno, comapp_fax, comapp_factpremises) select ?, comapp_sno, comapp_detailtype, comapp_name, comapp_add, comapp_city, comapp_state, comapp_pincode, comapp_phoneno, comapp_fax, comapp_factpremises from comappfactorydetails where comapp_id=?
select comapp_div_id, comapp_id, comapp_div_name, comapp_div_address, comapp_div_city, comapp_div_state, comapp_div_pin, comapp_div_phone, comapp_div_fax, comapp_divisiontype, comapp_div_bsrcode,comapp_div_dist,comapp_div_appid from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_div_id_old='^'
select comapp_div_id, comapp_id, comapp_div_name, comapp_div_address, comapp_div_city, comapp_div_state, comapp_div_pin, comapp_div_phone, comapp_div_fax, comapp_divisiontype, comapp_div_bsrcode, comapp_div_dist,comapp_div_appid from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_div_id='^' and comapp_id='^'
select comapp_div_id, comapp_id, comapp_div_name, comapp_div_address, comapp_div_city, comapp_div_state, comapp_div_pin, comapp_div_phone, comapp_div_fax, comapp_divisiontype, comapp_div_bsrcode from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_div_id='^' and comapp_id=(select demo_comappid from com_demographics where demo_appno = '^' and demo_apptype='N')
delete from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_id=? and comapp_div_id=?
insert into comapp_company_divisions(comapp_div_id_old,comapp_div_id, comapp_id, comapp_div_name, comapp_div_address, comapp_div_city, comapp_div_state, comapp_div_pin, comapp_div_phone, comapp_div_fax, comapp_divisiontype, comapp_div_bsrcode,comapp_div_dist,comapp_div_appid, com_compratinggrade1,com_compratingason1,com_compratingtype1,com_compratinggrade2,com_compratingason2, com_compratingtype2) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
insert into comapp_company_divisions(comapp_div_id_old,comapp_div_id, comapp_id, comapp_div_name, comapp_div_address, comapp_div_city, comapp_div_state, comapp_div_pin, comapp_div_phone, comapp_div_fax, comapp_divisiontype, comapp_div_bsrcode,comapp_div_dist,comapp_div_appid, com_compratinggrade1,com_compratingason1,com_compratingtype1,com_compratinggrade2,com_compratingason2, com_compratingtype2,COMAPP_BANKERS,comapp_cbsid,comapp_relation,COMAPP_DIVISIONSUBTYPE ,COMAPP_DOCEXECUTANT,COMAPP_ACCOUNTOPERTED,COMAPP_DINNUMBER,COMAPP_CHF_PROMOTER,COMAPP_PERSONAL_GUARANTEE,COMAPP_CHF_NPA) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update comapp_company_divisions set comapp_div_name=?, comapp_div_address=?, comapp_div_city=?, comapp_div_state=?, comapp_div_pin=?, comapp_div_phone=?, comapp_div_fax=?, comapp_divisiontype=?, comapp_div_bsrcode=?,comapp_div_dist=?, comapp_div_appid=?,comapp_div_id_old=?,com_compratinggrade1=?, com_compratingason1=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),com_compratingtype1=?,com_compratinggrade2=?, com_compratingason2=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),com_compratingtype2=?,COMAPP_BANKERS=?,comapp_cbsid=?, comapp_relation=?,COMAPP_DIVISIONSUBTYPE=?,COMAPP_DOCEXECUTANT=?,COMAPP_ACCOUNTOPERTED=?,COMAPP_DINNUMBER=?, COMAPP_CHF_PROMOTER=?,COMAPP_PERSONAL_GUARANTEE=?,COMAPP_CHF_NPA=? where comapp_id=? and comapp_div_id=?
select NVL(max(comapp_div_id),0)+1 as snorelmax from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_id='^'
insert into comapp_company_divisions(comapp_div_id_old,comapp_div_id, comapp_id, comapp_div_name, comapp_div_address, comapp_div_city, comapp_div_state, comapp_div_pin, comapp_div_phone, comapp_div_fax, comapp_divisiontype, comapp_div_bsrcode,comapp_div_dist,comapp_div_appid, com_compratinggrade1,com_compratingason1,com_compratingtype1,com_compratinggrade2,com_compratingason2, com_compratingtype2,COMAPP_BANKERS,comapp_cbsid,COMAPP_GROUPID,COMAPP_RELATION,COMAPP_DIVISIONSUBTYPE,COMAPP_DOCEXECUTANT,COMAPP_ACCOUNTOPERTED,COMAPP_DINNUMBER,COMAPP_CHF_PROMOTER,COMAPP_PERSONAL_GUARANTEE) select comapp_div_id_old,comapp_div_id, ?, comapp_div_name, comapp_div_address, comapp_div_city, comapp_div_state, comapp_div_pin, comapp_div_phone, comapp_div_fax, comapp_divisiontype, comapp_div_bsrcode,comapp_div_dist,comapp_div_appid, com_compratinggrade1,com_compratingason1,com_compratingtype1,com_compratinggrade2,com_compratingason2, com_compratingtype2,COMAPP_BANKERS,comapp_cbsid,COMAPP_GROUPID,COMAPP_RELATION,COMAPP_DIVISIONSUBTYPE,COMAPP_DOCEXECUTANT,COMAPP_ACCOUNTOPERTED,COMAPP_DINNUMBER,COMAPP_CHF_PROMOTER,COMAPP_PERSONAL_GUARANTEE from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_id=?
update COMAPP_COMPANY_DIVISIONS set COMAPP_DIV_APPID=?,COMAPP_DIV_NAME=?,COMAPP_DIV_ADDRESS=?,COMAPP_DIV_CITY=?,COMAPP_DIV_DIST=?,COMAPP_DIV_STATE=?,COMAPP_DIV_PIN=?,COMAPP_DIV_PHONE=?,COMAPP_DIV_FAX=? where COMAPP_DIV_APPID=? and COMAPP_ID in (select PERAPP_ID from PERAPPLICANT where COMAPP_ID=PERAPP_ID and (PERAPP_RENEW='n' or PERAPP_RENEW is null))
delete from comapp_relationship where comapp_id=? and COMAPP_RELSNO=?
select comapp_id, comapp_emprelno, comapp_borrel, comapp_scale, comapp_placepost, comapp_loancomments, COMAPP_RELSNO from comapp_relationship where comapp_id='^' order by comapp_id asc
select comapp_id, comapp_emprelno, comapp_borrel, comapp_scale, comapp_placepost, comapp_loancomments, COMAPP_RELSNO from comapp_relationship where COMAPP_RELSNO='^' and comapp_id='^'
select NVL(max(COMAPP_RELSNO),0)+1 as snorelmax from comapp_relationship where comapp_id='^'
insert into comapp_relationship(comapp_id, comapp_emprelno, comapp_borrel, comapp_scale, comapp_placepost, comapp_loancomments, COMAPP_RELSNO) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
insert into comapp_relationship(comapp_id, comapp_emprelno, comapp_borrel, comapp_scale, comapp_placepost, comapp_loancomments, COMAPP_RELSNO) select ?, comapp_emprelno, comapp_borrel, comapp_scale, comapp_placepost, comapp_loancomments, COMAPP_RELSNO from comapp_relationship where comapp_id=?
select perapp_id,perapp_fname,perapp_id,'CORP' as comapp_comtype,org_name,perapp_oldid from perapplicant,organisations,company_info where perapp_id=cominfo_appid and perapp_branchcode=org_scode ^ and (perapp_renew is null or upper (perapp_renew)='N') order by perapp_fname
select comapp_id, comapp_companyname, comapp_companyid, comapp_comtype, org_name, comapp_oldid from comapplicant, organisations where comapp_org_scode = org_scode ^ and comapp_renew='N' order by comapp_companyname
select comapp_id, comapp_companyname, comapp_companyid, comapp_comtype, org_name, comapp_oldid from comapplicant, organisations where comapp_id =(select company_id from sanction_details where cbs_accountno='^') and comapp_org_scode=org_scode and comapp_renew='N'
select comapp_id, comapp_companyname, comapp_companyid, comapp_comtype, org_name, comapp_oldid from comapplicant, organisations where CBS_COMPANYCODE like '^' and comapp_org_scode = org_scode and comapp_renew='N' order by comapp_companyname
select comapp_id, comapp_companyname, comapp_companyid, comapp_comtype, org_name, comapp_oldid from comapplicant, organisations, com_demographics, applications where app_no = demo_appno and demo_comappid = comapp_id and comapp_org_scode = org_scode and app_no like '^' and comapp_renew='N' order by comapp_companyname
select demo_appno, app_status, mailchkstatus, app_usrid, app_orglevel, app_applnholder, usr_fname||' '||usr_lname as appholdername from com_demographics, applications, users where usr_id(+)=app_applnholder and demo_comappid in ^ and demo_appno = app_no and applications.app_delflag = 'N' and demo_apptype='N' and upper(app_loantype)='^' order by demo_appno desc
select demo_appno, app_status, mailchkstatus, app_usrid, app_orglevel, app_applnholder, usr_fname||' '||usr_lname as appholdername from com_demographics, applications, users where usr_id(+)=app_applnholder and demo_comappid in ^ and demo_appno=app_no and applications.app_delflag = 'N' and demo_apptype='N' and demo_appno like '%^%'
select perapp_id from perapplicant, organisations where perapp_branchcode=org_scode and org_code like '^%' and perapp_oldid = '^'
select comapp_id from comapplicant where comapp_oldid = '^'
select comapp_id,comapp_oldid,demo_appno,demo_apptype from com_demographics, comapplicant where demo_comappid=comapp_id and demo_appno = '^' and demo_apptype='N'
select cmd_searchreport, due_diligence, credit_since, audit_notes,to_char(exec_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as exec_date, exec_offercorpguarantee, exec_whetherapplco, exec_comments_sisterconcern, exec_borrowertype, exec_sancauth, exec_agendano, to_char(exec_mcm,'dd/mm/yyyy') as exec_mcm, exec_refno, exec_presentreq from exec_portfolio where exec_appno='^'
insert into exec_portfolio( exec_appno, cmd_searchreport, due_diligence, credit_since, audit_notes, exec_date, exec_offercorpguarantee, exec_whetherapplco, exec_comments_sisterconcern,exec_borrowertype, exec_sancauth, exec_agendano, exec_mcm, exec_refno, exec_presentreq) values(?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?)
delete exec_portfolio where exec_appno=?
select exec_guaname, exec_tnw from exec_guarantor where exec_appno='^'
insert into exec_guarantor(exec_appno, exec_guaname, exec_tnw)values(?,?,?)
delete from exec_guarantor where exec_appno=?

select count(*) from applications where upper(app_loantype)='E' and upper(app_status)in ('CA','PA') and APP_APPROVEDBY='^' and (TO_DATE(app_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') >=(to_date(add_months(sysdate,-12),'dd/mm/yyyy')) and TO_DATE(app_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') ^ (to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'))) and APP_NO in (select distinct(facility_appno) from facilities where borrower_id in (select COMAPP_OLDID from comapplicant where COMAPP_ID=(select distinct(borrower_id) from facilities where facility_appno='^')))
select facility_catdesc, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_margin, facility_interest, facility_headid, facility_id, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, facility_desc, bplr, facility_intadjustment, facility_category, facility_months, facility_intremarks, facility_sno from facility_master a, facilities b where b.facility_id = a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and facility_group='^' and facility_existing>0 order by facility_sno
select facility_catdesc, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_margin, facility_interest, facility_headid, facility_id, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, facility_desc, bplr, facility_intadjustment, facility_category, facility_months, facility_intremarks, facility_sno from facility_master a, facilities b where b.facility_id = a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and facility_group='^' and facility_headid='1' and facility_existing=0 order by facility_sno
select b.facility_sno, a.facility_catdesc, b.facility_existing,b.facility_interest, b.facility_proposed, b.facility_margin, b.facility_headid, b.facility_id, b.facility_dp, b.facility_outstanding, b.security_value, b.facility_desc, b.facility_intadjustment,b.bplr, fac.facility_catdesc as facilityhead, b.facility_category, b.facility_months, b.facility_sancintremarks,b.facility_sancamt from facility_master a,facilities b, facility_master fac where fac.facility_catid=a.facility_parent and a.facility_catid =b.facility_id and b.facility_headid in('1','2','3','4') and facility_group=0 and b.facility_appno ='^' and b.facility_category='A' and b.facility_existing=0 and b.facility_sancstatus='A' union select b.facility_sno, a.facility_catdesc, b.facility_existing,b.facility_interest, b.facility_proposed, b.facility_margin, b.facility_headid, b.facility_id, b.facility_dp, b.facility_outstanding, b.security_value, b.facility_desc, b.facility_intadjustment,b.bplr, fac.facility_catdesc as facilityhead, b.facility_category, b.facility_months, b.facility_sancintremarks,b.facility_sancamt from facility_master a,facilities b, facility_master fac where facility_sno in ( select facility_group from facilities where facility_group != 0 and facility_appno ='^' and facility_category='A' and facility_existing=0) and fac.facility_catid=a.facility_parent and a.facility_catid =b.facility_id and b.facility_headid in('1','2','3','4') and b.facility_appno ='^' and b.facility_sancstatus='A'
select facility_sno, facility_catdesc, facility_existing,facility_interest, facility_proposed, facility_margin, facility_interest, facility_headid, facility_id, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, facility_desc, facility_intadjustment, bplr, facility_category, facility_intremarks,facility_sancamt from facility_master a,facilities b where b.facility_id = a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and b.facility_headid in('1','2','3','4') and facility_group='^' and b.facility_existing=0 and b.facility_category='A' and b.facility_sancstatus='A' order by facility_sno
select b.facility_sno, a.facility_catdesc, b.facility_existing,b.facility_interest, b.facility_proposed, b.facility_margin, b.facility_headid, b.facility_id, b.facility_dp, b.facility_outstanding, b.security_value, b.facility_desc, b.facility_intadjustment,b.bplr, fac.facility_catdesc as facilityhead, b.facility_category, b.facility_months, b.facility_intremarks,b.facility_sancamt from facility_master a,facilities b, facility_master fac where fac.facility_catid=a.facility_parent and a.facility_catid =b.facility_id and b.facility_headid in('1') and facility_group=0 and b.facility_appno ='^' and b.facility_existing=0 and b.facility_sancstatus='A' union select b.facility_sno, a.facility_catdesc, b.facility_existing,b.facility_interest, b.facility_proposed, b.facility_margin, b.facility_headid, b.facility_id, b.facility_dp, b.facility_outstanding, b.security_value, b.facility_desc, b.facility_intadjustment,b.bplr, fac.facility_catdesc as facilityhead, b.facility_category, b.facility_months, b.facility_intremarks,b.facility_sancamt from facility_master a,facilities b, facility_master fac where facility_sno in ( select facility_group from facilities where facility_group != 0 and facility_appno ='^' and facility_headid in('1') and facility_existing=0 ) and fac.facility_catid=a.facility_parent and a.facility_catid =b.facility_id and b.facility_headid in('1','2','3','4') and b.facility_appno ='^' and b.facility_sancstatus='A'
select facility_sno, facility_catdesc, facility_existing,facility_interest, facility_proposed, facility_margin, facility_interest, facility_headid, facility_id, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, facility_desc, facility_intadjustment, bplr, facility_category, facility_intremarks,facility_sancamt from facility_master a,facilities b where b.facility_id = a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and b.facility_headid in('1') and facility_group='^' and b.facility_existing=0 and b.facility_sancstatus='A' order by facility_sno

insert into com_otherdet(com_otherrepay,com_DSCR,facility_code,COM_LOANACC,com_subvention,com_limtnodetype,COM_HO_POWER,COM_RO_POWER,COM_CLPU_POWER, COM_BRANCH_POWER,COM_SANC_DAYS,COM_REVALID_DAYS,COM_NOTAVAILED_DAYS,COM_CGSSDPERC,COM_GECLTYPE,COM_GECL1_MAXLIMITBORRO,COM_GECL1_MAXLIMITNOC,COM_GECL2_ELGLIMITMLIS,COM_GECL2_ELIGLIMITBANK,COM_GECL3_MAXLIMITBORROMLIS,COM_GECL3_MAXLIMITBANK,COM_GECL4_LIMITPROPOSED,COM_BAL_OUTSTANDING,COM_SVANIDHITYPE ,COM_GECL1EXT_MAXLIMITBORRO,COM_GECL1EXT_MAXELGFINANCE,COM_GECL1EXT_ELGFINANCE,COM_GECL2EXT_MAXELGFINANCE,COM_GECL2EXT_ELGFINANCE,COM_GECL3EXT_MAXELGFINANCE,COM_GECL3EXT_ELGFINANCE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select com_otherrepay,com_DSCR,COM_LOANACC,com_subvention,com_limtnodetype,COM_HO_POWER,COM_RO_POWER,COM_CLPU_POWER,COM_BRANCH_POWER,COM_SANC_DAYS,COM_REVALID_DAYS,COM_NOTAVAILED_DAYS,COM_CGSSDPERC, COM_GECLTYPE,COM_GECL1_MAXLIMITBORRO,COM_GECL1_MAXLIMITNOC,COM_GECL2_ELGLIMITMLIS,COM_GECL2_ELIGLIMITBANK,COM_GECL3_MAXLIMITBORROMLIS,COM_GECL3_MAXLIMITBANK,COM_GECL4_LIMITPROPOSED,COM_BAL_OUTSTANDING , COM_SVANIDHITYPE,COM_GECL1EXT_MAXLIMITBORRO,COM_GECL1EXT_MAXELGFINANCE,COM_GECL1EXT_ELGFINANCE,COM_GECL2EXT_MAXELGFINANCE,COM_GECL2EXT_ELGFINANCE,COM_GECL3EXT_MAXELGFINANCE,COM_GECL3EXT_ELGFINANCE from com_otherdet where facility_code='^'
insert into set_rangedeviation(SET_FACILITYCODE,set_id,set_branchfrom,set_branchto,set_dofrom, set_doto,set_cofrom,set_coto,set_class) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select set_id,set_branchfrom,set_branchto,set_dofrom,set_doto,set_cofrom,set_coto,set_class,SET_FACILITYCODE from set_rangedeviation where SET_FACILITYCODE=^ order by set_id
select cil.corpprd_sno, cil.corpprd_termfrom, cil.corpprd_termto, cil.corpprd_baserate, cil.corpprd_adjust, cil.corpprd_interest from corpprdint_master cm, corpprd_interest_limit cil where cm.corpprdint_prdcode='^' and cm.corpprdint_sno=cil.corpprd_intid and cm.corpprdint_inttype='^' and cm.corpprd_amtrangefrom='^' and cm.corpprd_amtrangeto='^' and corpprd_interesttype='^' order by cm.corpprdint_sno, cil.corpprd_sno
select facility_catdesc from FACILITY_MASTER where facility_catid='^'
insert into com_banking(combk_appno, combk_id, combk_type, combk_facility, combk_osasondate, combk_bnktype, combk_inttype, combk_credittype, combk_sancrefno, combk_sancdate, combk_duedate, combk_arrears, combk_companyname,combk_bnk, combk_bnkname, combk_fundtype, combk_limit, combk_os, combk_spread, combk_remarks,combk_facility_sno,combk_modtype,combk_monthly_ins, combk_cbsappno,combk_interestrate,combk_repaymenttype,combk_drawingpower,combk_purpose,combk_prestatus,combk_factype,combk_fac_grp,com_exposure,combk_Baltype, combk_accountopen,combk_prefix,combk_suffix,combk_faccategory) values(?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
insert into com_banking(combk_appno,combk_id,combk_type,combk_facility, combk_osasondate, combk_bnktype,combk_inttype,combk_credittype, combk_sancrefno, combk_sancdate, combk_duedate, combk_arrears, combk_companyname,COMBK_BNK,COMBK_BNKNAME,COMBK_FUNDTYPE, COMBK_LIMIT, COMBK_OS, COMBK_SPREAD, COMBK_REMARKS,combk_facility_sno,combk_modtype,combk_monthly_ins,COMBK_INTERESTRATE, COMBK_REPAYMENTTYPE,COMBK_DRAWINGPOWER,COMBK_PARENTAPPNO,COMBK_PARENTFACSNO, combk_factype,combk_fac_grp,combk_cbsappno,COMBK_PURPOSE,COMBK_ACCOUNTOPEN,COMBK_PREFIX,COMBK_SUFFIX) select ?, (select NVL(max(COMBK_ID),0)+1 as maxid from com_banking where combk_appno=?) as combk_id, (SELECT CASE PRD_LOANTYPE WHEN 'TL' THEN '2' WHEN 'DL' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END AS PRDLOANTYPE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRD_CODE=(SELECT APP_PRDCODE FROM APPLICATIONS WHERE APP_NO=loan.loan_appno)) as PRDTYPE, (SELECT APP_PRDCODE || '~' || (SELECT CASE PRD_LOANTYPE WHEN 'TL' THEN '2' WHEN 'DL' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END AS PRDYPE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRD_CODE=(SELECT APP_PRDCODE FROM APPLICATIONS WHERE APP_NO=loan.loan_appno)) as PRDYPE1 FROM APPLICATIONS WHERE APP_NO=loan.loan_appno) as PRDCODE, sysdate,'S','BR','P', (select sanctionrefno from app_referncenumber where app_no=loan.loan_appno and nvl(sancref_flag,'n')='n') as sancrefno, (select app_processdate from applications where app_no=loan.loan_appno) as sancdate, '' as duedate,'' as arrear,?,'Our','Karnataka Bank', 'F',LOAN_RECMDAMT,LOAN_RECMDAMT as osval, (NVL(LOAN_MODINTRATE,0)-NVL(LOAN_BASERATE,0)) AS SPREAD, '' AS REMARKS,'1', (select lower(app_loantype) from applications where app_no=loan.loan_appno) as modtype, '' as monthins, LOAN_MODINTRATE, (CASE LOAN_REPAYMENTTYPE WHEN '1' then 'E' else 'NE' end) as repaytype, LOAN_RECMDAMT, loan.loan_appno, '1','M','0', (select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from applications where app_no=loan.loan_appno) as CBS_ACCOUNTNO, '' as LOAN_PURPOSEOFLOAN,'Y','','' from LOANDETAILS loan where LOAN_APPNO=?
update com_banking set combk_facility=?,combk_osasondate=sysdate,combk_bnktype=?,combk_inttype=?,combk_credittype=?, combk_sancrefno=?,combk_sancdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),combk_duedate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),combk_arrears=?,combk_companyname=?, combk_bnk=?,combk_bnkname=?,combk_limit=?,combk_os=?,combk_spread=?,combk_remarks=?,combk_facility_sno=?, combk_modtype=?,combk_monthly_ins=?,combk_cbsappno=?,combk_interestrate=?,combk_repaymenttype=?,combk_drawingpower=?,combk_purpose=?, combk_prestatus=?,combk_factype=?,combk_fac_grp=?,combk_repaymentcmt=? where combk_appno=? and combk_id=?
update com_banking set combk_facility=(SELECT PRD_CODE||'~'||CASE PRD_LOANTYPE WHEN 'TL' THEN '2' WHEN 'DL' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END AS PRDYPE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRD_CODE=?),combk_osasondate=sysdate,combk_inttype=?,combk_limit=?,combk_interestrate=?, combk_repaymenttype=?,COMBK_PURPOSE=? where combk_appno=? and combk_credittype='P'
delete from com_banking where combk_appno=? and combk_id=?
delete from com_banking where combk_appno=? and combk_facility_sno=? and combk_credittype='P'
select combk_id, combk_facility, to_char(combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate, combk_bnktype, combk_inttype, combk_credittype, combk_sancrefno, to_char(combk_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_sancdate, to_char(combk_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_duedate, combk_arrears, combk_companyname, combk_bnk, combk_bnkname, combk_fundtype, combk_limit, combk_os, combk_spread, combk_remarks, combk_facility_sno,combk_modtype,combk_monthly_ins,combk_type,COMBK_CBSAPPNO, COMBK_REPAYMENTTYPE,COMBK_INTERESTRATE,COMBK_DRAWINGPOWER,COMBK_PURPOSE,combk_prestatus from com_banking where combk_appno='^' ^ order by combk_id
select combk_id, combk_facility, to_char(combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,combk_bnktype,combk_inttype,combk_credittype, combk_sancrefno,to_char(combk_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_sancdate,to_char(combk_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_duedate,combk_arrears, combk_companyname,combk_bnk, combk_bnkname, combk_fundtype, combk_limit,combk_os,combk_spread,combk_remarks,combk_facility_sno,combk_modtype, combk_monthly_ins,combk_type,combk_cbsappno,combk_repaymenttype,to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as date1,combk_interestrate,combk_drawingpower, combk_purpose,combk_prestatus,to_date(combk_duedate)-to_date(sysdate) as Days,combk_factype,combk_fac_grp,com_exposure,combk_repaymentcmt, decode(COMBK_FACTYPE,'M','Main-Limit','S','Sub-Limit','') as COMBK_FACTYPE1,decode(COMBK_FACCATEGORY,'R','Regular Limit','A','Adhoc Limit','D','Additional Limit','O','One Time Limit','') as COMBK_FACCATEGORY from com_banking where combk_appno='^' order by combk_id
select combk_id, combk_facility, to_char(combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,combk_bnktype,combk_inttype,combk_credittype, combk_sancrefno,to_char(combk_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_sancdate,to_char(combk_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_duedate,combk_arrears, combk_companyname,combk_bnk, combk_bnkname, combk_fundtype, combk_limit,combk_os,combk_spread,combk_remarks,combk_facility_sno,combk_modtype, combk_monthly_ins,combk_type,combk_cbsappno,combk_repaymenttype,to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as date1,combk_interestrate,combk_drawingpower, combk_purpose,combk_prestatus,to_date(combk_duedate)-to_date(sysdate) as Days,combk_factype,combk_fac_grp from com_banking where combk_appno='^' and combk_parentfacsno='^' order by combk_id
select fc.com_facid,fc.com_facdesc from facility_corp fc , facility_master fm where fc.com_headfac=fm.facility_catid and com_module='^' and com_facstatus='^' and fm.facility_nature in ('^')
update com_banking set combk_bnk=?, combk_bnkname=?, combk_facility=?, combk_limit=?, combk_credittype=?, COMBK_OSASONDATE=sysdate,combk_duedate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),combk_bnktype=?,combk_inttype=?, combk_repaymenttype=?,combk_interestrate=?,combk_accountopen=?,combk_prefix=?,combk_suffix=?,COMBK_PURPOSE=?,combk_os=?,com_exposure=?,combk_faccategory=? where combk_appno=? and combk_facility_sno=? and combk_credittype='P'
select f.facility_code, f.facility_existing, fm.facility_nature,f.cbs_accountno,f.FACILITY_SANCAMT, f.facility_accountopen,f.facility_group,to_char(f.facility_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_duedate, f.facility_repaytype,f.facility_intsubtype,f.facility_propbanktype,f.facility_sancinterest,facility_prefix,facility_suffix, facility_purpose,facility_oldappno,facility_oldappsno,facility_category from facilities f, facility_master fm where f.facility_headid=fm.facility_catid and f.facility_appno='^' and f.facility_sno='^'
select f.facility_code,fc.com_facid,fc.com_facdesc,f.facility_sno from facility_corp fc,facilities f where f.facility_appno='^' and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code order by facility_sno
select f.facility_code,fc.com_facid,fc.com_facdesc,f.facility_sno,f.FACILITY_RESTR_FLAG from facility_corp fc,facilities f where f.facility_appno='^' and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code and f.FACILITY_RESTR_FLAG='Y' order by facility_sno
select f.facility_code,fc.com_facid,fc.com_facdesc,f.facility_sno,f.FACILITY_RESTR_FLAG from facility_corp fc,facilities f,APP_POST_SANCTION where f.facility_appno='^' and f.FACILITY_APPNO=PS_APP_NO and f.FACILITY_SNO=PS_APP_SNO and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code order by facility_sno
select f.facility_code,fc.com_facid,(fc.com_facdesc||' - '||decode(facility_category,'R','Regular Limit','A','Adhoc Limit','D','Additional Limit','O','One Time Limit','')||' - '||decode(facility_group,'0','Main-Limit','Sub-Limit')) as com_facdesc,f.facility_sno from facility_corp fc,facilities f where f.facility_appno='^' and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code order by facility_sno
select combk_type,combk_os,combk_limit,to_char(combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,com_exposure from com_banking where combk_appno='^' and combk_facility_sno='^' and combk_credittype='P'
insert into com_groupconcerns (comgc_appno, comgc_id, comgc_type, comgc_facility, comgc_osasondate, comgc_bnktype, comgc_inttype, comgc_credittype, comgc_sancrefno, comgc_sancdate, comgc_duedate, comgc_arrears, comgc_companyname, comgc_bnk, comgc_bnkname, comgc_fundtype, comgc_limit, comgc_os, comgc_spread, comgc_remarks, comgc_facility_sno,comgc_modtype,comgc_monthly_ins,comgc_cbsappno,comgc_intrate,comgc_repaytype,comgc_drwpower,comgc_prestatus,comgc_purpose) values (?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update com_groupconcerns set comgc_facility=?, comgc_osasondate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), comgc_bnktype=?, comgc_inttype=?, comgc_credittype=?, comgc_sancrefno=?, comgc_sancdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), comgc_duedate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), comgc_arrears=?, comgc_companyname=?, comgc_bnk=?, comgc_bnkname=?, comgc_fundtype=?, comgc_limit=?, comgc_os=?, comgc_spread=?, comgc_remarks=?, comgc_facility_sno=?, comgc_type=?,comgc_modtype=?,comgc_monthly_ins=?,comgc_cbsappno=?,comgc_intrate=?,comgc_repaytype=?,comgc_drwpower=?,comgc_prestatus=?,comgc_purpose=?,comgc_repaymentcmt=? where comgc_appno=? and comgc_id=?
delete from com_groupconcerns where comgc_appno=? and comgc_id=?
select comgc_id, comgc_facility, to_char(comgc_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_osasondate, comgc_bnktype, comgc_inttype, comgc_credittype, comgc_sancrefno, to_char(comgc_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_sancdate, to_char(comgc_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_duedate, comgc_arrears, comgc_companyname, comgc_bnk, comgc_bnkname, comgc_fundtype, comgc_limit, comgc_os, comgc_spread, comgc_remarks, comgc_facility_sno, comgc_type,comgc_modtype,comgc_monthly_ins,comgc_cbsappno,comgc_intrate,comgc_repaytype,comgc_drwpower,comgc_prestatus,COMGC_EXPOSURE,comgc_purpose,comgc_repaymentcmt, decode(COMGC_FACTYPE,'M','Main-Limit','S','Sub-Limit','') as COMGC_FACTYPE,decode(COMGC_FACCATEGORY,'R','Regular Limit','A','Adhoc Limit','D','Additional Limit','O','One Time Limit','') as COMGC_FACCATEGORY from com_groupconcerns where comgc_appno='^' ^ order by comgc_id
select fc.com_facid, fc.com_facdesc, fm.facility_nature,com_facility_stop from facility_corp fc , facility_master fm where fc.com_headfac=fm.facility_catid and com_module='^' and com_facstatus='^'
select NVL(max(comgc_id),0) as maxid from com_groupconcerns where comgc_appno='^'
select com_facdesc,COM_FACNATURE,COM_AGRSCHEMETYPE,com_facility_loantype,com_headfac from facility_corp where com_facid = '^' and com_module='^'
insert into com_briefbackground (com_appno,com_partyfileno,com_branchrcvddate,com_branchcompletedate, com_meeting,com_meetingdate,com_submittedto,com_format,com_advanceason,com_advanceamt,com_depositason,com_depositamt, com_npaason,com_npaamt,com_npabranch,com_sancauthority,com_sancdept,com_asset,com_sactionlevel,com_sancrefno,com_inspectiondate, com_inspectionamount,COM_SECTOR,com_processnotedate,Com_Roho,Com_Individual,Com_Group,Com_Comments,com_sancbranch,com_amountvalue,com_proposalsanctype, com_griddate,com_interest_refno,com_processingfee,COM_SANREF_SANCDATE,COM_CFR_VERIFIED,COM_CFR_BORNAME,COM_CFR_DEV_RENFO,STATUS_VERIFIED,COM_USERID2,COM_APPR_DATE,COM_CERSAI_VERIFIED,COM_PERTAINS_BRANCH,COM_CSLMSNO) values (?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?)
delete from com_briefbackground where com_appno=?
select com_appno,com_partyfileno,to_char(com_branchrcvddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_branchrcvddate,to_char(com_branchcompletedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_branchcompletedate, com_meeting,to_char(com_meetingdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_meetingdate,com_submittedto,com_format,to_char(com_advanceason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_advanceason,com_advanceamt, to_char(com_depositason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_depositason,com_depositamt,to_char(com_npaason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_npaason,com_npaamt,com_npabranch,com_sancauthority,com_sancdept, com_asset,com_sactionlevel as com_sanclevel,com_sancrefno,to_char(com_inspectiondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_inspectiondate,com_inspectionamount,com_sector,to_char(com_processnotedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_processnotedate, com_roho,com_individual,com_group,com_comments,com_sancbranch,com_amountvalue,com_proposalsanctype,to_char(com_griddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_griddate,com_interest_refno,com_processingfee,to_char(COM_SANREF_SANCDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_SANREF_SANCDATE,COM_CFR_VERIFIED,COM_CFR_BORNAME,COM_CFR_DEV_RENFO, STATUS_VERIFIED,COM_USERID2,to_char(COM_APPR_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_APPR_DATE,COM_CERSAI_VERIFIED,COM_PERTAINS_BRANCH,COM_CSLMSNO from com_briefbackground where com_appno='^'
select CBS_STATIC_CGTMSE as sanction_dept from com_briefbackground,cbs_staticdata where com_appno='^' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_CODE=com_sancdept and CBS_STATIC_DATA_ID='26'
select facility_nature,facility_propbanktype,facility_sno,facility_id,fc.com_facdesc from facility_master a, facilities b ,facility_corp fc where (b.facility_propbanktype='C' or b.facility_propbanktype='M') and b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and fc.com_facid=b.facility_code and fc.com_module='c' and a.facility_parent='0' and b.facility_appno =^
select combk_type,combk_bnktype,combk_facility_sno,combk_facility,combk_credittype,combk_id,combk_facility,combk_modtype from com_banking b where (b.combk_bnktype='C' or b.combk_bnktype='M') and combk_bnk='Our' and b.combk_appno =^ and combk_credittype='E' order by combk_credittype
select combk_type,combk_bnkname,combk_bnktype,combk_facility_sno,combk_facility,combk_credittype,combk_id from com_banking where (combk_bnktype='C' or combk_bnktype='M') and combk_bnk='Other' and combk_credittype='E' and combk_appno =^
insert into com_banking_det(com_bank_appno,com_bank_factype,com_bank_facility,com_bank_facsno,com_bank_facility_desc, com_bank_faccrtype,com_bank_name,com_bank_arr,com_bank_lead,com_Exiconsortiummul,com_proconsortiummul)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select com_bank_appno,com_bank_factype,com_bank_facility_desc,com_bank_facsno,com_bank_facility,com_bank_faccrtype,com_bank_name, com_bank_arr,com_bank_lead,com_Exiconsortiummul,com_proconsortiummul from com_banking_det where com_bank_appno=^ order by com_bank_faccrtype desc, com_bank_facility desc
delete from com_banking_det where com_bank_appno=?
select upper(perapp_fname) as perappname,perapp_panno,org_name,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp_oldid,perapp_cbsid,perapp_id from perapplicant,organisations,applications, com_demographics where app_no=demo_appno and demo_comappnewid=perapp_id and demo_apptype='N' and (app_delflag is null or app_delflag='N') and perapp_branchcode = org_scode and APP_LOANTYPE='^' and ^
select demo_appno, app_status, mailchkstatus, app_usrid, app_orglevel, app_applnholder, usr_fname||' '||usr_lname as appholdername, demo_comappid,app_renew_flag from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS, applications, users,perapplicant where usr_id(+)=app_applnholder and APP_LOANTYPE='^' and app_no=demo_appno and perapp_id=demo_comappid and demo_apptype='N' and perapp_oldid in (^) and app_delflag='N' ^ order by demo_appno desc
select NVL(max(com_sno),0)+1 as snorelmax from corp_fin_year where com_appno='^'
insert into corp_fin_year(com_sno,com_appno,com_finyear,com_fintype,com_division,COM_FINYEAR_START)values(?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))
select count(*) as cnt from corp_fin_year where com_appno='^' and com_division=^
delete from corp_fin_year where com_appno=? and com_division=?
delete from corp_fin_year where com_appno=? and com_division=? and com_sno >=?
update corp_fin_year set com_finyear=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), com_fintype=?, COM_FINYEAR_START=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where com_appno=? and com_sno=? and com_division=?
delete from COM_FINAPPVALUES where FIN_appno=? and FIN_sno=? and com_division_id=?
select com_sno,to_char(com_finyear_start,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_finyear_start from corp_fin_year where com_appno='^' and com_division=^ and com_fintype='^' and com_finyear=to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy')
select com_sno,COM_FINTYPE,to_char(com_finyear,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year,to_char(COM_FINYEAR_START,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_FINYEAR_START from corp_fin_year where com_appno='^' and com_division=^ order by com_finyear
select com_sno,to_char(com_finyear,'dd/mm/yyyy') as caf_year,com_fintype from corp_fin_year where com_appno='^' and com_division=^ and to_date(com_finyear,'dd/mm/yyyy') =to_date('^', 'dd/mm/yyyy') order by com_sno

insert into corpprd_ratingbasedroi(roi_intid,roi_intsno,roi_ratingcode, roi_sector,roi_baserate ,roi_adjust,roi_interest,roi_crp,roi_bsp) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

SELECT distinct FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO,FINRATEYEAR_LABELNAME FROM FINANCIAL_RATINGYEAR WHERE FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO= '^' and FINRATEYEAR_APPNO='^' and FINRATEYEAR_PAGEID in ('ASSETS','LIABILITIES','PROFIT AND LOSS ACCOUNT') order by FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO
select fc.com_facdesc as facility_displaydesc,f.facility_existing,cb.combk_os,to_char(cb.combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as combk_osasondate,f.facility_proposed, cb.combk_limit,cb.combk_type,fm.facility_for,f.facility_group,f.facility_freshlimit,f.facility_displaydesc as facility_desc,fc.com_headfac from facilities f, com_banking cb, facility_corp fc, facility_master fm where f.facility_sno=cb.combk_facility_sno and f.facility_code=fc.com_facid and f.facility_headid=fm.facility_catid and fm.facility_parent='0' and cb.combk_appno=f.facility_appno and f.facility_appno='^' and fc.com_module='^' and cb.combk_credittype='P'and f.facility_existing!=0 order by f.facility_group
select b.facility_proposed,fc.com_facdesc,a.facility_for,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=facility_headid and facility_parent=0) as facheaddesc, b.facility_group,b.facility_freshlimit,fc.com_headfac,b.facility_renew_flag,b.facility_sno,b.facility_existing,facility_sancinterest,FACILITY_RENEWALJUSTIF from facility_master a,facilities b ,facility_corp fc,static_data sd where STAT_DATA_DESC=b.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and fc.com_facid=b.facility_code and a.facility_parent='0' and b.facility_appno ='^' and fc.com_module='^' and b.facility_group='^' and (facility_sancstatus='A' or facility_sancstatus is null) order by decode(b.facility_headid,'4',1,'5',2,'3', 3,'2',4,'6',5,'7',6,'1',7)
select cb.combk_limit,cb.combk_os,to_char(combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,cb.combk_type,cb.combk_sancrefno, to_char(cb.combk_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_sancdate,cb.combk_spread, cb.combk_os,to_char(cb.combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,to_char(cb.combk_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_duedate,cb.combk_arrears,cb.combk_facility,cb.combk_modtype, cb.combk_purpose,combk_interestrate,combk_inttype,combk_factype,com_exposure from com_banking cb where combk_bnk='Our' and cb.combk_appno ='^' and combk_credittype='E' order by combk_id desc
select combk_facility,combk_limit,combk_os,to_char(combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as combk_osasondate,combk_type,combk_fundtype, combk_sancrefno,to_char(combk_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_sancdate,combk_spread, combk_os, to_char(combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,to_char(combk_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_duedate,combk_arrears ,combk_interestrate,combk_inttype from com_banking where combk_bnk='Other' and combk_credittype='E' and combk_appno =^
select b.facility_proposed,fc.com_facdesc,a.facility_for,b.facility_existing,b.bplr as facility_interest,b.facility_sno,b.facility_group, b.facility_months,b.facility_modeofrepay,b.facility_margin,b.facility_holidayperiod,b.facility_repaytype, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=facility_headid and facility_parent=0) as facheaddesc, b.facility_sel_type ,b.facility_intsubtype,b.facility_baserate,b.facility_sancinterest,b.facility_facnature, to_char(facility_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_duedate, STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_desc,b.facility_inttype,b.facility_sancamt,fc.com_headfac,b.facility_category,b.facility_adhocfac,b.fac_metlifepremiumamt, b.FAC_INS_COMPANY_NAME,b.FAC_PREMIUM_TENOR,b.FAC_PREMIUM_LOAN_AMOUNT,b.FAC_INS_ACCOUNT_NO,b.FAC_PREMIUM_AMOUNT, b.FAC_INS_FUNDED_COMPANY_NAME,b.FAC_PROCESSED_TYPE,decode(FACILITY_PROPBANKTYPE,'S','Sole','M','Multiple','C','Consortium','') as FACILITY_PROPBANKTYPE, fac_marginrelax,fac_actualmargin,fac_actualrelaxed,facility_freshlimit,facility_existing,facility_oldappno,facility_oldappsno,FACILITY_MOD_INTRATE_REASON,FACILITY_MOD_INTRATE_CONC,FACILITY_MODE_INTRATE_CIR, FACILITY_DEVIATION,FACILITY_CONCESSION,FACILITY_AS_PER_CIRCULAR from facility_master a,facilities b ,facility_corp fc,static_data where STAT_DATA_DESC=b.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and fc.com_facid=b.facility_code and a.facility_parent='0' and b.facility_appno =^ and fc.com_module='^' and b.facility_group='^' and (b.facility_sancstatus='A' or b.facility_sancstatus is null) order by decode(b.facility_headid,'4',1,'5',2,'3', 3,'2',4,'6',5,'7',6,'1',7)
select STAT_DATA_DESC1 as com_facdesc from facilities,static_data where STAT_DATA_DESC=facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and facility_appno=^ and facility_sno='^'
select com_facility_loantype as prd_loantype, com_facility_emischeme as scheme_code from facility_corp where com_facid in (select facility_code from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_sno='^' and facility_appno in (select app_no from applications where app_no='^' and app_status='^'))
select ci.corpprd_interest,ci.CORPPRD_INTERESTID,ci.CORPPRD_BASERATE,ci.CORPPRD_SNO,ci.CORPPRD_INTID,ci.corpprd_creditrskpremium,ci.corpprd_busstrategicpremium from corpprd_interest_limit ci,corpprdint_master cm where CORPPRDINT_PRDCODE='^' and cm.CORPPRDINT_SNO=ci.CORPPRD_INTID and cm.CORPPRDINT_INTTYPE='^' and ('^' between cm.CORPPRD_AMTRANGEFROM and cm.CORPPRD_AMTRANGETO) and ('^' between ci.CORPPRD_TERMFROM and ci.CORPPRD_TERMTO) and CORPPRD_INTERESTTYPE='^'
select ci.corpprd_interest,ci.CORPPRD_INTERESTID,ci.CORPPRD_BASERATE,ci.CORPPRD_SNO,ci.CORPPRD_INTID,ci.corpprd_creditrskpremium,ci.corpprd_busstrategicpremium from corpprd_interest_limit ci,corpprdint_master cm where CORPPRDINT_PRDCODE='^' and cm.CORPPRDINT_SNO=ci.CORPPRD_INTID and cm.CORPPRDINT_INTTYPE='^' and ('^' between cm.CORPPRD_AMTRANGEFROM and cm.CORPPRD_AMTRANGETO) and ('^' between ci.CORPPRD_TERMFROM and ci.CORPPRD_TERMTO) and CORPPRD_INTERESTTYPE='^' and corpint_reftype='^'
select com_facid,com_facdesc,com_rangefrom,com_rangeto,com_facility_emischeme,com_minrepayperiod, (com_maxrepayperiod||'-'||COM_HOLIDAYPERIOD) as com_maxrepayperiod,FACILITY_NATURE,COM_AGRSCHEMETYPE,COM_FACNATURE,com_cashmargin,fac_repaytype, com_facility_loantype,com_loanagainstshares,com_sharetype,com_bankscheme,COM_MINREPAYPERIOD_REST,COM_MAXREPAYPERIOD_REST,COM_HOLIDAYPERIOD_REST, (COM_MAXREPAYPERIOD_REST||'-'||COM_HOLIDAYPERIOD_REST) as com_maxrepayperiod_restructure,COM_CGTMSEFLAG from facility_corp,FACILITY_MASTER where COM_HEADFAC='^' and COM_SUBFAC='^' and COM_FACSTATUS='c' and COM_MODULE='^' and COM_HEADFAC=FACILITY_CATID and COM_FACILITY_STOP!=1 and COM_WHTDIGIPRD='^' and COM_FACILITY_EXPIRYDATE >=sysdate
select fc.com_facdesc,f.facility_code,fc.com_bankscheme,fc.com_factype from facilities f,facility_corp fc where f.facility_appno='^' and f.facility_sno='^' and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code
select facility_sancamt as facility_proposed,facility_months,fac_printflag as loan_releasedateofmclr,FACILITY_WHT_CGTMSEAPPLY,FACILITY_SANCINTEREST,FACILITY_CG_SPLIT_INT_RATE,FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD,facility_group,FACILITY_RENEW_FLAG,'' as appname,FACILITY_BASERATE from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_sno='^'

update com_implementationschedule set COM_DESC=?,COM_COMMENCEDATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), COM_COMPLETIONDATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), COM_STATUS=? where COM_APPNO=? and COM_SNO=? and COM_FACILITIES=?

insert into com_appexternalrating(COM_APPNO,COM_FACILITYSNO,COM_AGENCY,COM_AMOUNT,COM_RATING,COM_DESC,COM_DUEDATE)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))

insert into COM_CONSORTMULTIPLE(COM_APPNO,COM_SNO,COM_FACSNO,COM_MEMBERBANK,COM_TOTALSHARE,COM_SHARE1 ,COM_EXISTFUND,COM_SHARE2,COM_EXISTNONFUND,COM_SHARE3,COM_PROPOSEDFUND,COM_SHARE4,COM_PROPOSEDNONFUND, COM_LIMIT,COM_OUTSTANDING,COM_OSASON,COM_BANKTYPE,COM_CREDITTYPE,COM_OUROTHER,COM_FACVALUE,COM_TOTALPROPSHARE) values (?,(select NVL(max(COM_SNO),0) from COM_CONSORTMULTIPLE)+1,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?)
select COM_APPNO,COM_SNO,COM_FACSNO,COM_MEMBERBANK,COM_TOTALSHARE,COM_SHARE1 ,COM_EXISTFUND,COM_SHARE2,COM_EXISTNONFUND,COM_SHARE3,COM_PROPOSEDFUND,COM_SHARE4,COM_PROPOSEDNONFUND, COM_LIMIT,COM_OUTSTANDING,to_char(COM_OSASON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_OSASON,COM_BANKTYPE,COM_CREDITTYPE,COM_OUROTHER,COM_FACVALUE,COM_TOTALPROPSHARE from COM_CONSORTMULTIPLE where COM_APPNO='^' and COM_OUROTHER='^' order by com_sno
update COM_CONSORTMULTIPLE set COM_FACSNO=?,COM_MEMBERBANK=?,COM_TOTALSHARE=?,COM_SHARE1=?,COM_EXISTFUND=?, COM_SHARE2=?,COM_EXISTNONFUND=?,COM_SHARE3=?,COM_PROPOSEDFUND=?,COM_SHARE4=?,COM_PROPOSEDNONFUND=?,COM_LIMIT=?, COM_OUTSTANDING=?,COM_OSASON=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),COM_BANKTYPE=?,COM_CREDITTYPE=?,COM_OUROTHER=?,COM_FACVALUE=?,COM_TOTALPROPSHARE=? where COM_APPNO=? and COM_SNO=? and COM_OUROTHER=?
select NVL(max(MARGIN_ID),0)+1 from COM_MARGINCOST where MARGIN_PRDCODE ='^'
insert into COM_MARGINCOST( MARGIN_PRDCODE,MARGIN_ID,MARGIN_RANGE_FROM,MARGIN_RANGE_TO,MARGIN_PERCT) values (?,?,?,?,?)

delete from COM_MARGINCOST where margin_prdcode=? and margin_id=?

select ccd.comapp_divisiontype,ccd.comapp_div_name, CASE cg.comgc_type WHEN '1' then cg.comgc_limit else cg.comgc_os end as exposure from com_groupconcerns cg, comapp_company_divisions ccd where cg.comgc_companyname=ccd.comapp_div_appid and cg.comgc_bnk='Our' and ccd.comapp_div_id_old='^' and cg.comgc_appno='^'

select cc.com_facsno,fc.com_facdesc,com_memberbank,com_totalshare,com_share1,com_existfund,com_share2,com_existnonfund, com_share3,com_proposedfund,com_share4,com_proposednonfund,com_limit,com_outstanding,to_char(com_osason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_osason,com_banktype,com_credittype,com_ourother,com_facvalue from com_consortmultiple cc, facility_corp fc where fc.com_facid = substr(cc.com_facvalue,0,instr(com_facvalue,'~',1,1)-1) and cc.com_appno='^'
select cb.combk_facility,cm.com_facsno,cm.com_share1,cm.com_existfund,cm.com_share2,cm.com_existnonfund,cm.com_share3, cm.com_proposedfund,cm.com_share4,cm.com_proposednonfund,cm.com_facvalue,cm.com_limit,cm.com_outstanding,cm.com_osason, cm.com_memberbank from com_banking cb, com_banking_det cd, com_consortmultiple cm where cb.combk_appno='^' and cb.combk_bnktype !='S' and cd.com_bank_appno=cb.combk_appno and cm.com_appno=cb.combk_appno and cd.com_bank_appno=cm.com_appno and cm.com_ourother='other' and cb.combk_bnk='Other' and cb.combk_credittype='E' and cm.com_credittype='E' and cd.com_bank_facsno=cb.combk_id
select fc.com_facdesc,f.facility_propbanktype from facilities f , facility_corp fc where f.facility_code=fc.com_facid and f.facility_existing='0.00' and f.facility_propbanktype='S' and f.facility_appno='^' and (f.facility_sancstatus='A' or f.facility_sancstatus is null)
select combk_bnktype,combk_facility,combk_modtype from com_banking where combk_appno='^' and combk_bnktype='S' and combk_bnk='Our' and combk_credittype='E'
select f.facility_sno,fc.com_facdesc,f.facility_propbanktype,cm.com_memberbank,cd.com_bank_lead,cm.com_memberbank, cm.com_share1,cm.com_existfund,cm.com_share2,cm.com_existnonfund,cm.com_share3,cm.com_proposedfund,cm.com_share4, cm.com_proposednonfund,cm.com_facvalue,cm.com_limit,cm.com_outstanding,cm.com_osason from facilities f,facility_corp fc,com_banking_det cd,com_consortmultiple cm where f.facility_code=fc.com_facid and f.facility_existing='0.00' and f.facility_propbanktype !='S' and cd.com_bank_appno=f.facility_appno and cm.com_appno=f.facility_appno and cd.com_bank_appno=cm.com_appno and f.facility_sno=cm.com_facsno and cm.com_ourother='our' and cm.com_credittype='P' and cd.com_bank_facsno=f.facility_sno and cd.com_bank_faccrtype='P' and f.facility_appno='^'
select combk_id,cm.com_memberbank,cd.com_bank_lead,cb.combk_bnktype, cm.com_memberbank,cm.com_share1,cm.com_existfund,cm.com_share2,cm.com_existnonfund,cm.com_share3,cm.com_proposedfund, cm.com_share4,cm.com_proposednonfund,cm.com_facvalue,cm.com_limit,cm.com_outstanding,cm.com_osason,combk_facility,combk_modtype from com_banking cb ,com_banking_det cd,com_consortmultiple cm where cb.combk_appno='^' and cb.combk_bnktype !='S' and cd.com_bank_appno=cb.combk_appno and cm.com_appno=cb.combk_appno and cd.com_bank_appno=cm.com_appno and cm.com_ourother='our' and cb.combk_bnk='Our' and cb.combk_credittype='E' and cm.com_credittype='E' and cb.combk_id=cm.com_facsno and cd.com_bank_facility=cb.combk_facility
select sum(cb.combk_limit) as fundtotal from facility_master fm,com_banking cb,facility_corp fc where combk_bnk='Our' and fm.facility_catid=fc.com_headfac and fc.com_facid=cb.combk_facility and fc.com_module='c' and fm.facility_parent='0' and cb.combk_appno =^ and combk_credittype='E' and fm.FACILITY_FOR='F'
select com_appno, com_facsno, com_sno, com_amount, com_margin, com_marginamt, com_bankloan, com_bankloanamt from com_copmof_margin where com_appno='^' and com_facsno='^'
select terms_termdesc,terms_termtype,terms_id,terms_prepost,terms_facid,TERMS_PARENTID from com_termscond where terms_appno='^' and terms_status='Y' and terms_isdel!='Y' and terms_mode='^' and terms_prepost='^' and terms_factype='^' and TERMS_PARENTID='^' order by terms_id
select terms_termdesc,terms_termtype,terms_id,terms_prepost,terms_facid,TERMS_PARENTID from com_termscond where terms_appno='^' and terms_status='Y' and terms_isdel!='Y' and terms_mode='^' and terms_factype='^' and TERMS_PARENTID='^' order by terms_id
select com_facdesc,comgc_limit,comgc_sancrefno,to_char(comgc_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_sancdate,comgc_os, to_char(comgc_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_osasondate,to_char(comgc_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_duedate,comgc_arrears,comgc_spread,comgc_companyname from com_groupconcerns,facility_corp fc where comgc_bnk='Our' and to_number(comgc_facility_sno)=fc.com_facid and comgc_appno='^' order by comgc_id
select comgc_limit,comgc_sancrefno,to_char(comgc_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_sancdate,comgc_os,COMGC_INTERESTRATE,comgc_intrate, to_char(comgc_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_osasondate,to_char(comgc_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_duedate,comgc_arrears,comgc_spread,comgc_companyname,comgc_purpose,comgc_modtype,comgc_facility, case comgc_modtype when 'p' then (SELECT prd_desc FROM products WHERE prd_code =comgc_facility) else (SELECT case COM_HEADFAC when '1' then 'Forward contract' when '2' then 'Pre Shipment Credit' when '3' then 'Overdraft' when '4' then 'Term Loan' when '5' then 'Demand Loan' else com_facdesc end FROM facility_corp,facility_master WHERE COM_HEADFAC=facility_catid and com_facid =comgc_facility) END as description,CASE when comgc_modtype in ('p','r') THEN '' ELSE (SELECT com_headfac FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = comgc_facility) END AS com_headfac,COMGC_REMARKS,comgc_repaymentcmt,comgc_parentappno,comgc_parentfacsno,comgc_factype from com_groupconcerns where comgc_bnk='Our' and comgc_appno='^' and comgc_fac_grp='0' and comgc_companyname='^' order by comgc_id
select comgc_limit,comgc_sancrefno,to_char(comgc_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_sancdate,comgc_os,COMGC_INTERESTRATE,comgc_intrate, to_char(comgc_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_osasondate,to_char(comgc_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_duedate,comgc_arrears,comgc_spread,comgc_companyname,comgc_purpose,comgc_modtype,comgc_facility, case comgc_modtype when 'p' then (SELECT prd_desc FROM products WHERE prd_code =comgc_facility) else (SELECT case COM_HEADFAC when '1' then 'Forward contract' when '2' then 'Pre Shipment Credit' when '3' then 'Overdraft' when '4' then 'Term Loan' when '5' then 'Demand Loan' else com_facdesc end FROM facility_corp,facility_master WHERE COM_HEADFAC=facility_catid and com_facid =comgc_facility) END as description,CASE when comgc_modtype in ('p','r') THEN '' ELSE (SELECT com_headfac FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = comgc_facility) END AS com_headfac,COMGC_REMARKS,comgc_repaymentcmt,comgc_factype from com_groupconcerns where comgc_bnk='Our' and comgc_appno='^' and comgc_parentappno='^' and comgc_fac_grp='^' and comgc_companyname='^' order by comgc_id
select comgc_facility,comgc_limit,comgc_sancrefno,to_char(comgc_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_sancdate,comgc_os,comgc_intrate as COMGC_INTERESTRATE, to_char(comgc_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_osasondate,to_char(comgc_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comgc_duedate,comgc_spread, comgc_arrears from com_groupconcerns where COMGC_BNK='Other' and comgc_appno='^' order by comgc_id
insert into COM_OTHERCOMMENTS(COM_APPNO,COM_INTEREST,COM_OTHERINCOME,COM_FROMDATE,COM_TODATE,COM_SNO,COM_RECOVERYSTATUS,com_odinterest,com_forexincome,com_tlinterest,com_otherfacincome) values(?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),TO_DATE(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?)
select COM_APPNO,COM_INTEREST,COM_OTHERINCOME,to_char(COM_FROMDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_FROMDATE, to_char(COM_TODATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_TODATE,COM_SNO,COM_COMMENTSON,COM_COMMENTS,COM_ABG,COM_PRTA,COM_ADBOTHERSBANK,COM_RECOVERYSTATUS,com_odinterest,com_forexincome,com_tlinterest,com_otherfacincome from COM_OTHERCOMMENTS where COM_APPNO='^' order by COM_SNO
delete from COM_OTHERCOMMENTS where COM_APPNO=? and COM_SNO=?

delete from COM_COPMOF_MARGIN where COM_APPNO=? and COM_FACSNO=?

select com_comments from com_comments where com_appno='^'

delete from com_Rbiloanpolicyguide where comrbi_appno=?
select comrbi_pagetype,to_char(comrbi_asdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as comrbi_asdate,comrbi_comments,comrbi_Compliance,COMRBI_CMDPROCESS,com_auditconductedby from com_Rbiloanpolicyguide where comrbi_appno='^'
insert into com_Rbiloanpolicyguide(comrbi_appno,combri_sno,comrbi_pagetype,comrbi_asdate,comrbi_comments,comrbi_Compliance,COMRBI_CMDPROCESS,com_auditconductedby) values(?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?)

insert into COM_DELEGATION(COM_APPNO,COM_USERID,COM_USERDES,COM_SNO,com_user,COM_DETAILS,COM_DATE)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'))
select COM_APPNO,COM_USERID,(case when (select cbs_static_data_code from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='27' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC=COM_USERDES) is not null then (select cbs_static_data_code from cbs_staticdata where cbs_static_data_id='27' and CBS_STATIC_DATA_DESC=COM_USERDES) else COM_USERDES end) as COM_USERDES,COM_SNO,COM_USER,COM_DETAILS,to_char(COM_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_DATE from COM_DELEGATION where COM_APPNO='^' order by com_sno asc

insert into SET_PERPRDAGRIPROPERTIES(SA_PRDCODE,SA_DEPRICIATION,SA_LUBRICANTS,SA_REPAIRS, SA_CONSUMPTIONNEEDS,SA_ALLIED,SA_MORTALITY,SA_NONFARM) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select SA_LUBRICANTS,SA_REPAIRS from SET_PERPRDAGRIPROPERTIES where SA_PRDCODE='^'
select CCBM_APPNO,CCBM_SNO,CCBM_TYPE,CCBM_YEAR,CCBM_VAL, CCBM_NT_CONTRCT_RCPT,CCBM_SB_CONTRCT_RCPT,CCBM_OTHR_RCPT, CCBM_TOT_RCPT,CCBM_MATERIALS,CCBM_SAL_WGS,CCBM_SB_CONTRCT, CCBM_HIRE_CHRG,CCBM_LBR_CHRG,CCBM_DSL_PTRL_CHRG,CCBM_RPR_MNT, CCBM_TRVL_EXP,CCBM_OTHR_OPRTNG_EXP,CCBM_BNK_INT_CHRG,CCBM_TAX_PAY, CCBM_ADMN_EXP,CCBM_OTHR_EXP,CCBM_TOT_OFLW,CCBM_SRPLS_DFCT, CCBM_OPN_CRDT_CSH,CCBM_SRPLS_DFTC_TOT,CCBM_BNK_FIN,CCBM_FIN_YEAR from COM_CASHBUDGETMETHOD where CCBM_APPNO='^' and CCBM_YEAR='^' and CCBM_SNO='^'
select fin_rowid,fin_rowdesc,fin_rowtype,fin_sno from com_finmaster where fin_cma_no=^ and fin_page='^' and fin_tabname='^' order by fin_sno
SELECT a.fin_rowid AS myrowid ,a.fin_rowdesc desc1,b.fin_rowdesc desc2,b.fin_rowid,a.fin_rowtype, a.fin_sno FROM com_finmaster a left outer join com_finappdesc b ON a.fin_rowid = b.fin_rowid WHERE a.fin_cma_no= ^ AND fin_page='^' and fin_tabname='^' ORDER BY a.fin_sno
select fin_rowid,fin_formula from com_finmaster where fin_page = '^' and fin_cma_no = ^ and fin_tabname='^' order by fin_sno
select distinct(p.prd_code) as prdcode, c.cat_name as category, c1.cat_name as subcategory, p.prd_rng_from as rangefrom, p.prd_rng_to as rangeto, p.prd_term as term,p.prd_minterm as minterm, p.nsc_loan as nsc_loan ,p1.prd_maxintclass as class, p.prd_type as prd_type, p.scheme_code,p.prd_desc,p.prd_loantype from prd_category c, prd_category c1, products p, prd_authority p1, prd_interest p2, prd_used where p1.prd_code=p.prd_code and p2.prd_code=p.prd_code and prd_used.prd_code=p.prd_code and prd_type like 'p%' and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') >= to_date(p.prd_eff_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ to_date(p.prd_validupto_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') and upper(prd_renew)='N' and Upper(prd_stop)!='Y' and Upper(prd_saveflag)='C' and p.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and c.cat_id=c1.cat_parent order by c.cat_name
select p.prd_code as prdcode,( c.cat_name||'-' || c1.cat_name ||'-' ||p.prd_desc) as com_facdesc,PRD_LOANTYPE,PRD_TYPE,p.prd_desc from products p, prd_category c, prd_category c1 where prd_code='^' and p.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and c.cat_id=c1.cat_parent
select p.prd_code as prdcode,p.prd_desc as com_facdesc,PRD_LOANTYPE,PRD_TYPE,p.prd_desc from products p, prd_category c, prd_category c1 where prd_code='^' and p.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and c.cat_id=c1.cat_parent
delete from COM_CASHFLOW where COM_CF_APPNO=? and COM_CF_FINYEAR=?
insert into COM_CASHFLOW (COM_CF_APPNO,COM_CF_SNO,COM_CF_YEAR,COM_CF_OPENINGBAL,COM_CF_PROMOTEREQUITY,COM_CF_BANKFINANCE,COM_CF_UNSECLOAN, COM_CF_SALEPROCEEDS,COM_CF_SOF_TOTAL,COM_CF_COSTOFLAND,COM_CF_PREMIUMFSI,COM_CF_CONSTRUCTCOST,COM_CF_MARKETEXPENSES,COM_CF_ADMINEXPENSES, COM_CF_INTEREST,COM_CF_REPAYMENT,COM_CF_PROVISIONTAX,COM_CF_APPFIN_TOTAL,COM_CF_CLOSINGBALANCE,COM_CF_OTHER,COM_CF_OTHERFIN,COM_CF_FINYEAR,COM_CF_UNITNO) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select com_cf_appno,com_cf_sno,com_cf_year,com_cf_openingbal,com_cf_promoterequity,com_cf_bankfinance,com_cf_unsecloan, com_cf_saleproceeds,com_cf_sof_total,com_cf_costofland,com_cf_premiumfsi,com_cf_constructcost,com_cf_marketexpenses,com_cf_adminexpenses, com_cf_interest,com_cf_repayment,com_cf_provisiontax,com_cf_appfin_total,com_cf_closingbalance,com_cf_finyear,com_cf_other,com_cf_otherfin from com_cashflow where com_cf_appno='^' and com_cf_finyear='^' order by com_cf_sno
select distinct(com_cf_finyear),com_cf_unitno from com_cashflow where com_cf_appno='^' order by com_cf_unitno asc

insert into com_benchmark_finmaster(BENCH_ROWID,BENCH_CMANO,BENCH_ROWDESC,BENCH_POLICY,BENCH_DEPENDSON,BENCH_FORMULA) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)
update com_benchmark_finmaster set BENCH_CMANO=?,BENCH_ROWDESC=?,BENCH_POLICY=?,BENCH_DEPENDSON=?, BENCH_FORMULA=? where BENCH_ROWID=? and BENCH_CMANO=?
delete from com_benchmark_finmaster where bench_rowid = ?
select BENCH_ROWID,BENCH_CMANO,BENCH_ROWDESC,BENCH_POLICY,BENCH_DEPENDSON,BENCH_FORMULA from com_benchmark_finmaster where BENCH_ROWID='^' and BENCH_CMANO='^'
DELETE FROM COM_BENCHMARK_FINVALUES WHERE BENCHMARK_FINVALUES_APPNO=?
INSERT INTO COM_BENCHMARK_FINVALUES (BENCHMARK_FINVALUES_APPNO,BENCHMARK_FINVALUES_SLNO,BENCHMARK_FINVALUES_STATUS,BENCHMARK_FINVALUES_ACTUAL) VALUES (?,?,?,?)
select comcma_cmano,comcma_amtval from com_fincmano where comcma_appno = '^'
select distinct to_char(b.fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') as audityear,b.fin_year from COM_FINAPPVALUES b where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id ='0' and b.fin_year ^ sysdate and 0 ^ (select sum(fin_audit) from COM_FINAPPVALUES where fin_appno=b.fin_appno and fin_year=b.fin_year) order by b.fin_year desc
select BENCH_ROWID,BENCH_CMANO,BENCH_ROWDESC,BENCH_POLICY,BENCH_DEPENDSON,BENCH_FORMULA,BENCHMARK_FINVALUES_STATUS,BENCHMARK_FINVALUES_ACTUAL from com_benchmark_finmaster left join COM_BENCHMARK_FINVALUES on BENCH_ROWID=BENCHMARK_FINVALUES_SLNO and BENCHMARK_FINVALUES_APPNO='^' where BENCH_CMANO='^' order by bench_rowid

select comapp_div_id, comapp_id, comapp_div_name, comapp_div_address, comapp_div_city, comapp_div_state, comapp_div_pin, comapp_div_phone, comapp_div_fax, comapp_divisiontype, comapp_div_bsrcode,comapp_div_dist,comapp_div_appid, com_compratinggrade1,to_char(com_compratingason1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_compratingason1,com_compratingtype1,com_compratinggrade2, to_char(com_compratingason2,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_compratingason2,com_compratingtype2,COMAPP_BANKERS, comapp_cbsid,comapp_groupid,comapp_relation, COMAPP_DIVISIONSUBTYPE,COMAPP_DOCEXECUTANT,COMAPP_ACCOUNTOPERTED,COMAPP_DINNUMBER,COMAPP_CHF_PROMOTER,COMAPP_PERSONAL_GUARANTEE,COMAPP_CHF_NPA from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_id='^' order by comapp_divisiontype,comapp_cbsid,comapp_groupid
insert into COM_KALYPTO_RATIO (FIN_APPNO,FIN_DATE,FIN_ROWID,FIN_VALUES,FIN_TYPE,FIN_SNO) values (?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?)
