update FINANCIAL_RATINGYEAR set FINRATEYEAR_CURRENTYEAR='Y' where FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO=? and FINRATEYEAR_APPNO = (select DEMO_FINSTANDARD from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS where DEMO_APPNO=?)
select FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO from FINANCIAL_RATINGYEAR where FINRATEYEAR_CURRENTYEAR='Y' and FINRATEYEAR_APPNO = (select DEMO_FINSTANDARD from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS where DEMO_APPNO='^')
update FINANCIAL_RATINGYEAR set FINRATEYEAR_CURRENTYEAR='' where FINRATEYEAR_APPNO = (select FIN_FINID from FIN_RATING where FIN_RATAPPNO=?)
update FINANCIAL_RATINGYEAR set FINRATEYEAR_CURRENTYEAR='Y' where FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO=? and FINRATEYEAR_APPNO = (select FIN_FINID from FIN_RATING where FIN_RATAPPNO=?)
select FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO from FINANCIAL_RATINGYEAR where FINRATEYEAR_CURRENTYEAR='Y' and FINRATEYEAR_APPNO = (select FIN_FINID from FIN_RATING where FIN_RATAPPNO='^')
select FIN_ROWID,FIN_KALYPTO_CODE from COM_FINMASTER where FIN_ROWID='^'
delete from COM_KALYPTO_RATIO where FIN_APPNO=?
insert into com_bankingdetails (COM_APPNO,COM_ASSETCLASS, COM_WHTRSUIT, COM_ACTIONCMT, COM_ARREARCMT,com_asscladate) values(?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))
delete from com_bankingdetails where COM_APPNO=?
select COM_ASSETCLASS, COM_WHTRSUIT, COM_ACTIONCMT, COM_ARREARCMT,to_char(com_asscladate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_asscladate from com_bankingdetails where COM_APPNO='^'
insert into COM_COMMENTS(COM_APPNO, COM_SNO,COM_COMMENTS,COM_PAGE) values(?,?,?,?)
select com_sno,com_comments,com_page from com_comments where com_page='^' and com_sno='^' and com_appno='^'
delete com_comments where com_appno=? and com_page=? and com_sno=?
SELECT CST.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,CST.CUS_SEC_TYPE as CUS_SEC_TYPE, CST.CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION as CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION,CST.CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY as CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,CST.CUS_SEC_REIDUALVAL as CUS_SEC_REIDUALVAL ,(SELECT SEC_NAME from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CST.CUS_SEC_TYPE) AS SEC_NAME, (SELECT SEC_NAME from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CST.CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION) AS SEC_CLASSIFICATION, CST.CUS_SEC_JOINT_HOLDER as CUS_SEC_JOINT_HOLDER,(SELECT SEC_COLLATFLAG from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CST.CUS_SEC_TYPE) AS SEC_COLLATFLAG,CUS_COMPANYSHARE_CNT FROM CUS_SECURITIES CST WHERE CST.CUS_SEC_ID IN (SELECT CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID FROM CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP WHERE CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID='^') and cst.cus_sec_statusflag='Y' and cst.cus_releaseflag='N' order by CST.CUS_SEC_TYPE
SELECT CST.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,CST.CUS_SEC_TYPE as CUS_SEC_TYPE, CST.CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION as CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION,CST.CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY as CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,CST.CUS_SEC_REIDUALVAL as CUS_SEC_REIDUALVAL ,(SELECT SEC_NAME from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CST.CUS_SEC_TYPE) AS SEC_NAME, (SELECT SEC_NAME from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CST.CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION) AS SEC_CLASSIFICATION, CST.CUS_SEC_JOINT_HOLDER as CUS_SEC_JOINT_HOLDER,(SELECT SEC_COLLATFLAG from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CST.CUS_SEC_TYPE) AS SEC_COLLATFLAG,CUS_COMPANYSHARE_CNT FROM CUS_SECURITIES CST WHERE CST.CUS_SEC_ID IN (SELECT CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID FROM CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP WHERE CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID='^') and cst.cus_sec_statusflag='Y' and cst.cus_releaseflag='N' and CUS_SEC_TYPE='1' order by CST.CUS_SEC_TYPE
Select PERAPP_TITLE ||'.'|| PERAPP_FNAME as cus_name,PERAPP_ID from PERAPPLICANT WHERE PERAPP_OLDID='^' and (PERAPP_RENEW='n' or PERAPP_RENEW is NULL)
select PERAPP_TITLE ||'.'|| PERAPP_FNAME as cus_name from PERAPPLICANT join CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP on PERAPP_OLDID=CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID WHERE CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID='^' and (PERAPP_RENEW='n' or PERAPP_RENEW is NULL) order by CUS_OWNER_SNO
select p.perapp_title ||'.'||' '|| p.perapp_fname as perapp_name, c.con_comaddr1, c.con_comaddr2, c.con_comvillage, c.con_comcity, c.con_comdist, c.con_comstate, c.con_comzip, c.con_comcountry from perapplicant p, cust_contactinfo c, com_demographics d where p.perapp_id=c.con_appid and p.perapp_id=d.demo_comappnewid and d.demo_appno='^'
select stat_data_sno, stat_data_desc1, loan_paramslno, loan_paramval, stat_data_desc from other_parameters, static_data where stat_data_id='2' and stat_data_sno=loan_paramslno and stat_data_active='Y' and loan_paramslno='1'
select rsk_rule_id,rsk_rule_desc,rsk_rule_params from RSK_PARAM_RULE order by RSK_RULE_ID
select perapp_oldid,perapp_id from PERAPPLICANT where ^
select com_compdttype from com_companydetails where com_oldlapsid = '^' and com_compdtappno='^'
select ix.int_intvalue as intvalue,to_char(a.app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate from bobinterestindex ix,facilities f, applications a where f.facility_appno='^' and f.facility_intindexid=ix.int_intid and a.app_no=f.facility_appno and INT_USEFLAG='Y'
select b.facility_proposed,fc.com_facdesc,a.facility_for,b.facility_existing,b.bplr as facility_interest,b.facility_sno,b.facility_group, b.facility_months,b.facility_modeofrepay,b.facility_margin,b.facility_holidayperiod,b.facility_repaytype from facility_master a,facilities b , facility_corp fc where b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and fc.com_facid=b.facility_code and fc.com_module='a' and a.facility_parent='0' and b.facility_sancstatus='A' and b.facility_appno =^ order by facility_group
select EDU_ID,EDU_COMMENTS,EDU_COL_TOTAL,EDU_TYPE from edu_course_exp where edu_appno='^'
select loan_amtreqd,govt_scheme from loandetails where loan_appno='^'
select * from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_secid='^' and app_sec_loantype='^' ^ order by app_sec_facsno,app_sec_priority
select count(APP_SEC_APPNO) from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID='^' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_attached='A'
update CUS_SECURITIES set CUS_SEC_REIDUALVAL=? where CUS_SEC_ID=?
update app_securitydetails set APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE=? where app_sec_appno=? and app_sec_secid=? and APP_SEC_FACSNO=?
select distinct(app_sec_secid) as app_sec_secid from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_loantype='^' order by app_sec_secid
select distinct(app_sec_secid) as app_sec_secid,cus_sec_reidualval,app_sec_iscollateral,app_sec_outstandamt,app_sec_facsno,app_sec_factype,cus_sec_netsecurity from app_securitydetails,CUS_SECURITIES where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_loantype='^' and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and CUS_SEC_REIDUALVAL ^ 0 ^ order by app_sec_secid,app_sec_iscollateral,app_sec_factype
select * from app_securitydetails,cus_securities where app_sec_appno='^' and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and app_sec_loantype='^' ^ order by app_sec_secid,app_sec_priority
select sum(APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT) as APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_loantype='^'
select sum(COMBK_OS) as COMBK_OS from COM_BANKING where COMBK_APPNO='^' and COMBK_FUNDTYPE='^'
select facility_headid, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=facility_headid and facility_parent=0) as facheaddesc, facility_id, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=facility_id and facility_parent!=0 ) as facdesc, borrower_id, to_char(facility_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as facility_date, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_difference, facility_margin, perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, facility_sno, facility_group, facility_desc, facility_category, facility_months, facility_for, facility_interest, facility_branchname, facility_application, BPLR, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, cbs_accountno, facility_intadjustment, facility_intremarks, to_char(facility_osason,'DD/MM/YYYY') as facility_osason, facility_existbanktype, facility_propbanktype, facility_purpose,facility_sancinterest, facility_sancstatus,facility_sancamt,facility_inttype,facility_govtsponschem,facility_schemetype,facility_sponsagency,facility_subsidytype, facility_subsidyamunt,facility_repaytype,a.facility_code,facility_details,facility_agrschemetype,FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD,FACILITY_INTERESTREC, FACILITY_INTERESTCHARGED,FACILITY_MODEOFREPAY,FACILITY_OPERATIONACCNO,facility_remarks,FACILITY_PERINSTALL,FACILITY_INTSUBTYPE,FACILITY_INTINDEXID,FACILITY_BASERATE from facilities a, facility_master b, perapplicant where facility_headid=facility_catid and perapp_id=borrower_id and facility_appno='^' and facility_group=^ and FACILITY_FOR='^' order by facility_category, facheaddesc, facility_for desc
update app_securitydetails set app_sec_freeze=? where app_sec_appno=?
select F.FACILITY_APPNO AS FACILITY_APPNO, F.FACILITY_SNO AS FACILITY_SNO,F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO AS CBS_ACCOUNTNO,F.FAC_PROCESSDATE AS FAC_PROCESSDATE from FACILITIES F, APPLICATIONS A where F.BORROWER_ID='^' and F.FACILITY_APPNO=A.APP_NO and A.APP_STATUS in ('pa','ca') and A.APP_DELFLAG='N' and F.FAC_PROCESSDATE = (select max(FAC_PROCESSDATE) from FACILITIES where CBS_ACCOUNTNO=F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO) and F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO in (select distinct (CBS_ACCOUNTNO) from FACILITIES where BORROWER_ID='^' and CBS_ACCOUNTNO is not null)
select app_sec_appno,CUS_SEC_ID,CUS_SEC_TYPE,CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION,CUS_SEC_JOINT_HOLDER,CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,CUS_SEC_REIDUALVAL,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE, APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN,APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,(SELECT SEC_NAME from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CUS_SEC_TYPE) AS SEC_NAME, (SELECT SEC_NAME from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION) AS SEC_CLASSIFICATION, CUS_SEC_JOINT_HOLDER as CUS_SEC_JOINT_HOLDER,(SELECT SEC_COLLATFLAG from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CUS_SEC_TYPE) AS SEC_COLLATFLAG,CUS_SEC_JOINT_HOLDER,app_sec_borrower_id,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION as APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT from app_securitydetails,cus_securities where app_sec_appno='^' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE ='^' and APP_SEC_ATTACHED ='A' and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID order by APP_SEC_SECID
select demo_appno as FACILITY_APPNO from per_demographics demo, applications app where demo.demo_appid=^ and demo_type='a' and app.app_no=demo.demo_appno and app.APP_STATUS in ('pa','ca') and app.APP_DELFLAG='N' and app.app_no not in(select APPREN_APPOLDID from app_renewal)
union
select app_no as applicationno from applications ap where CBS_ACCOUNTNO in ( select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from per_demographics demo, applications app where demo.demo_appid=^ and demo_type='a' and app.app_no=demo.demo_appno and app.APP_STATUS in ('pa','ca') and app.APP_DELFLAG='N' and app.app_no in(select APPREN_APPOLDID from app_renewal) )and app_processdate = (select max(app_processdate) from applications where CBS_ACCOUNTNO = ap.CBS_ACCOUNTNO)
select F.FACILITY_APPNO AS FACILITY_APPNO, F.FACILITY_SNO AS FACILITY_SNO,F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO AS CBS_ACCOUNTNO,F.FAC_PROCESSDATE AS FAC_PROCESSDATE,BORROWER_ID from FACILITIES F, APPLICATIONS A where F.BORROWER_ID IN (select perapp_oldid from perapplicant where perapp_id in (select com_compdtappid from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno in( select distinct F.FACILITY_APPNO AS FACILITY_APPNO from FACILITIES F, APPLICATIONS A where F.BORROWER_ID='^' and F.FACILITY_APPNO=A.APP_NO and A.APP_STATUS in ('pa','ca') and A.APP_DELFLAG='N' and F.FAC_PROCESSDATE = (select max(FAC_PROCESSDATE) from FACILITIES where CBS_ACCOUNTNO=F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO) and F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO in (select distinct (CBS_ACCOUNTNO) from FACILITIES where BORROWER_ID='^' and CBS_ACCOUNTNO is not null) ) )) and F.FACILITY_APPNO=A.APP_NO and A.APP_STATUS in ('pa','ca') and A.APP_DELFLAG='N' and F.FAC_PROCESSDATE = (select max(FAC_PROCESSDATE) from FACILITIES where CBS_ACCOUNTNO=F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO) and F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO in (select distinct (CBS_ACCOUNTNO) from FACILITIES where BORROWER_ID IN (select perapp_oldid from perapplicant where perapp_id in (select com_compdtappid from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno in( select distinct F.FACILITY_APPNO AS FACILITY_APPNO from FACILITIES F, APPLICATIONS A where F.BORROWER_ID='^' and F.FACILITY_APPNO=A.APP_NO and A.APP_STATUS in ('pa','ca') and A.APP_DELFLAG='N' and F.FAC_PROCESSDATE = (select max(FAC_PROCESSDATE) from FACILITIES where CBS_ACCOUNTNO=F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO) and F.CBS_ACCOUNTNO in (select distinct (CBS_ACCOUNTNO) from FACILITIES where BORROWER_ID='^' and CBS_ACCOUNTNO is not null) ) )) and CBS_ACCOUNTNO is not null)
select demo_appno as applicationno from per_demographics demo, applications app where demo.demo_appid IN ( select perapp_oldid from perapplicant where perapp_id in (select com_compdtappid from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno in( select applicationno from ( select demo_appno as applicationno from per_demographics demo, applications app where demo.demo_appid='^' and demo_type='a' and app.app_no=demo.demo_appno and app.APP_STATUS in ('pa','ca') and app.APP_DELFLAG='N' and app.app_no not in(select APPREN_APPOLDID from app_renewal)
union
select app_no as applicationno from applications ap where CBS_ACCOUNTNO in ( select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from per_demographics demo, applications app where demo.demo_appid='^' and demo_type='a' and app.app_no=demo.demo_appno and app.APP_STATUS in ('pa','ca') and app.APP_DELFLAG='N' and app.app_no in(select APPREN_APPOLDID from app_renewal) )and app_processdate = (select max(app_processdate) from applications where CBS_ACCOUNTNO = ap.CBS_ACCOUNTNO) ) ) ) )
select count(*)as rowcount from COM_CASHFLOW where COM_CF_APPNO='^' and COM_CF_FINYEAR='^'
select distinct(CCBM_YEAR) as CCBM_YEAR from COM_CASHBUDGETMETHOD where CCBM_APPNO='^' order by CCBM_YEAR
insert into per_otherbank(perbank_id,perbank_oldid,perbank_sno,perbank_type,perbank_facility,perbank_osasondate,perbank_inttype, perbank_bnktype,perbank_duedate,perbank_arrears,perbank_bnkname,perbank_fundtype,perbank_limit,perbank_os,perbank_spread, perbank_remarks,perbank_monthly_ins,perbank_intrate,per_repaymenttype,per_drawingpower,perbank_leaderbank,PERBANK_LOANPURPOSE, PERBANK_SECDESCRIP,PERBANK_SECVALUE,PERBANK_NATURELITIGATION,PERBANK_DATELITIGATION,PERBANK_CLAIMAMOUNT,PERBANK_OTHERCLAIMS,PERBANK_PRESENTPOS,PERBANK_LITIGATIONS,perbank_startdate) values (?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))
update per_otherbank set perbank_type=?,perbank_facility=?, perbank_osasondate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), perbank_inttype=?, perbank_bnktype=?, perbank_duedate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), perbank_arrears=?, perbank_bnkname=?, perbank_fundtype=?, perbank_limit=?, perbank_os=?, perbank_spread=?, perbank_remarks=?, perbank_monthly_ins=?,perbank_intrate=?,per_repaymenttype=?,per_drawingpower=?,perbank_leaderbank=?,PERBANK_LOANPURPOSE=?, PERBANK_SECDESCRIP=?,PERBANK_SECVALUE=?,PERBANK_NATURELITIGATION=?,PERBANK_DATELITIGATION=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),PERBANK_CLAIMAMOUNT=?,PERBANK_OTHERCLAIMS=?,PERBANK_PRESENTPOS=?,PERBANK_LITIGATIONS=?,perbank_startdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where perbank_id=? and perbank_sno=?
update per_otherbank set PERBANK_DELETEFLAG=?,PERBANK_DELETEUSR_ID=?,PERBANK_DELETEDATE=sysdate where perbank_id=? and perbank_sno=?
select perbank_sno,perbank_type,perbank_facility,to_char(perbank_osasondate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as perbank_osasondate, perbank_inttype,perbank_bnktype,to_char(perbank_duedate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as perbank_duedate,perbank_arrears,perbank_bnkname,perbank_fundtype,perbank_limit,perbank_os,perbank_spread,perbank_remarks, perbank_monthly_ins,perbank_intrate,to_date(PERBANK_DUEDATE)-to_date(sysdate) as Days,per_drawingpower,per_repaymenttype,perbank_leaderbank,PERBANK_SECDESCRIP,PERBANK_SECVALUE, PERBANK_NATURELITIGATION,to_char(PERBANK_DATELITIGATION,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PERBANK_DATELITIGATION,PERBANK_CLAIMAMOUNT,PERBANK_OTHERCLAIMS, PERBANK_PRESENTPOS,PERBANK_LITIGATIONS,to_char(perbank_startdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perbank_startdate from per_otherbank where PERBANK_DELETEFLAG is null and PERBANK_OLDID = (select PERAPP_OLDID from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID = '^') order by perbank_sno
select NVL(max(perbank_sno),0) as maxid from per_otherbank where PERBANK_DELETEFLAG is null and perbank_id='^'
insert into per_otherbank(perbank_id,perbank_oldid,perbank_sno,perbank_type,perbank_facility, perbank_osasondate,perbank_inttype,perbank_bnktype,perbank_duedate,perbank_arrears, perbank_bnkname,perbank_fundtype,perbank_limit,perbank_os,perbank_spread, perbank_remarks,perbank_monthly_ins) select ?,perbank_oldid,perbank_sno,perbank_type,perbank_facility, perbank_osasondate,perbank_inttype,perbank_bnktype,perbank_duedate,perbank_arrears, perbank_bnkname,perbank_fundtype,perbank_limit,perbank_os,perbank_spread, perbank_remarks,perbank_monthly_ins from per_otherbank where perbank_id=?

select NVL(max(land_id),0) as maxid from agr_landholdings where LAND_APPID='^'
select com_facdesc,COM_RANGEFROM,COM_RANGETO,COM_FACILITY_EMISCHEME,COM_MINREPAYPERIOD,COM_MAXREPAYPERIOD,com_cashmargin,com_bankscheme from FACILITY_CORP where COM_HEADFAC='^' and COM_SUBFAC='^' and COM_FACID='^'
select distinct(p.prd_code) as prdcode, c.cat_name as category, c1.cat_name as subcategory, p.prd_rng_from as rangefrom, p.prd_rng_to as rangeto, p.prd_term as term,p.prd_minterm as minterm, p.nsc_loan as nsc_loan ,p1.prd_maxintclass as class, p.prd_type as prd_type, p.scheme_code,p.prd_desc,p.prd_loantype from prd_category c, prd_category c1, products p, prd_authority p1, prd_interest p2, prd_used where p1.prd_code=p.prd_code and p2.prd_code=p.prd_code and prd_used.prd_code=p.prd_code and prd_type like 'p%' and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') >= to_date(p.prd_eff_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ to_date(p.prd_validupto_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') and upper(prd_renew)='N' and Upper(prd_stop)!='Y' and Upper(prd_saveflag)='C' and p.prd_catid=c1.cat_id and c.cat_id=c1.cat_parent and p.PRD_TYPE='p^' order by c.cat_name
SELECT inward_createdon,to_char(inward_appliedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon,INWARD_DIGIAPPNO FROM appinwardreg where INWARD_NO='^'
select * from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_customerid='^' and app_sec_secid='^' and app_sec_loantype='^' order by app_sec_secid
select distinct(app_sec_secid) as app_sec_secid from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_customerid='^' order by app_sec_secid
Select ACT_SCHEME,ACT_DESC,ACT_AVAILABLE,ACT_RANGEFROM,ACT_RANGETO,ACT_SNO,ACT_YEARS,ACT_DESC2,ACT_AMT2,ACT_WHETHER2,ACT_SCHEME_SNO,ACT_SPECIFICATIONS,ACT_RANGEPER from activity_master where ACT_SCHEME in (^) and ACT_ACTION='E' order by ACT_SNO
Select ACT_SCHEME,ACT_DESC,ACT_AVAILABLE,ACT_RANGEFROM,ACT_RANGETO,ACT_SNO,ACT_YEARS,ACT_DESC2,ACT_AMT2,ACT_WHETHER2,ACT_SCHEME_SNO,ACT_SPECIFICATIONS,ACT_RANGEPER from activity_master where ACT_DESC like '%^%' and ACT_SCHEME in (^) and ACT_ACTION='E'
insert into app_securitydetails (APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE, APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN,APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_EXISTING) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
Select Count(distinct(app_sec_secid)) as SecCount from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_customerid='^'
select sd.STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facdisplaydesc,com_facdesc,FACILITY_REPAYTYPE,COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE,FACILITY_INTEREST,FACILITY_SANCAMT,FACILITY_SNO,FACILITY_MONTHS,BPLR, COM_AGRSCHEMETYPE,FACILITY_PROPOSED,FACILITY_SANCINTEREST,FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD,FACILITY_INTERESTREC from FACILITIES f,FACILITY_CORP c,static_data sd where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_GROUP='0' and sd.STAT_DATA_DESC=f.facility_displaydesc and sd.STAT_DATA_ID='180' and f.FACILITY_CODE=c.COM_FACID order by facility_sno
insert into set_corpcollateralsecurity (scol_FACCODE,scol_FACID,scol_FacSno,scol_RANGE_FROM,scol_RANGE_TO,scol_PERCENT)values(?,?,?,?,?,?)

select count(*) as cnt from set_corpcollateralsecurity where scol_FACCODE='^' and scol_FACID='^' and ((^ between scol_RANGE_FROM and scol_RANGE_TO) or (^ between scol_RANGE_FROM and scol_RANGE_TO) or (scol_RANGE_FROM between ^ and ^) or (scol_RANGE_TO between ^ and ^))
select scol_FACCODE,scol_FACID,scol_FacSno,scol_RANGE_FROM,scol_RANGE_TO,scol_PERCENT from set_corpcollateralsecurity where scol_FACCODE='^' and scol_FACID='^'and scol_FacSno='^'
select scol_FACCODE,scol_FACID,scol_FacSno,scol_RANGE_FROM,scol_RANGE_TO,scol_PERCENT from set_corpcollateralsecurity where scol_FACCODE='^' and scol_FACID='^'
delete from COM_INLANDASSESSMENT where COM_IA_APPNO=?
insert into COM_INLANDASSESSMENT (COM_IA_APPNO,COM_IA_SNO,COM_IA_YEAR,COM_IA_SALES,COM_IA_PURCHASES,COM_IA_PROJPURCHASES,COM_IA_AVGMONPURCHASES, COM_IA_CREDITPERIOD,COM_IA_TRANSITPERIOD,COM_IA_LCREQUIRED,COM_IA_APPLIEDLIMIT,COM_IA_RECOMMLIMIT) values(?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select COM_IA_APPNO,COM_IA_SNO,to_char(COM_IA_YEAR,'DD/MM/YYYY')as COM_IA_YEAR,COM_IA_SALES,COM_IA_PURCHASES,COM_IA_PROJPURCHASES,COM_IA_AVGMONPURCHASES, COM_IA_CREDITPERIOD,COM_IA_TRANSITPERIOD,COM_IA_LCREQUIRED,COM_IA_APPLIEDLIMIT,COM_IA_RECOMMLIMIT from COM_INLANDASSESSMENT where COM_IA_APPNO='^'
select perbank_sno,perbank_type,perbank_facility,to_char(perbank_osasondate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as perbank_osasondate, perbank_inttype,perbank_bnktype,to_char(perbank_duedate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as perbank_duedate,perbank_arrears,perbank_bnkname,perbank_fundtype,perbank_limit,perbank_os,perbank_spread,perbank_remarks, perbank_monthly_ins,PERBANK_LOANPURPOSE,perbank_intrate,to_date(PERBANK_DUEDATE)-to_date(sysdate) as Days,per_drawingpower,per_repaymenttype,perbank_leaderbank,perbank_id, PERBANK_SECDESCRIP,PERBANK_SECVALUE,PERBANK_NATURELITIGATION,to_char(PERBANK_DATELITIGATION,'DD/MM/YYYY') as PERBANK_DATELITIGATION,PERBANK_CLAIMAMOUNT,PERBANK_OTHERCLAIMS,PERBANK_PRESENTPOS,PERBANK_LITIGATIONS, to_char(perbank_startdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perbank_startdate from per_otherbank where PERBANK_DELETEFLAG is null and PERBANK_OLDID='^' order by perbank_sno
select perapp_oldid from perapplicant where PERAPP_ID='^'
select cus_sec_id,cus_sec_totalsecvalue, (select max(APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE) from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_SECID=cus_sec_id and APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='P') as cus_sec_netsecurity, TO_CHAR(CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION,CUS_SEC_TYPE,replace(CUS_SEC_CERSAI_ID,'@',',') as CERSAIID from cus_securities where cus_sec_id in (select distinct(app_sec_secid) from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' ^ and app_sec_securitytype='2') order by cus_sec_id
select cus_sec_id,cus_sec_totalsecvalue, (select max(APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE) from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_SECID=cus_sec_id and APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='E') as cus_sec_netsecurity, TO_CHAR(CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION,CUS_SEC_TYPE,replace(CUS_SEC_CERSAI_ID,'@',',') as CERSAIID from cus_securities where cus_sec_id in (select distinct(app_sec_secid) from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_SECUTYPE='^' ^ and app_sec_securitytype='2') order by cus_sec_id
select app_sec_securitytype,CUS_SEC_ID ,CUS_SEC_TOTALSECVALUE, CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY ,CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE, CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION, CUS_SEC_TYPE ,replace(CUS_SEC_CERSAI_ID,'@',',') as CERSAIID,SEC_CERSAIREFNO, SEC_SEARCHPERFORM_DATE,SEC_ALREADY_MORTG,SEC_CHARG_REFLECT,SEC_OTHERBNK_REMARK,SEC_REMARK_NOT_REFLECT, SEC_PROP_OBSERVED,SEC_REMARKS from cus_securities,security_land ,APP_SECURITYDETAILS where cus_sec_id = SEC_ID and APP_SEC_SECID = CUS_SEC_ID and APP_SEC_APPNO = '^' and app_sec_securitytype='2' and APP_SEC_ATTACHED = 'A' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE = 'P'
select distinct(a.APP_SEC_SECID) as SECID,c.CUS_SEC_ID , c.CUS_SEC_TYPE ,replace(c.CUS_SEC_CERSAI_ID,'@',',') as CERSAIID,s.SEC_ALREADY_MORTG,s.SEC_CHARG_REFLECT,s.SEC_OTHERBNK_REMARK,s.SEC_REMARK_NOT_REFLECT, s.SEC_PROP_OBSERVED,s.SEC_REMARKS,replace(s.SEC_CERSAI_ID,'@',',') as SEC_CERSAI_ID,replace(s.SEC_CERSAIREFNO,'@',',') as SEC_CERSAIREFNO,replace(s.SEC_SEARCHPERFORM_DATE,'@',',') as SEC_SEARCHPERFORM_DATE,replace(s.SEC_CERSAI_DATE,'@',',') as SEC_CERSAI_DATE from cus_securities c,security_land s,APP_SECURITYDETAILS a where c.cus_sec_id = s.SEC_ID and a.APP_SEC_SECID = c.CUS_SEC_ID and a.APP_SEC_APPNO = '^' and a.APP_SEC_ATTACHED = 'A' and a.APP_SEC_LOANTYPE = 'P'
select APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,C.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,S.SEC_NAME,A.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,A.APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,A.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION as CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION,a.app_sec_margin from APP_SECURITYDETAILS A,CUS_SECURITIES C,SECURITY_MASTER S where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' and APP_SEC_ATTACHED='^' AND CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID AND S.SEC_ID=C.CUS_SEC_TYPE
select APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,C.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,S.SEC_NAME,A.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,A.APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,A.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION as CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION,a.app_sec_margin from APP_SECURITYDETAILS A,CUS_SECURITIES C,SECURITY_MASTER S where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' and APP_SEC_ATTACHED='^' AND APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' AND CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID AND S.SEC_ID=C.CUS_SEC_TYPE
select APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,C.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,S.SEC_NAME,A.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,A.APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,A.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION as CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION,a.app_sec_margin from APP_SECURITYDETAILS A,CUS_SECURITIES C,SECURITY_MASTER S where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' AND APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' AND CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID AND S.SEC_ID=C.CUS_SEC_TYPE
select APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,C.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,S.SEC_NAME,A.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,A.APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,A.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION as CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION,a.app_sec_margin from APP_SECURITYDETAILS_PS A,CUS_SECURITIES C,SECURITY_MASTER S where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' AND APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' AND CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID AND S.SEC_ID=C.CUS_SEC_TYPE and A.APP_SEC_PROPOSEDSNO='^' and A.APP_SEC_PROPOSEDAPPNO='^'
select APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,C.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,S.SEC_NAME,A.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,A.APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,A.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION as CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from APP_SECURITYDETAILS A,CUS_SECURITIES C,SECURITY_MASTER S where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' AND APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' AND CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID AND S.SEC_ID=C.CUS_SEC_TYPE ^
select APP_NO,APP_WHETHERRESTRUCTURE,APP_RESREASON from mis_appdetails where APP_NO='^'

insert into AGR_SHG_ASSESSMENT(ASA_APPNO,ASA_AMNTREQ,ASA_CORPUS,ASA_LOANAMNT)values(?,?,?,?)
delete from AGR_SHG_ASSESSMENT where ASA_APPNO=?
select ASA_APPNO,ASA_AMNTREQ,ASA_CORPUS,ASA_LOANAMNT from AGR_SHG_ASSESSMENT where ASA_APPNO='^'

Select AGR_DSS_EXTINSTALMENT,agr_dss_extintrest,AGR_DSS_LOANTYPE,AGR_DSS_EMITYPE,AGR_DSS_PROINSTALMENT,AGR_DSS_PROINTREST, AGR_DSS_INTAMT,AGR_DSS_INITINT,AGR_DSS_INTERESTTYPE from agr_dss_assessment where appno='^' and AGR_DSS_TYPE='^' and Agr_dss_sno='^' order by to_number(agr_dss_facsno) asc
select com_sno,to_char(com_finyear,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year from corp_fin_year where com_appno='^' and com_division='^' and (com_fintype='ESTIMATED' or com_fintype='PROJECTION') and COM_SNO in (select FINPRINTYEAR_SELSNO from FINANCIAL_PRINTYEAR where FINPRINTYEAR_APPNO=com_appno and finprintyear_pageid in ('ASSETS','LIABILITIES','PROFIT AND LOSS ACCOUNT')) order by com_sno
select com_sno,to_char(com_finyear,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year from corp_fin_year where com_appno='^' and com_division='^' and (com_fintype='AUDITED' or com_fintype='PROJECTION') and COM_SNO in (select FINPRINTYEAR_SELSNO from FINANCIAL_PRINTYEAR where FINPRINTYEAR_APPNO=com_appno and finprintyear_pageid in ('ASSETS','LIABILITIES','PROFIT AND LOSS ACCOUNT')) order by com_sno
select com_sno,to_char(com_finyear,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year from corp_fin_year where com_appno='^' and com_division='^' and (com_fintype='AUDITED') and COM_SNO in (select FINPRINTYEAR_SELSNO from FINANCIAL_PRINTYEAR where FINPRINTYEAR_APPNO=com_appno and finprintyear_pageid in ('ASSETS','LIABILITIES','PROFIT AND LOSS ACCOUNT')) order by com_sno
select com_sno,to_char(com_finyear,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fin_year from corp_fin_year where com_appno='^' and com_division='^' and COM_SNO in (select FINPRINTYEAR_SELSNO from FINANCIAL_PRINTYEAR where FINPRINTYEAR_APPNO=com_appno and finprintyear_pageid in ('ASSETS','LIABILITIES','PROFIT AND LOSS ACCOUNT')) order by com_sno
select combk_id, combk_facility, to_char(combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate, combk_bnktype, combk_inttype, combk_credittype, combk_sancrefno, to_char(combk_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_sancdate, to_char(combk_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_duedate, combk_arrears, combk_companyname, combk_bnk, combk_bnkname, combk_fundtype, combk_limit, combk_os, combk_spread, combk_remarks, combk_facility_sno,combk_modtype, combk_monthly_ins,combk_type,COMBK_CBSAPPNO,decode(COMBK_REPAYMENTTYPE,'1','E',COMBK_REPAYMENTTYPE) as COMBK_REPAYMENTTYPE,to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as date1,COMBK_INTERESTRATE, COMBK_DRAWINGPOWER,COMBK_PURPOSE,combk_prestatus,to_date(combk_duedate)-to_date(sysdate) as Days from com_banking where combk_appno='^' and COMBK_CREDITTYPE='E' order by combk_id
insert into COM_EXPOSURETOINDUSTRY(COM_APPNO,COM_ACTIVITY,COM_ADVANCEDATE,COM_PERCENTAGEGBCDATE,COM_ADVANCEAMOUNT,COM_GBCPERCENTAGE, COM_NPAAMOUNT,COM_NPAGBCPERCENTAGE,COM_GBCDATE,COM_GBCAMOUNT,COM_CALBASE) values(?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?)
Delete from COM_EXPOSURETOINDUSTRY where COM_APPNO=?
Select COM_ACTIVITY,to_char(COM_ADVANCEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_ADVANCEDATE, to_char(COM_PERCENTAGEGBCDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_PERCENTAGEGBCDATE,COM_ADVANCEAMOUNT, COM_GBCPERCENTAGE,COM_NPAAMOUNT,COM_NPAGBCPERCENTAGE, to_char(COM_GBCDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_GBCDATE,COM_GBCAMOUNT,COM_CALBASE from COM_EXPOSURETOINDUSTRY where COM_APPNO='^'
select sum(FIN_AUDIT)+sum(FIN_UNAUDIT)+sum(FIN_ESTIMATED)+sum(FIN_PROJECTION) as liabsum from com_finappvalues where FIN_APPNO='^' and FIN_ROWID='^'
select sum(FIN_AUDIT)+sum(FIN_UNAUDIT)+sum(FIN_ESTIMATED)+sum(FIN_PROJECTION) as assetsum from com_finappvalues where FIN_APPNO='^' and FIN_ROWID='^'
select NVL(max(COM_SHP_SNO),0)+1 as COM_SHP_SNO from COM_SHAREHOLDPATTERN where COM_SHP_APPNO='^'
insert into COM_SHAREHOLDPATTERN(COM_SHP_APPNO,COM_SHP_SNO,COM_SHP_SHARESHELDBY,COM_SHP_NOFSHARES,COM_SHP_FACVALUE, COM_SHP_AMOUNT,COM_SHP_PERCENT,COM_SHAREHOLDERNAME) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update COM_SHAREHOLDPATTERN set COM_SHP_SHARESHELDBY=?,COM_SHP_NOFSHARES=?,COM_SHP_FACVALUE=?, COM_SHP_AMOUNT=?,COM_SHP_PERCENT=?,COM_SHAREHOLDERNAME=? where COM_SHP_APPNO=? and COM_SHP_SNO=?
update COM_SHAREHOLDPATTERN set COM_SHP_MRKTVALOFSHARES=? where COM_SHP_APPNO=?
update COM_SHAREHOLDPATTERN set COM_SHP_PERCENT=? where COM_SHP_APPNO=? and COM_SHP_SNO=?
delete from COM_SHAREHOLDPATTERN where COM_SHP_APPNO=? and COM_SHP_SNO=?
select COM_SHP_APPNO,COM_SHP_SNO,COM_SHP_SHARESHELDBY,COM_SHP_NOFSHARES,COM_SHP_FACVALUE, COM_SHP_AMOUNT,COM_SHP_PERCENT,COM_SHP_MRKTVALOFSHARES,COM_SHAREHOLDERNAME from COM_SHAREHOLDPATTERN where COM_SHP_APPNO='^' order by COM_SHP_SNO
select sum(COM_SHP_NOFSHARES) as COM_SHP_NOFSHARES from COM_SHAREHOLDPATTERN where COM_SHP_APPNO='^'
select COM_SHP_NOFSHARES from COM_SHAREHOLDPATTERN where COM_SHP_APPNO='^' and COM_SHP_SNO='^'
select to_char(COM_FROMDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_FROMDATE ,to_char(COM_TODATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_TODATE from COM_OTHERCOMMENTS where COM_APPNO='^' and COM_SNO='^'
select FIN_ROWID,FIN_CMA_NO from com_finmaster where fin_cma_no=(select fin_cmano from com_finance where fin_financeid='^') and FIN_TABNAME='^' AND FIN_ROWDESC='^' AND FIN_PAGE='FI'
select combk_facility,combk_limit,combk_os,combk_facility_sno,combk_type,combk_parentappno,combk_parentfacsno, combk_accountopen,combk_prefix,combk_suffix,combk_cbsappno,combk_modtype,combk_type from com_banking where combk_appno='^' and (COMBK_CBSAPPNO is not null or (decode(COMBK_PREFIX,'0','',COMBK_PREFIX) is not null and decode(COMBK_SUFFIX,'0','',COMBK_SUFFIX) is not null)) order by combk_parentappno
select comgc_facility,comgc_limit,comgc_os,comgc_facility_sno,comgc_type,comgc_parentappno,comgc_parentfacsno, comgc_accountopen,comgc_cbsappno,comgc_prefix,comgc_suffix,comgc_modtype,comgc_type from com_groupconcerns where comgc_appno='^' and (COMGC_CBSAPPNO is not null or (decode(comgc_prefix,'0','',comgc_prefix) is not null and decode(comgc_suffix,'0','',comgc_suffix) is not null)) order by comgc_parentappno
select combk_facility,combk_limit,combk_os,combk_facility_sno,combk_type,combk_parentappno,combk_parentfacsno, combk_accountopen,combk_prefix,combk_suffix,combk_cbsappno,combk_modtype,combk_factype from com_banking where combk_appno='^' and combk_credittype='E' order by combk_parentappno
select comgc_facility,comgc_limit,comgc_os,comgc_facility_sno,comgc_type,comgc_parentappno,comgc_parentfacsno, comgc_accountopen,comgc_cbsappno,comgc_prefix,comgc_suffix,comgc_modtype,comgc_factype from com_groupconcerns where comgc_appno='^' order by comgc_parentappno
select f.facility_code,fc.com_facid,fc.com_facdesc,f.facility_sno,f.FACILITY_PROPOSED,FC.COM_FACILITY_EMISCHEME,f.FACILITY_MONTHS from facility_corp fc,facilities f where f.facility_appno='^' and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code and FACILITY_GROUP='0' and nvl(f.FACILITY_SANCSTATUS,'A')='A' order by facility_sno
select f.facility_code,fc.com_facid,fc.com_facdesc,f.facility_sno,f.FACILITY_PROPOSED,FC.COM_FACILITY_EMISCHEME,f.FACILITY_MONTHS,COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE,(case when FACILITY_SANCSTATUS is null then facility_proposed else facility_sancamt end) as facility_sanctioned,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_desc from facility_corp fc,facilities f left join static_data on STAT_DATA_DESC=FACILITY_DISPLAYDESC and STAT_DATA_ID='180',com_comments c where f.facility_appno='^' and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code and FACILITY_GROUP='0' and nvl(f.FACILITY_SANCSTATUS,'A')='A' and (COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE='DL' or COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE='TL') and c.com_appno=f.facility_appno and C.Com_Sno=f.facility_sno and c.com_page='BreifDetaisTL' and com_projectloan='y' order by facility_sno
select f.FACILITY_CODE,fc.COM_BANKSCHEME from FACILITIES f ,FACILITY_CORP fc where f.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and f.FACILITY_SNO='^' and f.FACILITY_CODE=fc.COM_FACID
select to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob,i.indinfo_dependents_child ,i.indinfo_dependents_others, p.perapp_employment,F.FACILITY_PROPOSED,f.FACILITY_INTEREST,NVL(FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'),TO_DATE(to_char(p.PERAPP_BANKSINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))),0) AS MONTHS, f.FACILITY_MONTHS,p.perapp_sex,d.con_comzip,p.perapp_constitution,p.perapp_marstat,F.FACILITY_REPAYTYPE AS FACILITY_REPAYTYPE,f.FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD,f.facility_sancamt,f.facility_sancinterest from PERAPPLICANT p,COM_DEMOGRAPHICS c,INDIVIDUAL_INFO i,FACILITIES F,CUST_CONTACTINFO d where c.DEMO_APPNO='^' and c.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=p.PERAPP_ID and i.INDINFO_APPID=c.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID AND F.FACILITY_APPNO=C.DEMO_APPNO AND F.FACILITY_SNO='^' and d.CON_APPID=c.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID
select COM_COMPDTTYPE from com_companydetails where COM_COMPDTAPPNO='^'
select rsk_rule_id,rsk_rule_desc,rsk_rule_params from RSK_PARAM_RULE where RSK_RULE_RATFOR='C' order by RSK_RULE_ID
select f.FACILITY_CODE as FACILITY_CODE,fc.COM_FACNATURE as COM_FACNATURE from FACILITIES f,FACILITY_CORP fc where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^' and f.FACILITY_CODE=FC.COM_FACID
select NVL(max(COM_NOS_SNO),0)+1 as COM_NOS_SNO from COM_NATUREOFSHARES where COM_NOS_APPNO='^'
insert into COM_NATUREOFSHARES(COM_NOS_APPNO,COM_NOS_SNO,COM_NOS_NATURESHAR,COM_NOS_AUTHSHAR,COM_NOS_AUTHVALUE,COM_NOS_ISSUSHAR,COM_NOS_ISSUVALUE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update COM_NATUREOFSHARES set COM_NOS_NATURESHAR=?,COM_NOS_AUTHSHAR=?,COM_NOS_AUTHVALUE=?, COM_NOS_ISSUSHAR=?,COM_NOS_ISSUVALUE=? where COM_NOS_APPNO=? and COM_NOS_SNO=?
delete from COM_NATUREOFSHARES where COM_NOS_APPNO=? and COM_NOS_SNO=?
select COM_NOS_APPNO,COM_NOS_SNO,COM_NOS_NATURESHAR,COM_NOS_AUTHSHAR,COM_NOS_AUTHVALUE,COM_NOS_ISSUSHAR,COM_NOS_ISSUVALUE from COM_NATUREOFSHARES where COM_NOS_APPNO='^' order by COM_NOS_SNO
select facility_group,facility_sancstatus,facility_months,facility_proposed,facility_sancamt,facility_status,to_char(facility_mclr_reldate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_mclr_reldate,facility_doc_branchcode from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_sno='^'
update facilities set facility_sancstatus=? where facility_appno=? and facility_group=?
delete from com_fingrpconcerncompare where fingrpconcern_appno=? and fingrpconcern_pagename='Fingrpconcern' and fingrpconcern_comname=?
delete from com_finangrpconcernsfreetxt where com_appno=? and com_companyname=?
insert into com_finangrpconcernsfreetxt(com_appno,com_freetext1,com_freetext2,com_freetext3,com_companyname,com_freetext4)values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
insert into com_fingrpconcerncompare(fingrpconcern_appno,fingrpconcern_sno,fingrpconcern_pagename,fingrpconcern_comname,fingrpconcern_year,fingrpconcern_fintype, fingrpconcern_grosssales,fingrpconcern_netsales,fingrpconcern_netprofit,fingrpconcern_capital,fingrpconcern_tangnetworth, fingrpconcern_networkcap,fingrpconcern_toltnw,fingrpconcern_currratio,fingrpconcern_estproturn,fingrpconcern_totcapital, fingrpconcern_seccoverinclude,fingrpconcern_seccoverexclude,fingrpconcern_lastcredit,fingrpconcern_freetext1, fingrpconcern_freetext2,fingrpconcern_freetext3,FINGRPCONCERN_FREETEXT4) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select com_freetext1,com_freetext2,com_freetext3,COM_FREETEXT4 from com_finangrpconcernsfreetxt where com_appno='^' and com_companyname='^'
select fingrpconcern_appno,fingrpconcern_sno,fingrpconcern_pagename,fingrpconcern_comname,fingrpconcern_year,fingrpconcern_fintype, fingrpconcern_grosssales,fingrpconcern_netsales,fingrpconcern_netprofit,fingrpconcern_capital,fingrpconcern_tangnetworth, fingrpconcern_networkcap,fingrpconcern_toltnw,fingrpconcern_currratio,fingrpconcern_estproturn,fingrpconcern_totcapital, fingrpconcern_seccoverinclude,fingrpconcern_seccoverexclude,fingrpconcern_lastcredit,fingrpconcern_freetext1, fingrpconcern_freetext2,fingrpconcern_freetext3,FINGRPCONCERN_FREETEXT4 from com_fingrpconcerncompare where fingrpconcern_appno='^' and fingrpconcern_comname='^' order by FINGRPCONCERN_YEAR
insert into com_comments (com_appno,com_sno,com_comments,com_page,com_date,com_projectloan,com_daccodate) values (?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))
select * from mis_appdetails where APP_NO='^'
delete from app_securitydetails where app_sec_loantype=? and app_sec_secid=? and app_sec_appno=?
delete from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno=? and app_sec_secid=? and app_sec_loantype=? and APP_SEC_SECUTYPE in (?)
update APP_SECURITYDETAILS set APP_SEC_ATTACHED='D' where app_proposal_type=? and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE=? and APP_SEC_SECID=? and APP_SEC_APPNO=?
delete from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno=? and app_sec_applicant=?
insert into APP_SECURITYDETAILS(APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE, APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN,APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL, APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP,APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_FREEZE,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE,APP_SEC_MODULETYPE,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG, APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_PROPOSAL_TYPE,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT) select ?,APP_SEC_SECID,(select APP_PRDCODE from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=?),APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE, APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN,APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL, APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP,APP_SEC_EXISTING,null,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE,APP_SEC_MODULETYPE,'D',APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG,APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO, APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_PROPOSAL_TYPE,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT from APP_POST_SANCTION,APP_SECURITYDETAILS sec where PS_OLD_APP_NO=APP_SEC_APPNO and APP_SEC_SECID not in (select APP_SEC_SECID from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_APPNO=?) and PS_APP_NO=?
update cus_constbanking set cus_factype=?,cus_facname=?,cus_typecredit=?,cus_bank=?,cus_bnkarrn=? where cus_appno=? and cus_sno=?
select cus_factype,cus_facname,cus_typecredit,cus_bank,cus_bnkarrn,cus_leadbank,cus_existing,cus_proposed,cus_sno from cus_constbanking where cus_appno='^' order by cus_sno
insert into cus_constbanking (cus_factype,cus_facname,cus_typecredit,cus_bank,cus_bnkarrn,cus_leadbank,cus_existing,cus_proposed,cus_appno,cus_sno ) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update cus_constbanking set cus_deleteflag=? where cus_appno=? and cus_sno=?
delete from cus_constbanking where cus_appno=? and cus_sno=?
select NVL(max(com_sno),0)+1 as com_sno from com_consortmultiple where com_appno='^'
select cus_factype,cus_facname,cus_typecredit,cus_bank,cus_bnkarrn,cus_leadbank,cus_existing,cus_proposed,cus_sno from cus_constbanking where cus_appno='^' and cus_sno='^' order by cus_sno
select count(distinct(com_cf_finyear)) as yr_count from com_cashflow where com_cf_appno='^'
select com_cf_appno,com_cf_sno,com_cf_year,com_cf_openingbal,com_cf_promoterequity,com_cf_bankfinance,com_cf_unsecloan, com_cf_saleproceeds,com_cf_sof_total,com_cf_costofland,com_cf_premiumfsi,com_cf_constructcost,com_cf_marketexpenses,com_cf_adminexpenses, com_cf_interest,com_cf_repayment,com_cf_provisiontax,com_cf_appfin_total,com_cf_closingbalance,com_cf_finyear,com_cf_other,com_cf_otherfin from com_cashflow where com_cf_appno='^' and com_cf_sno='^'
select perapp_id,perapp_cbsid,perapp_title,perapp_fname,perapp_lname,perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob,con_comaddr1,con_permaddr1,PERAPP_SEX, con_comaddr2,con_permaddr2,con_comcity,con_permcity,con_comstate,con_permstate,con_comzip,con_permzip,con_comphone as con_permphone,con_email as con_peremail,perapp_constitution, con_permdist,con_comdist,con_mobile,PERAPP_NETWORTH,con_comcountry,con_permcountry,con_comphone1,PERAPP_OLDID,INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,PERAPP_FATNAME,PERAPP_AADHAAR,PERAPP_MARSTAT from perapplicant,cust_contactinfo,individual_info where ^ (perapp_renew is null or perapp_renew='n') and perapp_id=con_appid and indinfo_appid=con_appid and perapp_id=indinfo_appid and upper(perapp_fname) like upper('%^%')
select perapp_id,perapp_cbsid,perapp_title,perapp_fname,perapp_lname,perapp_panno,to_char(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob,con_comaddr1,con_permaddr1,PERAPP_SEX, con_comaddr2,con_permaddr2,con_comcity,con_permcity,con_comstate,con_permstate,con_comzip,con_permzip,con_comphone as con_permphone,con_email as con_peremail, perapp_constitution,con_permdist,con_comdist,con_mobile,PERAPP_NETWORTH,con_comcountry,con_permcountry,con_comphone1,PERAPP_OLDID, INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS,PERAPP_FATNAME,PERAPP_AADHAAR,PERAPP_MARSTAT from perapplicant,cust_contactinfo,individual_info where ^ (perapp_renew is null or perapp_renew='n') and perapp_id=con_appid and indinfo_appid=con_appid and perapp_id=indinfo_appid and PERAPP_CBSID='^'
select F.FACILITY_SNO as term_sno,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as term_desc,f.facility_proposed,f.facility_sanctioned,f.facility_sancamt From FACILITY_CORP FC , FACILITY_MASTER FM , FACILITIES F,static_data sd where STAT_DATA_DESC=f.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and F.FACILITY_CODE=FC.COM_FACID and FC.COM_HEADFAC=FM.FACILITY_CATID and FM.FACILITY_NATURE='2' and FM.FACILITY_FOR='F' and F.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and (f.facility_sancstatus='A' or f.facility_sancstatus is null)
select F.FACILITY_SNO as term_sno,FC.COM_FACDESC as term_desc,f.facility_proposed,f.facility_sanctioned,f.facility_sancamt From FACILITY_CORP FC , FACILITY_MASTER FM , FACILITIES F where F.FACILITY_CODE=FC.COM_FACID and FC.COM_HEADFAC=FM.FACILITY_CATID and FM.FACILITY_NATURE='2' and FM.FACILITY_FOR='F' and F.FACILITY_APPNO='^' order by term_sno
select app_sec_secid,(SELECT SEC_NAME from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CUS_SEC_TYPE) AS SEC_NAME,(SELECT SEC_NAME from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION) AS SEC_CLASSIFICATION, cus_sec_netsecurity from app_securitydetails,CUS_SECURITIES where app_sec_appno='^' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and app_sec_loantype='^' and app_sec_parentappno='^' and APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID order by app_sec_secid
select max(com_cf_unitno) as unitno from com_cashflow where com_cf_appno='^'
select max(com_cf_sno)as maxsno from com_cashflow where com_cf_appno='^' and com_cf_unitno ='^'
select com_cf_closingbalance from com_cashflow where com_cf_appno='^' and com_cf_sno='^' and com_cf_unitno='^'
select NVL(max(com_cf_unitno),0)+1 as com_cf_unitno from com_cashflow where com_cf_appno='^'
select max(perapp_id) as max_appid from perapplicant where perapp_oldid='^'
select a.APP_SEC_SECID,a.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,c.CUS_SEC_TYPE,s.SEC_NAME, to_char(c.CUS_SEC_COLLATERAL_START_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as CUS_SEC_COLLATERAL_START_DATE, to_char(c.CUS_SEC_COLLATERAL_END_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_SEC_COLLATERAL_END_DATE,C.CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,a.APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,c.CUS_SEC_INSURED_AMOUNT from app_securitydetails a,CUS_SECURITIES c,SECURITY_MASTER s where a.APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and a.APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and upper(a.APP_SEC_SHOW)='Y' and (a.APP_SEC_ATTACHED is null or upper(a.APP_SEC_ATTACHED)='A') and upper(a.APP_SEC_LOANTYPE)='P' and c.CUS_SEC_ID=a.APP_SEC_SECID and c.CUS_SEC_TYPE=s.SEC_ID
update APPLICATIONS set app_freeze_flag=? where APP_NO=?
select COM_APPNO,COM_DESC, to_char(COM_COMMENCEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as COM_COMMENCEDATE, to_char(COM_COMPLETIONDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as COM_COMPLETIONDATE,COM_STATUS,COM_SNO,COM_FACILITIES from com_implementationschedule where COM_APPNO='^' and COM_FACILITIES='^'
select ccbm_srpls_dfct from COM_CASHBUDGETMETHOD where ccbm_appno='^' and ccbm_sno not in ('0','13')
select STAT_DATA_DESC1 from STATIC_DATA where STAT_DATA_ID='146' and STAT_DATA_DESC ='^'
select distinct(com_cf_unitno) as unit_no from com_cashflow where com_cf_appno='^'
select APP_SEC_SECID,c.CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY as CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,CUS_SECURITIES c where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and upper(APP_SEC_LOANTYPE)='P' and APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE='^' and upper(APP_SEC_SHOW)='Y' and (APP_SEC_ATTACHED is null or upper(APP_SEC_ATTACHED)='A') and APP_SEC_SECID=c.CUS_SEC_ID
select f.FACILITY_CODE as FACILITY_CODE,fc.COM_FACCODE as COM_FACCODE,fc.COM_BANKSCHEME from FACILITIES f,FACILITY_CORP fc where f.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and f.FACILITY_GROUP='0' and f.FACILITY_CODE=fc.COM_FACID
select comapp_div_appid from comapp_company_divisions where COMAPP_ID=(select DEMO_COMAPPNEWID from com_demographics where demo_appno = '^' and demo_apptype='N') union Select distinct(to_char(com_compdtappid)) as comapp_div_appid from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno='^' and com_compdtfname!='gen'
select com_sector,com_format,com_amountvalue from com_briefbackground where com_appno='^'
select f.facility_sno as term_sno,stat_data_desc1 as term_desc,f.facility_proposed,sd.STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc,f.facility_sancamt,fc.com_headfac from facility_corp fc , facilities f,static_data sd where STAT_DATA_DESC=f.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and f.facility_code=fc.com_facid and f.facility_intsubtype not in ('MCLR','BR') and f.facility_appno='^' and (f.facility_sancstatus='A' or f.facility_sancstatus is null)
select f.facility_sno as term_sno,fc.com_facdesc as term_desc,f.facility_proposed,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc,f.facility_sancamt,fc.com_headfac from facility_corp fc , facilities f,static_data sd where f.facility_code=fc.com_facid and f.facility_intsubtype not in ('MCLR','BR','SMTB','TYGS') and f.facility_appno='^' and STAT_DATA_DESC=f.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and f.FACILITY_TYPEFOR not in('P')
select f.facility_sno as term_sno,fc.com_facdesc as term_desc,f.facility_proposed,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc,f.facility_sancamt,fc.com_headfac from facility_corp fc , facilities f,static_data sd where f.facility_code=fc.com_facid and f.facility_intsubtype in ('MCLEC') and f.facility_appno='^' and STAT_DATA_DESC=f.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180'
delete com_comments where com_appno=? and com_page=? and com_sno=?
insert into com_comments(com_appno,com_sno,com_comments,com_page) values(?,?,?,?)
select com_comments,com_sno from com_comments where com_page='^' and com_sno='^' and com_appno='^'
select * from corp_fin_year where com_appno='^' and com_fintype='PROJECTION'
insert into set_ratingCodes(rating_sno,rating_code,RATING_DESC) values(?,?,?)
select nvl(max(rating_sno),0)+1 as maxno from set_ratingcodes
update set_ratingCodes set rating_code=?,rating_desc=? where rating_sno=?
delete from set_ratingCodes where rating_sno=?
select rating_sno,rating_code,RATING_DESC from set_ratingCodes order by rating_sno
select b.facility_proposed,fc.com_facdesc,a.facility_for,b.facility_existing,b.bplr as facility_interest,b.facility_sno,b.facility_group, b.facility_months,b.facility_modeofrepay,b.facility_margin,b.facility_holidayperiod,b.facility_repaytype, b.facility_sel_type ,b.facility_intsubtype,b.facility_baserate,b.facility_sancinterest,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc from facility_master a,facilities b ,facility_corp fc,static_data sd where STAT_DATA_DESC=b.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and fc.com_facid=b.facility_code and a.facility_parent='0' and b.facility_appno ='^' and fc.com_module='^' and facility_nature='1' and facility_for='F' order by decode(b.facility_headid,'4',1,'5',2,'3', 3,'2',4,'6',5,'7',6,'1',7)
select fin_rowid,sum(fin_audit+fin_unaudit+fin_estimated+fin_projection) as txtval from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id='^' and to_char(fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') and fin_sno='^' group by fin_year,fin_rowid

delete from com_multiplebanking where com_appno=? and com_sno=? and com_cons_sno=?

Select distinct APP_SEC_SECID,'C' as Type,CUS_SEC_TYPE,CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY from app_securitydetails,CUS_SECURITIES where APP_SEC_SECID in (Select APP_SEC_SECID from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^') and APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID not in ('^') and CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID and app_sec_appno='^' ^
Select distinct APP_SEC_SECID,'E' as Type,CUS_SEC_TYPE,CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY from app_securitydetails,CUS_SECURITIES where app_sec_appno='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' ^

Select Sum(Com_Fb) As FbSum,Sum(Com_Nfb) As NfbSum,Sum(Com_Tot) As ExistSum, sum(Com_Pro_Fb) as ProFbSum, sum(Com_Pro_Nfb) as ProNfbSum, sum(Com_Pro_Tot) as ProSum from Com_Multiplebanking where Com_Appno='^' and com_cons_sno='^' Group By Com_Appno
Update Com_Multiplebanking Set Com_Fb_Expo=?,Com_Nfb_Expo=?,Com_Tot_Expo=?,Com_Pro_Fb_Expo=?,Com_Pro_Nfb_Expo=?,Com_Pro_Tot_Expo=? where Com_Appno=? and Com_Sno=? and com_cons_sno=?
select b.facility_proposed,fc.com_facdesc,a.facility_for,b.facility_existing,b.bplr as facility_interest,b.facility_sno,b.facility_group, b.facility_months,b.facility_modeofrepay,b.facility_margin,b.facility_holidayperiod,b.facility_repaytype, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=facility_headid and facility_parent=0) as facheaddesc, b.facility_sel_type ,b.facility_intsubtype,b.facility_baserate,b.facility_sancinterest,b.facility_facnature,to_char(facility_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_duedate,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc,b.facility_sancamt ,fc.com_headfac,b.facility_purpose,b.facility_inttype,facility_category,facility_adhocfac,fac_metlifepremiumamt,FAC_INS_COMPANY_NAME,FAC_PREMIUM_TENOR,FAC_PREMIUM_LOAN_AMOUNT,FAC_INS_ACCOUNT_NO,FAC_PREMIUM_AMOUNT,FAC_INS_FUNDED_COMPANY_NAME,fac_actualmargin,fac_actualrelaxed,fac_marginrelax from facility_master a,facilities b ,facility_corp fc,static_data where STAT_DATA_DESC=b.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and fc.com_facid=b.facility_code and a.facility_parent='0' and b.facility_appno =^ and fc.com_module='^' and b.facility_sancstatus='A' order by decode(b.facility_headid,'4',1,'5',2,'3', 3,'2',4,'6',5,'7',6,'1',7)
select cb.combk_limit,cb.combk_os,to_char(combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,cb.combk_type,cb.combk_sancrefno, to_char(cb.combk_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_sancdate,cb.combk_spread, cb.combk_os,to_char(cb.combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,to_char(cb.combk_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_duedate,cb.combk_arrears,cb.combk_facility,cb.combk_modtype, cb.combk_purpose,combk_interestrate,combk_inttype,combk_fac_grp,combk_factype,combk_remarks,CASE WHEN cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN (SELECT prd_desc FROM products WHERE prd_code = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) ELSE (SELECT case COM_HEADFAC when '1' then 'Forward contract' when '2' then 'Pre Shipment Credit' when '3' then 'Overdraft' when '4' then 'Term Loan' when '5' then 'Demand Loan' else com_facdesc end FROM facility_corp,facility_master WHERE COM_HEADFAC=facility_catid and com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS facility_displaydesc,combk_repaymentcmt from com_banking cb where combk_bnk='Our' and cb.combk_appno ='^' and combk_credittype='E' order by combk_credittype desc
select cb.combk_limit,cb.combk_os,to_char(combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,cb.combk_type,cb.combk_sancrefno, to_char(cb.combk_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_sancdate,cb.combk_spread, cb.combk_os,to_char(cb.combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,to_char(cb.combk_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_duedate,cb.combk_arrears,cb.combk_facility,cb.combk_modtype, cb.combk_purpose,combk_interestrate,combk_inttype,combk_fac_grp,combk_factype,combk_remarks,CASE WHEN cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN (SELECT prd_desc FROM products WHERE prd_code = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) ELSE (SELECT case COM_HEADFAC when '1' then 'Forward contract' when '2' then 'Pre Shipment Credit' when '3' then 'Overdraft' when '4' then 'Term Loan' when '5' then 'Demand Loan' else com_facdesc end FROM facility_corp,facility_master WHERE COM_HEADFAC=facility_catid and com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS facility_displaydesc,combk_repaymentcmt from com_banking cb where combk_bnk='Our' and cb.combk_appno ='^' and combk_credittype='E' union all
select cb.combk_limit,cb.combk_os,to_char(combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,cb.combk_type,cb.combk_sancrefno, to_char(cb.combk_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_sancdate,cb.combk_spread, cb.combk_os,to_char(cb.combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,to_char(cb.combk_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_duedate,cb.combk_arrears,cb.combk_facility,cb.combk_modtype, cb.combk_purpose,combk_interestrate,combk_inttype,combk_fac_grp,combk_factype,combk_remarks,CASE WHEN cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN (SELECT prd_desc FROM products WHERE prd_code = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) ELSE (SELECT case COM_HEADFAC when '1' then 'Forward contract' when '2' then 'Pre Shipment Credit' when '3' then 'Overdraft' when '4' then 'Term Loan' when '5' then 'Demand Loan' else com_facdesc end FROM facility_corp,facility_master WHERE COM_HEADFAC=facility_catid and com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS facility_displaydesc,combk_repaymentcmt from com_banking cb where combk_bnk='Our' and cb.combk_appno ='^' and combk_credittype='P' and combk_cbsappno is not null order by combk_credittype desc

Select distinct APP_SEC_SECID,CUS_SEC_TYPE,max(APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE) as CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID from app_securitydetails,CUS_SECURITIES where APP_SEC_SECID in ('^') and CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID and app_sec_appno='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' and app_sec_facgroup='M' group by APP_SEC_SECID, CUS_SEC_TYPE,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID

select APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,C.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,S.SEC_NAME,A.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,A.APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,A.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION as CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from APP_SECURITYDETAILS A,CUS_SECURITIES C,SECURITY_MASTER S where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' AND ^ and CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID AND S.SEC_ID=C.CUS_SEC_TYPE order by C.CUS_SEC_ID
select APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,C.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,S.SEC_NAME,A.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,A.APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,A.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION as CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from APP_SECURITYDETAILS A,CUS_SECURITIES C,SECURITY_MASTER S where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' AND APP_SEC_FACID='^' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' AND ^ and CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID AND S.SEC_ID=C.CUS_SEC_TYPE
select APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,C.CUS_SEC_ID,S.SEC_NAME,A.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,A.APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,A.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION as CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from APP_SECURITYDETAILS A,CUS_SECURITIES C,SECURITY_MASTER S where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' AND APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID='^' and CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID AND S.SEC_ID=C.CUS_SEC_TYPE
select APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,C.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,S.SEC_NAME,A.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,A.APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,A.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION as CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from APP_SECURITYDETAILS A,CUS_SECURITIES C,SECURITY_MASTER S where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_SECUTYPE='^' AND APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID='^' ^ and CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID AND S.SEC_ID=C.CUS_SEC_TYPE

select facility_headid, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=facility_headid and facility_parent=0) as facheaddesc, facility_id, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=facility_id and facility_parent!=0) as facdesc, borrower_id, to_char(facility_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as facility_date, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_difference, facility_margin, perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, facility_sno, facility_group, facility_desc, facility_category, facility_months, facility_for, facility_interest, facility_branchname, facility_application, BPLR, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, cbs_accountno, facility_intadjustment, facility_intremarks, to_char(facility_osason,'DD/MM/YYYY') as facility_osason, facility_existbanktype, facility_propbanktype, facility_purpose,facility_sancinterest, facility_sancstatus,facility_sancamt,facility_inttype,facility_govtsponschem,facility_schemetype,facility_sponsagency,facility_subsidytype, facility_subsidyamunt,facility_repaytype,a.facility_code,facility_details,facility_agrschemetype,FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD,FACILITY_INTERESTREC, FACILITY_INTERESTCHARGED,FACILITY_MODEOFREPAY,FACILITY_OPERATIONACCNO,facility_remarks,FACILITY_LEADERBANK, FACILITY_PERINSTALL,FACILITY_INTSUBTYPE,FACILITY_INTINDEXID,FACILITY_BASERATE, FACILITY_FACNATURE,facility_TUF,FACILITY_AGENCY,facility_sel_type, facility_freshlimit,FACILITY_TYPEFOR,to_char(fac_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as fac_processdate,fac_restr_scheme,facility_oldappno,facility_oldappsno,facility_renewaljustif from FACILITIES a,facility_master b, perapplicant where a.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and facility_group=^ and facility_status='pa' and FACILITY_RENEW is null and facility_headid=facility_catid and perapp_id=borrower_id ^
select perapp_fname as app_name, app_status, demo_comappid as demo_appid, app_orgcode, app_inwardno, app_orglevel, app_valuesin, app_applnholder, perapp_panno as perapp_panno, org_name,inward_proptype,solid, '' as loan_repaymenttype,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,'' as PERAPP_EMPLOYMENT,demo_comappnewid as demo_appnewid, app_renew_flag,'' as loan_takeover,inward_applnprocessat,INWARD_DIGIAPPNO from applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations,appinwardreg where org_scode=INWARD_ORGSCODE and perapp_id=demo_comappnewid and demo_appno=app_no and app_inwardno=inward_no(+) and app_no='^'
update com_banking set combk_drawingpower=?,combk_duedate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),combk_os=?,COM_EXPOSURE=?,combk_Baltype=?,combk_ratingcheck=?,COMBK_OSASONDATE=sysdate where combk_appno=? and combk_cbsappno=? and combk_faccategory in ('R','O')

update com_cashflow set com_cf_unitno=? where com_cf_appno=? and com_cf_unitno= (select min(distinct(com_cf_unitno)) as min_unitno from com_cashflow where com_cf_appno=?)
