select facility_sancstatus,facility_sno,facility_sancinterest,to_char(FAC_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FAC_PROCESSDATE,FACILITY_RESTR_FLAG from facilities where facility_appno='^'
update facilities set facility_status=? where facility_appno=? and facility_sno=?
insert into fin_rating(fin_ratappno,fin_cbsid,fin_appid,fin_finid,fin_usrid,fin_createddate,fin_bussid,fin_status,fin_appholder,fin_appname,fin_orgcode,fin_partyfiledet)values(?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from fin_rating where fin_ratappno=?
update fin_rating set fin_appid=?,fin_finid=?,fin_bussid=?,fin_partyfiledet=? where fin_ratappno=?
select FIN_APPID,FIN_FINID,fin_orgcode,fin_cbsid from fin_rating where FIN_RATAPPNO='^'
SELECT distinct finprintyear_selsno FROM financial_printyear WHERE finprintyear_appno='^' and finprintyear_pageid='^'
delete FROM financial_printyear WHERE finprintyear_appno=? and finprintyear_selsno=? and finprintyear_pageid=?
insert into COM_SECCOMMENTS(COMSEC_APPNO, COMSEC_APPCOVERAGE, COMSEC_APPCOMMENTS,COMSEC_GROUPCOVERAGE,COMSEC_GROUPCOMMENTS,COMSEC_ADDITIONALSECCOVERAGE,COMSEC_ADDITIONALSECCOMMENTS,COMSEC_SECTYPE,COMSEC_FACGROUPCONCERN,COMSEC_FACGROUPCONCERNCOMMENTS) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
SELECT COMSEC_APPCOVERAGE,COMSEC_APPCOMMENTS,COMSEC_GROUPCOVERAGE,COMSEC_GROUPCOMMENTS,COMSEC_ADDITIONALSECCOVERAGE,COMSEC_ADDITIONALSECCOMMENTS,COMSEC_SECTYPE,COMSEC_FACGROUPCONCERN,COMSEC_FACGROUPCONCERNCOMMENTS FROM COM_SECCOMMENTS WHERE COMSEC_APPNO='^'
delete COM_SECCOMMENTS where COMSEC_APPNO=?
select b.facility_proposed,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as com_facdesc from facility_master a,facilities b ,facility_corp fc,static_data sd where stat_data_desc=b.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and fc.com_facid=b.facility_code and a.facility_parent='0' and b.facility_appno ='^' and fc.com_module='^' and facility_nature='2' and (facility_sancstatus='A' or facility_sancstatus is null) order by decode(b.facility_headid,'4',1,'5',2,'3', 3,'2',4,'6',5,'7',6,'1',7)
insert into COM_SECGROUPCONCERNS(COMSEC_APPNO, COMSEC_GROUPAPPID, COMSEC_STATUS,COMSEC_PAGE,COMSEC_COMMENTS) values(?,?,?,?,?)
delete COM_SECGROUPCONCERNS where COMSEC_APPNO=? and COMSEC_PAGE=? and COMSEC_GROUPAPPID=?
SELECT COMSEC_STATUS,COMSEC_COMMENTS from COM_SECGROUPCONCERNS WHERE COMSEC_APPNO='^' and COMSEC_GROUPAPPID='^' and COMSEC_PAGE='^'
SELECT COMSEC_STATUS,COMSEC_COMMENTS,COMSEC_GROUPAPPID from COM_SECGROUPCONCERNS WHERE COMSEC_APPNO='^' and COMSEC_GROUPAPPID='^' and COMSEC_STATUS='M' and COMSEC_PAGE='^'
select com_amountvalue from com_briefbackground where com_appno='^'
select fin_status,FIN_DIGI_FLAG from fin_rating where fin_ratappno='^'
select fin_status,FIN_DIGI_FLAG from fin_rating where fin_finid='^'
select distinct to_char(b.fin_year,'dd/mm/yyyy') as audityear,sum(fin_unaudit) as fin_audit,sum(fin_audit) as fin_unaudit from COM_FINAPPVALUES b where fin_appno='^' and com_division_id ='0' and (b.fin_year ^ sysdate) and (0 ^ (select sum(fin_audit) from COM_FINAPPVALUES where fin_appno=b.fin_appno and fin_year=b.fin_year) or 0 ^ (select sum(fin_unaudit) from COM_FINAPPVALUES where fin_appno=b.fin_appno and fin_year=b.fin_year)) group by b.fin_year order by audityear DESC
select fin_rowtype,fin_formula from COM_FINMASTER where fin_rowdesc='NET WORKING CAPITAL' and fin_tabname='RA1' and fin_cma_no='^'
select sum(FIN_AUDIT) + sum(FIN_UNAUDIT)+sum(FIN_ESTIMATED)+sum(FIN_PROJECTION) as TotalAsset from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and fin_rowid='^'
select sum(FIN_AUDIT) + sum(FIN_UNAUDIT)+sum(FIN_ESTIMATED)+sum(FIN_PROJECTION) as TotalLiab from com_finappvalues where fin_appno='^' and fin_rowid='^'
select fin_rowtype,fin_formula,fin_rowid from COM_FINMASTER where fin_rowdesc='^' and fin_page='^' and fin_cma_no='^'
select facility_oldappno,facility_oldappsno,facility_sno,facility_appno from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_renew_flag='Y'
select sanctionrefno,to_char(app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate from app_referncenumber ar,applications app where app.app_no='^' and app.app_no=ar.app_no and (lower(sancref_flag)='n' or sancref_flag is null)
select app_sec_secid from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_attached='A' and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_FREEZE='Y'
select app_sec_secid from app_securitydetails where app_sec_appno='^' and app_sec_facsno='^' and app_sec_attached='A' and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_FREEZE='Y'
select facility_sno from facilities where facility_appno='^' and FACILITY_SANCSTATUS='A'
select cb.combk_limit,cb.combk_os,to_char(combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,cb.combk_type,cb.combk_sancrefno, to_char(cb.combk_sancdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_sancdate,cb.combk_spread, cb.combk_os,to_char(cb.combk_osasondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_osasondate,to_char(cb.combk_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combk_duedate,cb.combk_arrears,cb.combk_facility,cb.combk_modtype, cb.combk_purpose,combk_interestrate,combk_inttype,combk_fac_grp,combk_factype,combk_remarks from com_banking cb where combk_bnk='Our' and cb.combk_appno ='^' and combk_facility_sno='^' and combk_credittype='P'
select count(distinct(app_sector)) as sectorcount from mis_appclassification where app_no='^'
select APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,C.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,S.SEC_NAME,A.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,A.APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,A.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION as CUS_SEC_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION from APP_SECURITYDETAILS A,CUS_SECURITIES C,SECURITY_MASTER S where APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='^' and APP_SEC_SECUTYPE='^' AND APP_SEC_FACID='^'and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' AND CUS_SEC_ID=APP_SEC_SECID AND S.SEC_ID=C.CUS_SEC_TYPE
SELECT distinct finprintyear_selsno FROM financial_printyear WHERE finprintyear_appno='^'
select int_intvalue from bobinterestindex where INT_INTID= '1' and int_active='Y' and INT_USEFLAG='Y'
select cre_rating,cre_weight,cre_userid,usr_fname||' '||usr_lname as username from CREDITSCORING,users where cre_appno='^' and usr_id=cre_userid and cre_freeze='Y' order by cre_rating desc
update fin_rating set fin_status='PR' where fin_ratappno=?
select fc.com_cashmargin from facilities f,facility_corp fc where facility_appno='^' and f.facility_code=fc.com_facid
select combk_facility,combk_limit,combk_os,combk_facility_sno,combk_type,combk_parentappno,combk_parentfacsno, combk_accountopen,combk_prefix,combk_suffix,combk_cbsappno,combk_modtype,combk_type from com_banking where combk_appno='^' and (COMBK_CBSAPPNO is not null or (decode(COMBK_PREFIX,'0','',COMBK_PREFIX) is not null and decode(COMBK_SUFFIX,'0','',COMBK_SUFFIX) is not null)) order by combk_parentappno
select distinct(foracid) as CBS_ACCOUNTNO,cust_id as perapp_cbsid,'' as FACILITY_APPNO,'' as FACILITY_SNO,'' as FACILITY_FITL_ACC from VW_FVALUE_LAPS
select FACILITY_APPNO,FACILITY_SNO,PERAPP_CBSID,fac.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,FACILITY_FITL_ACC from FACILITIES fac,PERAPPLICANT, APPLICATIONS app where APP_NO=FACILITY_APPNO and BORROWER_ID=PERAPP_ID and FACILITY_RESTR_FLAG='Y' and FACILITY_STATUS='op' and fac.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and fac.FACILITY_SNO='^' union all select b.APP_NO,to_number('1'),PERAPP_CBSID,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,'' from APPLICATIONS b,PERAPPLICANT,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS where b.APP_NO=DEMO_APPNO and DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and APP_RENEW_FLAG='S' and APP_STATUS='op' and b.APP_NO='^'
insert into FVC_CALCULATION(FVC_PROPOSAL_NO,FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO,FVC_CBS_ID,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,FVC_CALC_DATE,FVC_FITL_ACC,FVC_PROPOSAL_NO_OLD, FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO_OLD,CBS_ACCOUNTNO_OLD,FVC_FLOWSTRTDATE_PROPOSAL,FVC_INTDMDDATE_PROPOSAL,FVC_PROPOSAL) values(?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
select FVC_PROPOSAL_NUM,FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO,CBS_ACCNO,FVC_BORROWER_NAME,FVC_CUST_ID,FVC_OS_BAL,FVC_REPAY_TYPE,FVC_INTRST_CODE,FVC_TYPE,FVC_NO_OF_FLOWS,FVC_FLOW_AMT, to_char(FVC_FLOW_START_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') FVC_FLOW_START_DATE,to_char(FVC_EXP_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') FVC_EXP_DATE,FVC_PAYMENT_FREQ,to_char(FVC_DMD_EFF_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') FVC_DMD_EFF_DATE, FVC_INT_RATE,FVC_FLOW_SNO,to_char(FVC_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') FVC_DUEDATE,FVC_DISCRATE from FVC_DCDATA where CBS_ACCNO='^' and FVC_TYPE='^' order by to_number(FVC_FLOW_SNO)
select to_char(add_months(to_date('^','dd-mm-yyyy'),^),'dd/mm/yyyy') as month_val from dual
select to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy')-to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') as no_of_days from dual
select FVC_PROPOSAL_NO,FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,FVC_PROPOSAL_NO_OLD,FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO_OLD,CBS_ACCOUNTNO_OLD,FVC_FITL_ACC,FVC_CBS_ID from FVC_CALCULATION where TO_CHAR(FVC_CALC_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') and FVC_PROFIT_LOSS is null union all select FVC_PROPOSAL_NO,FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,FVC_PROPOSAL_NO_OLD,FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO_OLD,CBS_ACCOUNTNO_OLD,FVC_FITL_ACC,FVC_CBS_ID from FVC_CALCULATION where TO_CHAR(FVC_CALC_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') and FVC_PROFIT_LOSS is null order by CBS_ACCOUNTNO
select FVC_PROPOSAL_NO,FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,FVC_PROPOSAL_NO_OLD,FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO_OLD,CBS_ACCOUNTNO_OLD,FVC_FITL_ACC,FVC_CBS_ID from FVC_CALCULATION where TO_CHAR(FVC_CALC_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') and FVC_PROFIT_LOSS is null and FVC_PROPOSAL_NO='^' and FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO='^' union all select FVC_PROPOSAL_NO,FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,FVC_PROPOSAL_NO_OLD,FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO_OLD,CBS_ACCOUNTNO_OLD,FVC_FITL_ACC,FVC_CBS_ID from FVC_CALCULATION where TO_CHAR(FVC_CALC_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') and FVC_PROFIT_LOSS is null and FVC_PROPOSAL_NO='^' and FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO='^' order by FVC_PROPOSAL_NO,FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO,CBS_ACCOUNTNO
update FVC_CALCULATION set FVC_BEFORE_XNPV=?,FVC_AFTER_XNPV=?,FVC_PROFIT_LOSS=? where CBS_ACCOUNTNO=?
select CBS_ACCOUNTNO,FVC_CBS_ID,FVC_BEFORE_XNPV,FVC_AFTER_XNPV,FVC_PROFIT_LOSS,CBS_ACCOUNTNO_OLD,PERAPP_TITLE||'.'||PERAPP_FNAME as borrower,to_char(FVC_CALC_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FVC_CALC_DATE from FVC_CALCULATION,PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_CBSID=FVC_CBS_ID and (PERAPP_RENEW is null or PERAPP_RENEW='n') and to_date(to_char(FVC_CALC_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') order by FVC_CALC_DATE,borrower
select FVC_CBS_ID,sum(FVC_BEFORE_XNPV) as FVC_BEFORE_XNPV,sum(FVC_AFTER_XNPV) as FVC_AFTER_XNPV,sum(FVC_PROFIT_LOSS) as FVC_PROFIT_LOSS, PERAPP_TITLE||'.'||PERAPP_FNAME as borrower,to_char(FVC_CALC_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FVC_CALC_DATE from FVC_CALCULATION,PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_CBSID=FVC_CBS_ID and (PERAPP_RENEW is null or PERAPP_RENEW='n') and to_date(to_char(FVC_CALC_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') group by FVC_CBS_ID,PERAPP_TITLE||'.'||PERAPP_FNAME,FVC_CALC_DATE order by FVC_CALC_DATE,borrower
select FVC_TYPE,FVC_PREMIUM from FVCMASTER where FVC_TYPE='DP' union all select FVC_TYPE,FVC_PREMIUM from FVCMASTER,CREDITSCORING where FVC_DESC=CRE_WEIGHT and CRE_APPNO='^' and CRE_RMDFLAG='Y'
select case APP_LOANTYPE when 'P' then (select max(distinct to_char(PRD_BASERATE)) from PRDINT_MASTER,PRD_INTEREST_LIMIT,APPLICATIONS a where APP_PRDCODE=PRDINT_PRDCODE and PRDINT_SNO=PRD_INTID and a.APP_NO=app.APP_NO) else (Select max(distinct CORPPRD_BASERATE) from CORPPRDINT_MASTER,CORPPRD_INTEREST_LIMIT,FACILITIES where FACILITY_CODE=CORPPRDINT_PRDCODE and CORPPRDINT_SNO=CORPPRD_INTID and FACILITY_APPNO=app.APP_NO and FACILITY_SNO='^') end as int_prem from APPLICATIONS app where APP_NO='^'
select FVC_TYPE,FVC_PREMIUM from FVCMASTER where FVC_TYPE='TP' and (select case APP_LOANTYPE when 'P' then (select months_between(a.APP_CLOSEDDATE,a.APP_PROCESSDATE) from APPLICATIONS a where a.APP_NO=app.APP_NO) else (Select case fac.FACILITY_ACCOUNTOPEN when 'Y' then (select months_between(b.FACILITY_CLSDATE,LAPS_RCRE_TIME) from LAPS_AIF,FACILITIES b where LAPS_APPNO=b.FACILITY_APPNO and LAPS_SNO=b.FACILITY_SNO and b.FACILITY_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_APPNO and b.FACILITY_SNO=fac.FACILITY_SNO) when 'N' then (select months_between(c.FACILITY_CLSDATE,LAPS_RCRE_TIME) from LAPSNFB_AIF laps,FACILITIES c where LAPS_APPLICATION_NUM=c.FACILITY_APPNO and laps.FACILITY_SNO=c.FACILITY_SNO and c.FACILITY_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_APPNO and c.FACILITY_SNO=fac.FACILITY_SNO) end from FACILITIES fac where fac.FACILITY_APPNO=app.APP_NO and fac.FACILITY_SNO='^') end as int_prem from APPLICATIONS app where APP_NO='^') between FVC_TNR_FROM and FVC_TNR_TO
select FVC_TYPE,FVC_PREMIUM from FVCMASTER where FVC_TYPE='TP' and (select case APP_LOANTYPE when 'P' then (select LOAN_TERMS from LOANDETAILS,APPLICATIONS a where LOAN_APPNO=a.APP_NO and a.APP_NO=app.APP_NO) else (select fac.FACILITY_MONTHS from FACILITIES fac where fac.FACILITY_APPNO=app.APP_NO and fac.FACILITY_SNO='^') end as int_prem from APPLICATIONS app where APP_NO='^') between FVC_TNR_FROM and FVC_TNR_TO
select APP_EXAPPNO,APP_EXAPPSNO,APP_EXAPPCBSACCNO from APP_RESTRUCTURE where APP_NO='^' and APP_SNO like ('%^%')
select PERAPP_FNAME,PERAPP_CBSID,FACILITY_REPAYTYPE,FACILITY_PROPOSED,BPLR,to_char(FACILITY_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FACILITY_DUEDATE,upper(FACILITY_PERINSTALL) as FACILITY_PERINSTALL,FACILITY_MONTHS,FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD from FACILITIES,PERAPPLICANT where BORROWER_ID=PERAPP_ID and FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'
select PERAPP_FNAME,PERAPP_CBSID,decode(LOAN_REPAYMENTTYPE,'1','E','2','NE','OD') as LOAN_REPAYMENTTYPE,LOAN_RECMDAMT,LOAN_MODINTRATE,upper(sec.LOAN_PERIODICITY) as LOAN_PERIODICITY,loan.LOAN_REQTERMS,sec.LOAN_NOOFINSTALLMENT from LOANDETAILS loan,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS,PERAPPLICANT,PER_LOAN_SECURE sec where loan.LOAN_APPNO=sec.LOAN_APPNO and loan.LOAN_APPNO=DEMO_APPNO and DEMO_APPID=PERAPP_ID and loan.LOAN_APPNO='^'
insert into app_restructure(app_no,app_exappno,app_exappsno,app_exappcbsaccno,app_loantype,APP_SNO,APP_RESTR_COUNT)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select NVL(max(res.APP_RESTR_COUNT),0)+1 as countval from APP_RESTRUCTURE res,APPLICATIONS app where res.APP_NO=app.APP_NO and app.APP_DELFLAG='N' and res.APP_EXAPPCBSACCNO='^'
SELECT * FROM (SELECT b.facility_appno,b.facility_proposed, 0 AS combk_os, '' AS combk_osasondate, com_facnature AS combk_type, '^' AS combk_modtype, CASE facility_group WHEN 0 THEN 'M' ELSE 'S' END AS combk_factype, 0 AS com_exposure, fc.com_facdesc, a.facility_for, sd.STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc, b.facility_group, b.facility_freshlimit, fc.com_headfac, b.facility_renew_flag, b.facility_sno, b.facility_existing, b.facility_headid,'F' as fac_tab,cb.combk_arrears as arrears,facility_sancinterest,com_bankscheme,'P' as credittype,facility_renewaljustif FROM facility_master a, facilities b, facility_corp fc,static_data sd,com_banking cb WHERE sd.STAT_DATA_DESC=b.facility_displaydesc and sd.STAT_DATA_ID='180' and b.facility_headid = a.facility_catid AND fc.com_facid = b.facility_code AND a.facility_parent = '0' AND b.facility_appno = '^' AND fc.com_module = '^' AND b.facility_group = '^' and (b.facility_sancstatus='A' or b.facility_sancstatus is null) and cb.combk_appno=b.facility_appno and cb.combk_facility_sno=b.facility_sno and cb.combk_credittype='P' UNION ALL SELECT cb.COMBK_PARENTAPPNO,cb.combk_limit, cb.combk_os, to_char(combk_osasondate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_osasondate, cb.combk_type, cb.combk_modtype, combk_factype, com_exposure, '' AS facility_desc, CASE WHEN cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN 'F' ELSE (SELECT com_factype FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS facility_for, CASE WHEN cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN (SELECT prd_desc FROM products WHERE prd_code = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) ELSE (select STAT_DATA_DESC1 from static_data sd,facilities b where facility_appno=COMBK_PARENTAPPNO and facility_sno=COMBK_PARENTFACSNO and sd.STAT_DATA_DESC=b.facility_displaydesc and sd.STAT_DATA_ID='180') END AS facility_displaydesc, combk_fac_grp AS facility_group, 0 AS facility_freshlimit, CASE WHEN cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN '' ELSE (SELECT com_headfac FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS com_headfac, '' AS facility_renew_flag, COMBK_PARENTFACSNO AS facility_sno, cb.combk_limit AS facility_existing, CASE when cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN CASE cb.combk_type when '1' then 3 else 4 end ELSE (SELECT to_number(com_headfac) FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS facility_headid,'C' as com_tab,COMBK_ARREARS,COMBK_INTERESTRATE,(CASE WHEN cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN (SELECT prd_bankscheme FROM products WHERE prd_code = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) ELSE (SELECT com_bankscheme FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END) AS com_bankscheme,combk_credittype,'' FROM com_banking cb WHERE combk_bnk = 'Our' AND cb.combk_appno = '^' AND combk_credittype = 'E' and COMBK_FACTYPE='M') facilities ORDER BY decode(facility_headid, '4', 1, '5', 2, '3', 3, '2', 4, '6', 5, '7', 6, '1', 7)
SELECT * FROM (SELECT cb.COMBK_PARENTAPPNO,cb.combk_limit, cb.combk_os, to_char(combk_osasondate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_osasondate, cb.combk_type, cb.combk_modtype, combk_factype, com_exposure, '' AS facility_desc, CASE WHEN cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN 'F' ELSE (SELECT com_factype FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS facility_for, CASE WHEN cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN (SELECT prd_desc FROM products WHERE prd_code = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) ELSE (select STAT_DATA_DESC1 from static_data sd,facilities b where facility_appno=COMBK_PARENTAPPNO and facility_sno=COMBK_PARENTFACSNO and sd.STAT_DATA_DESC=b.facility_displaydesc and sd.STAT_DATA_ID='180') END AS facility_displaydesc, combk_fac_grp AS facility_group, 0 AS facility_freshlimit, CASE WHEN cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN '' ELSE (SELECT com_headfac FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS com_headfac, '' AS facility_renew_flag, COMBK_PARENTFACSNO AS facility_sno, cb.combk_limit AS facility_existing, CASE when cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN CASE cb.combk_type when '1' then 3 else 4 end ELSE (SELECT to_number(com_headfac) FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS facility_headid,'C' as com_tab,COMBK_ARREARS,COMBK_INTERESTRATE,(CASE WHEN cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN (SELECT prd_bankscheme FROM products WHERE prd_code = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) ELSE (SELECT com_bankscheme FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END) AS com_bankscheme,combk_credittype FROM com_banking cb WHERE combk_bnk = 'Our' AND cb.combk_appno = '^' AND combk_credittype = 'E' and COMBK_PARENTAPPNO='^' and COMBK_FAC_GRP='^') facilities ORDER BY decode(facility_headid, '4', 1, '5', 2, '3', 3, '2', 4, '6', 5, '7', 6, '1', 7)
select * from(SELECT CASE when cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN (SELECT prd_desc FROM products WHERE prd_code = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) ELSE (SELECT case COM_HEADFAC when '1' then 'Forward contract' when '2' then 'Pre Shipment Credit' when '3' then 'Overdraft' when '4' then 'Term Loan' when '5' then 'Demand Loan' else com_facdesc end FROM facility_corp,facility_master WHERE COM_HEADFAC=facility_catid and com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS facdesc, cb.combk_limit, cb.combk_sancrefno, to_char(cb.combk_sancdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_sancdate,cb.combk_spread, cb.combk_os, to_char(combk_osasondate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_osasondate, to_char(cb.combk_duedate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_duedate, cb.combk_arrears, cb.combk_purpose, combk_inttype, combk_interestrate, combk_fac_grp, combk_factype, combk_remarks, CASE when cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN '' ELSE (SELECT com_headfac FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS com_headfac, CASE when cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN CASE cb.combk_type when '1' then 3 else 4 end ELSE (SELECT to_number(com_headfac) FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility , 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS facility_headid,combk_type,combk_repaymentcmt,com_exposure,'E' as fac_type,combk_parentappno,combk_parentfacsno FROM com_banking cb WHERE combk_bnk = 'Our' AND cb.combk_appno = '^' AND combk_credittype = 'E' and COMBK_FACTYPE='M' union all SELECT sd.STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facdesc, (SELECT facility_sancamt FROM facilities WHERE facility_appno = f.facility_oldappno AND facility_sno = f.facility_oldappsno) AS combk_limit, cb.combk_sancrefno, to_char(cb.combk_sancdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_sancdate, cb.combk_spread, cb.combk_os, to_char(combk_osasondate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_osasondate, to_char(cb.combk_duedate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_duedate, cb.combk_arrears, cb.combk_purpose, combk_inttype, combk_interestrate, combk_fac_grp, combk_factype, combk_remarks, (SELECT com_headfac FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid =f.facility_code) as com_headfac, (SELECT to_number(com_headfac) FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid=f.facility_code) as facility_headid,combk_type,combk_repaymentcmt,com_exposure,'P' as fac_type,facility_appno,facility_sno FROM com_banking cb, facilities f,static_data sd WHERE combk_bnk = 'Our' AND cb.combk_appno = f.facility_appno AND cb.combk_appno = '^' AND cb.combk_facility_sno = f.facility_sno AND cb.combk_credittype = 'P' and sd.STAT_DATA_DESC=f.facility_displaydesc and sd.STAT_DATA_ID='180' AND f.facility_renew_flag = 'Y' and f.facility_group='0') facilities ORDER BY decode(facility_headid, '4', 1, '5', 2, '3', 3, '2', 4, '6', 5, '7', 6, '1', 7)
select * from(SELECT sd.STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facdesc, (SELECT facility_sancamt FROM facilities WHERE facility_appno = f.facility_oldappno AND facility_sno = f.facility_oldappsno) AS combk_limit, cb.combk_sancrefno, to_char(cb.combk_sancdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_sancdate, cb.combk_spread, cb.combk_os, to_char(combk_osasondate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_osasondate, to_char(cb.combk_duedate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_duedate, cb.combk_arrears, cb.combk_purpose, combk_inttype, combk_interestrate, combk_fac_grp, combk_factype, combk_remarks, (SELECT com_headfac FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid =f.facility_code) as com_headfac, (SELECT to_number(com_headfac) FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid=f.facility_code) as facility_headid,combk_type,combk_repaymentcmt,com_exposure FROM com_banking cb, facilities f,static_data sd WHERE combk_bnk = 'Our' AND cb.combk_appno = f.facility_appno AND cb.combk_facility_sno = f.facility_sno AND cb.combk_credittype = 'P' and sd.STAT_DATA_DESC=f.facility_displaydesc and sd.STAT_DATA_ID='180' AND f.facility_renew_flag = 'Y' and f.facility_appno='^' and f.facility_group='^') facilities ORDER BY decode(facility_headid, '4', 1, '5', 2, '3', 3, '2', 4, '6', 5, '7', 6, '1', 7)
select * from(SELECT CASE when cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN (SELECT prd_desc FROM products WHERE prd_code = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) ELSE (SELECT case COM_HEADFAC when '1' then 'Forward contract' when '2' then 'Pre Shipment Credit' when '3' then 'Overdraft' when '4' then 'Term Loan' when '5' then 'Demand Loan' else com_facdesc end FROM facility_corp,facility_master WHERE COM_HEADFAC=facility_catid and com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS facdesc, cb.combk_limit, cb.combk_sancrefno, to_char(cb.combk_sancdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_sancdate,cb.combk_spread, cb.combk_os, to_char(combk_osasondate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_osasondate, to_char(cb.combk_duedate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS combk_duedate, cb.combk_arrears, cb.combk_purpose, combk_inttype, combk_interestrate, combk_fac_grp, combk_factype, combk_remarks, CASE when cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN '' ELSE (SELECT com_headfac FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility, 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS com_headfac, CASE when cb.combk_modtype in ('p','r') THEN CASE cb.combk_type when '1' then 3 else 4 end ELSE (SELECT to_number(com_headfac) FROM facility_corp WHERE com_facid = SUBSTR(cb.combk_facility , 1, LENGTH(cb.combk_facility) -2)) END AS facility_headid,combk_type,combk_repaymentcmt,com_exposure FROM com_banking cb WHERE combk_bnk = 'Our' AND cb.combk_appno = '^' AND combk_credittype = 'E' and COMBK_PARENTAPPNO='^' and COMBK_FAC_GRP='^' ) facilities ORDER BY decode(facility_headid, '4', 1, '5', 2, '3', 3, '2', 4, '6', 5, '7', 6, '1', 7)
update BOBINTERESTINDEX set INT_USEFLAG='N',INT_MODIFY_DATE=sysdate where INT_INTID=? and INT_USEFLAG='Y'
select APP_EXAPPCBSACCNO as facility_sno,APP_EXAPPCBSACCNO as com_facdesc from APP_RESTRUCTURE where APP_SNO is null and APP_NO='^'
select APP_EXAPPNO,APP_EXAPPSNO from APP_RESTRUCTURE where APP_NO='^' and APP_EXAPPCBSACCNO='^'
delete from APP_RESTRUCTURE where APP_NO=? and APP_EXAPPCBSACCNO=?
select APP_EXAPPCBSACCNO,APP_EXAPPNO,APP_EXAPPSNO from APP_RESTRUCTURE where APP_NO='^'
update APP_RESTRUCTURE set APP_SNO=? where APP_NO=? and APP_EXAPPCBSACCNO=?
update APP_RESTRUCTURE set APP_SNO=replace(app_sno,?,'') where APP_NO=?
select APP_SNO from APP_RESTRUCTURE where APP_NO='^' and APP_EXAPPCBSACCNO='^'
select PS_OLD_APP_NO,PS_OLD_APP_SNO,PS_APP_SNO,PS_MODIFY_TERMS,PS_APP_NO from APP_POST_SANCTION where PS_APP_NO='^'
select CBS_ACCOUNTNO,FACILITY_APPNO,FM1.FACILITY_CATDESC as main_cat,FM2.FACILITY_CATDESC as sub_cat,FACILITY_SANCAMT,DECODE(FACILITY_GROUP,'0','Main Limit','Sub Limit') as limit_type, facility_group,FACILITY_INTTYPE,COM_FACNATURE,COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE,FACILITY_ACCOUNTOPEN,com_facility_emischeme from FACILITIES f,FACILITY_MASTER FM1,FACILITY_MASTER FM2,facility_corp fc where FACILITY_HEADID=FM1.FACILITY_CATID AND FACILITY_ID=FM2.FACILITY_CATID and FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^' and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code
insert into FVC_DCDATA(FVC_PROPOSAL_NUM,FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO,CBS_ACCNO,FVC_BORROWER_NAME,FVC_CUST_ID,FVC_OS_BAL,FVC_REPAY_TYPE, FVC_TYPE,FVC_NO_OF_FLOWS,FVC_FLOW_AMT,FVC_FLOW_START_DATE,FVC_PAYMENT_FREQ,FVC_DMD_EFF_DATE,FVC_INT_RATE,FVC_FLOW_SNO,FVC_DUEDATE,FVC_DISCRATE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
insert into com_restr_assessment(com_appno,com_proj_details,com_restr_reasons,com_restr_justification,com_exi_repayschedule,com_revised_repayschedule)values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from com_restr_assessment where com_appno=?
select com_proj_details,com_restr_reasons,com_restr_justification,com_exi_repayschedule,com_revised_repayschedule from com_restr_assessment where com_appno='^'
select FVC_PROPOSAL_NO, FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO, CBS_ACCOUNTNO, FVC_CBS_ID, FVC_BEFORE_XNPV, FVC_AFTER_XNPV, FVC_PROFIT_LOSS, to_char(FVC_CALC_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FVC_CALC_DATE, FVC_PROPOSAL_NO_OLD, FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO_OLD, CBS_ACCOUNTNO_OLD, FVC_FITL_ACC, to_char(FVC_FLOWSTRTDATE_PROPOSAL,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FVC_FLOWSTRTDATE_PROPOSAL, to_char(FVC_INTDMDDATE_PROPOSAL,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FVC_INTDMDDATE_PROPOSAL from FVC_CALCULATION a where FVC_PROPOSAL_NO='^' and FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO='^' and FVC_PROPOSAL='Y' and FVC_CALC_DATE = (select max(b.FVC_CALC_DATE) from FVC_CALCULATION b where b.FVC_PROPOSAL_NO=a.FVC_PROPOSAL_NO and b.FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO=a.FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO)
select FORACID from VW_FVALUE_LAPS
delete from FVC_CALCULATION where FVC_PROPOSAL_NO=? and FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO=? and FVC_PROPOSAL='Y'
select FVC_PROPOSAL_NO from FVC_CALCULATION where FVC_PROPOSAL_NO='^' and FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO='^' and FVC_PROFIT_LOSS is null
select FACILITY_SANCAMT,FACILITY_SANCAMT*nvl(FACILITY_SANCINTEREST,nvl(BPLR,FACILITY_INTEREST)) as numerator from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO||FACILITY_SNO in (select APP_EXAPPNO||APP_EXAPPSNO from APP_RESTRUCTURE where APP_LOANTYPE!='P' and APP_NO='^' and APP_SNO like '%@^%') union all select LOAN_AMTREQD,LOAN_AMTREQD*LOAN_MODINTRATE as numerator from LOANDETAILS where LOAN_APPNO in (select APP_EXAPPNO from APP_RESTRUCTURE where APP_NO='^' and APP_LOANTYPE='P')
INSERT INTO FVC_DCDATA_CBS (FVC_PROPOSAL_NUM, FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO, CBS_ACCNO, FVC_BORROWER_NAME, FVC_CUST_ID, FVC_OS_BAL, FVC_REPAY_TYPE, FVC_INTRST_CODE, FVC_TYPE, FVC_NO_OF_FLOWS, FVC_FLOW_AMT, FVC_FLOW_START_DATE, FVC_EXP_DATE, FVC_PAYMENT_FREQ, FVC_DMD_EFF_DATE, FVC_INT_RATE, FVC_FLOW_SNO,FVC_BKP_DATE,fvc_duedate,fvc_discrate) select FVC_PROPOSAL_NUM, FVC_PROPOSAL_SNO, CBS_ACCNO, FVC_BORROWER_NAME, FVC_CUST_ID, FVC_OS_BAL, FVC_REPAY_TYPE, FVC_INTRST_CODE, FVC_TYPE, FVC_NO_OF_FLOWS, FVC_FLOW_AMT, FVC_FLOW_START_DATE, FVC_EXP_DATE, FVC_PAYMENT_FREQ, FVC_DMD_EFF_DATE, FVC_INT_RATE, FVC_FLOW_SNO,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),fvc_duedate,fvc_discrate from FVC_DCDATA
delete from FVC_DCDATA
delete from VW_FVALUE_LAPS
update MIS_CLASSI_ACTIVITY_MASTER set MIS_SOCIAL_INFRA=?,MIS_RENEW_ENERGY=?,MIS_RENEW_ENERGY_INDV=?,MIS_AGRI_ANCI_ACTIVITY=?,MIS_AGRI_INFRA=?,MIS_MODIFY_DATE=sysdate
select MIS_SOCIAL_INFRA,MIS_RENEW_ENERGY,MIS_RENEW_ENERGY_INDV,MIS_AGRI_ANCI_ACTIVITY,MIS_AGRI_INFRA from MIS_CLASSI_ACTIVITY_MASTER
select ^ from MIS_CLASSI_ACTIVITY_MASTER
select PS_OLD_APP_NO,PS_OLD_APP_SNO,PS_MODIFY_TERMS,PS_APP_SNO from APP_POST_SANCTION where PS_APP_NO='^' ^ order by PS_OLD_APP_NO
select PS_OLD_APP_NO,PS_OLD_APP_SNO,PS_MODIFY_TERMS from APP_POST_SANCTION,facilities where FACILITY_SEL_TYPE='4' and facility_sno=PS_APP_SNO and PS_APP_SNO='^' and facility_appno=PS_APP_NO and PS_APP_NO='^'
select APP_PRDCODE,app.APP_NO,to_char(app.APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as create_date,to_char(app.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sanc_date,ORG_SCODE||' - '||ORG_NAME as branch,app.CBS_ACCOUNTNO, ref.SANCTIONREFNO,USR_ID||' - '||USR_FNAME as sanc_user,app.APP_LOANTYPE,INWARD_NO,to_char(INWARD_CREATEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_createdon from APPLICATIONS app left join USERS on app.APP_APPROVEDBY=USR_ID left join APPINWARDREG on APP_INWARDNO=INWARD_NO left join ORGANISATIONS on INWARD_ORGSCODE=ORG_SCODE left join APP_REFERNCENUMBER ref on app.APP_NO=ref.APP_NO and ref.SANCREF_FLAG='n' where app.APP_NO='^'
select COM_BANKSCHEME,decode(fm.FACILITY_NATURE,'1','Working Capital','2','Term Loan') as fac_nature,COM_FACDESC,FACILITY_PROPOSED,FACILITY_SANCAMT, decode(FACILITY_INTTYPE,'Fix','Fixed','Floating') as int_type,FACILITY_INTSUBTYPE,BPLR,FACILITY_SANCINTEREST,FACILITY_PROPBANKTYPE, (select stat_data_desc1 from static_data where stat_data_id='147' and STAT_DATA_DESC=FACILITY_LEADERBANK) as leader_bank,FACILITY_PERINSTALL, FACILITY_REPAYTYPE,decode(FACILITY_GOVTSPONSCHEM,'1','Yes','2','No') as govt_scheme,to_char(FACILITY_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as due_date, (select stat_data_desc1 from static_data where stat_data_id='11' and STAT_DATA_DESC=FACILITY_SCHEMETYPE) as FACILITY_SCHEMETYPE, FACILITY_SUBSIDYAMUNT,(select stat_data_desc1 from static_data where stat_data_id='3' and STAT_DATA_DESC=FACILITY_SPONSAGENCY) as FACILITY_SPONSAGENCY,(select stat_data_desc1 from static_data where stat_data_id='5' and STAT_DATA_DESC=FACILITY_SUBSIDYTYPE) as FACILITY_SUBSIDYTYPE,fac.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,fac.FACILITY_GROUP,fac.FACILITY_MONTHS,fac.FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD from FACILITIES fac,FACILITY_MASTER fm, FACILITY_CORP fc where fac.FACILITY_CODE=fc.COM_FACID and fac.FACILITY_HEADID=FACILITY_CATID and FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'
select sec.LOAN_NOOFINSTALLMENT,loan.LOAN_REQTERMS,PRD_BANKSCHEME,decode(PRD_LOANTYPE,'OD','Working Capital','TL','Term Loan','Demand Loan') as fac_nature,PRD_DESC,loan.LOAN_AMTREQD,loan.LOAN_RECMDAMT,loan.LOAN_INTTYPE,loan.LOAN_INTRATE, loan.LOAN_MODINTRATE,sec.LOAN_PERIODICITY,loan.LOAN_REPAYMENTTYPE,decode(loan.LOAN_GOVT,'1','Yes','2','No') as govt_scheme,loan.GOVT_SCHEME,loan.LOAN_SUB,loan.LOAN_SPONSERAGENCY, loan.LOAN_SUBSIDYTYPE,CBS_ACCOUNTNO from APPLICATIONS,LOANDETAILS loan,PRODUCTS,PER_LOAN_SECURE sec where APP_NO=loan.LOAN_APPNO and APP_PRDCODE=PRD_CODE and APP_NO=sec.LOAN_APPNO and APP_NO='^'
select APP_SEC_SECID,main.SEC_NAME||' - '||sub.SEC_NAME as sec_classi,decode(APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,'1','Primary','Collateral') as sec_type,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_MARGIN from APP_SECURITYDETAILS,CUS_SECURITIES,SECURITY_MASTER main,SECURITY_MASTER sub where APP_SEC_SECID=CUS_SEC_ID and CUS_SEC_TYPE=main.SEC_ID and CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION=sub.SEC_ID and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^'
update app_post_sanction set PS_MODIFY_TERMS=?,PS_MODIFY_PAGEID=? where PS_APP_NO=? and PS_APP_SNO=?
select ps_pageid from app_post_sanc_pagemap where ps_param in (^) and ps_moduletype is null
select ps_modify_pageid,ps_modify_terms,ps_old_app_no from app_post_sanction where ps_app_no='^'
select ps_pageid from app_post_sanc_pagemap where ps_param in (^) and ps_moduletype='P'
insert into app_securitydetails(APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE, APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN, APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG, app_sec_borrower_id,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,app_sec_parentappno,app_sec_parent_facsno,app_proposal_type,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT) select ?,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE, APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN, APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG, app_sec_borrower_id,'E',app_sec_parentappno,app_sec_parent_facsno,'',APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT from app_securitydetails where APP_SEC_APPNO=? and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE =?
select b.facility_proposed,fc.com_facdesc,a.facility_for,b.facility_existing,b.bplr as facility_interest,b.facility_sno,b.facility_group, b.facility_months,b.facility_modeofrepay,b.facility_margin,b.facility_holidayperiod,b.facility_repaytype, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=facility_headid and facility_parent=0) as facheaddesc, b.facility_sel_type ,b.facility_intsubtype,b.facility_baserate,b.facility_sancinterest,b.facility_facnature, to_char(facility_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_duedate, (select Stat_Data_Desc1 from static_data where stat_data_id='180' and STAT_DATA_DESC=b.facility_displaydesc) as facility_desc,b.facility_inttype,b.facility_sancamt,fc.com_headfac from facility_master a,facilities b ,facility_corp fc where b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and fc.com_facid=b.facility_code and a.facility_parent='0' and b.facility_appno =^ and fc.com_module='^' and b.facility_sel_type='1' order by decode(b.facility_headid,'4',1,'5',2,'3', 3,'2',4,'6',5,'7',6,'1',7)
select distinct(com_oldlapsid) as appid from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno in (select ps_old_app_no from app_post_sanction where ps_app_no='^') and com_compdtappid is not null
select to_number(comapp_div_appid) as appid,comapp_div_name as appname from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_div_id_old=(select demo_comappid from com_demographics where demo_appno = '^' and demo_apptype='N') union select distinct(com_oldlapsid), com_compdtfname from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno='^'
select to_char(com_oldlapsid) from com_companydetails where com_oldlapsid='^' and com_compdtappno='^' union select comapp_div_appid from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_div_appid='^' and comapp_id=(select demo_comappnewid from com_demographics where demo_appno = '^' and demo_apptype='N')
delete from app_securitydetails where APP_SEC_APPNO=? and app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_customerid=? and APP_SEC_FACSNO=?
delete from app_securitydetails where APP_SEC_APPNO=? and app_sec_loantype=? and app_sec_applicant=?
delete from app_securitydetails where APP_SEC_APPNO=? and app_sec_loantype=? and app_sec_borrower_id=?
select distinct(to_char(com_compdtappid)) as com_compdtappid,COM_COMPBORRNAME, '' as DIN_Number,'' as COMAPP_PERSONAL_GUARANTEE,to_char(COM_OLDLAPSID) as COM_OLDLAPSID from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno='^' and (COM_COMPDTTYPE like ('%SP%') or COM_COMPDTTYPE like ('%PT%') or COM_COMPDTTYPE like ('%D%') or COM_COMPDTTYPE like ('T')) union select distinct(comapp_div_appid),COMAPP_RELATION,COMAPP_DINNUMBER,COMAPP_PERSONAL_GUARANTEE,(select to_char(perapp_oldid) from perapplicant where perapp_id=comapp_div_appid) as oldid from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_id=(select demo_comappnewid from com_demographics where demo_appno = '^' and demo_apptype='N') and (COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE like ('%SP%') or COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE like ('%PT%') or COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE like ('%D%') or COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='T' or COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='K' or COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='PA' or (COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='OT' and COMAPP_DIVISIONSUBTYPE!='005')) and COMAPP_DIV_APPID in (select PERAPP_ID from perapplicant) union select distinct(comapp_div_appid),COMAPP_RELATION,COMAPP_DINNUMBER,COMAPP_PERSONAL_GUARANTEE,'' as oldid from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_id=(select demo_comappnewid from com_demographics where demo_appno = '^' and demo_apptype='N') and (COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE like ('%SP%') or COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE like ('%PT%') or COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE like ('%D%') or COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='T' or COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='K' or COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='PA' or (COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE='OT' and COMAPP_DIVISIONSUBTYPE!='005')) and comapp_div_appid is null
insert into facilities_ps(FACILITY_APPNO,FACILITY_HEADID,FACILITY_ID,BORROWER_ID,FACILITY_DATE, FACILITY_EXISTING ,FACILITY_DIFFERENCE ,FACILITY_SNO ,FACILITY_SANCTIONED ,FACILITY_GROUP , FACILITY_CATEGORY ,FACILITY_MONTHS,FACILITY_INTEREST ,GRP_CHECK,MGN_CHECK,FINCHECK ,EXEAPPNO , FACILITY_BRANCHNAME ,FACILITY_SANCAMT,FACILITY_APPLICATION ,BPLR ,FACILITY_DP,FACILITY_OUTSTANDING, SECURITY_VALUE ,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,FACILITY_INTADJUSTMENT,FACILITY_TENOR ,FACILITY_INTREMARKS, FACILITY_OSASON,FACILITY_BANKTYPE ,FACILITY_EXISTBANKTYPE,FACILITY_PROPBANKTYPE,FACILITY_SANCINTEREST , FACILITY_SANCSTATUS ,FACILITY_SANCINTREMARKS ,FACILITY_INTTYPE,FACILITY_GOVTSPONSCHEM, FACILITY_SCHEMETYPE ,FACILITY_SPONSAGENCY,FACILITY_SUBSIDYTYPE,FACILITY_SUBSIDYAMUNT , FACILITY_REPAYTYPE,FACILITY_CODE,FACILITY_PURPOSE ,FACILITY_DESC,FACILITY_DETAILS,FACILITY_PROPOSED , FACILITY_AGRSCHEMETYPE ,FACILITY_MARGIN,FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD,FACILITY_INTERESTREC, insert into APP_SECURITYDETAILS(APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID, APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE, APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN, APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP, APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_FREEZE,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE,APP_SEC_MODULETYPE, APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG,APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO, APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT,APP_SEC_FACGROUP) select ?,APP_SEC_SECID,?,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID, APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE, APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN, APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP, APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_FREEZE,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE,APP_SEC_MODULETYPE, APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG,APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO, APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT,APP_SEC_FACGROUP from APP_SECURITYDETAILS_PS where APP_SEC_PROPOSEDAPPNO=? and APP_SEC_PROPOSEDSNO=? and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P'
select facility_appno from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_group='^' and cbs_accountno is null and facility_status='pa'
select DEMO_APPNO,to_char(COM_FINYEAR_START,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_FINYEAR_START,to_char(COM_FINYEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_FINYEAR, substr(COM_FINTYPE,0,1) as COM_FINTYPE,decode(FINRATEYEAR_CURRENTYEAR,'Y','1','0') as FINRATEYEAR_CURRENTYEAR,'AAA' as audit_name, decode('Y','Y','1','0') as is_compute from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,CORP_FIN_YEAR,FINANCIAL_RATINGYEAR where DEMO_FINSTANDARD=COM_APPNO and COM_APPNO=FINRATEYEAR_APPNO and COM_SNO=FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO and DEMO_APPNO='^' order by FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO
select FIN_RATAPPNO,to_char(COM_FINYEAR_START,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_FINYEAR_START,to_char(COM_FINYEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_FINYEAR, substr(COM_FINTYPE,0,1) as COM_FINTYPE,decode(FINRATEYEAR_CURRENTYEAR,'Y','1','0') as FINRATEYEAR_CURRENTYEAR,'AAA' as audit_name, decode('Y','Y','1','0') as is_compute from FIN_RATING,CORP_FIN_YEAR,FINANCIAL_RATINGYEAR where FIN_FINID=COM_APPNO and COM_APPNO=FINRATEYEAR_APPNO and COM_SNO=FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO and FIN_RATAPPNO='^' order by FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO
select FACILITY_APPNO from FACILITIES,APP_POST_SANCTION where FACILITY_APPNO=PS_OLD_APP_NO and FACILITY_GROUP=PS_OLD_APP_SNO and CBS_ACCOUNTNO is not null and FAC_POSTSANCTIONFLAG is null and PS_APP_NO='^'

select APP_SEC_SECID from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where app_proposal_type='P' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and APP_SEC_ATTACHED='D' and APP_SEC_FACSNO='^' and APP_SEC_SECID='^' and APP_SEC_APPNO='^'
delete from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where app_proposal_type='P' and APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and APP_SEC_ATTACHED='D' and APP_SEC_FACSNO=? and APP_SEC_SECID=? and APP_SEC_APPNO=?
select app_sec_appno,app_sec_secid from app_securitydetails where app_sec_attached ='A' and app_sec_loantype ='P' and app_sec_facsno='^' and app_sec_appno='^' order by APP_SEC_SECID
select app_sec_secid from app_securitydetails where app_sec_loantype='P' and app_sec_secid='^' and app_sec_facsno='^' and app_sec_appno='^'
insert into APP_SECURITYDETAILS(APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID, APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE, APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN, APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP, APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_FREEZE,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE,APP_SEC_MODULETYPE, APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG,APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO, APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_PROPOSAL_TYPE,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT) select ?,APP_SEC_SECID,?,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID, APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE, APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN, APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP, APP_SEC_EXISTING,'',APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE,APP_SEC_MODULETYPE, 'D',APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG,APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO, APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,'',APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_SHARECNT from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='P' and APP_SEC_SECID=? and APP_SEC_FACSNO=? and APP_SEC_APPNO=?
update facilities set facility_status=? where facility_appno=?
select distinct(APP_SEC_SECID)as secid,a.APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE,TO_CHAR(C.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,to_char(a.APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION) as secdescription,replace(CUS_SEC_CERSAI_ID,'@',',') as CERSAIID,CUS_SEC_TYPE from APP_SECURITYDETAILS a,CUS_SECURITIES c where c.CUS_SEC_ID=a.APP_SEC_SECID and a.app_sec_securitytype='1' ^ AND a.APP_SEC_ATTACHED='^' AND a.APP_SEC_APPNO='^'
select f.facility_code,fm.FACILITY_CATDESC,f.facility_sno,f.FACILITY_PROPOSED from facility_master fm,facilities f,APP_SECURITYDETAILS a where fm.facility_catid=f.facility_headid and a.app_sec_securitytype='1' ^ AND a.APP_SEC_ATTACHED='^' and APP_SEC_SECID='^' and facility_sno=a.APP_SEC_FACSNO and APP_SEC_APPNO=f.facility_appno and f.facility_appno='^' order by facility_sno
select f.facility_code,fm.FACILITY_CATDESC,f.facility_sno,f.FACILITY_PROPOSED from facility_master fm,facilities f,APP_SECURITYDETAILS a,applications app where fm.facility_catid=f.facility_headid and a.app_sec_securitytype='1' and app_sec_loantype='E' AND a.APP_SEC_ATTACHED='^' and APP_SEC_SECID='^' and facility_sno=a.app_sec_parent_facsno and f.facility_appno=APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO and app_sec_borrower_id='^' and APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and app_no=APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO and app_no=facility_appno and APP_LOANTYPE in ('A','C')
union
select p.prd_code as prdcode,pc.cat_name,1 as facilitysno,l.loan_recmdamt from loandetails l, applications a,products p,prd_category pc,app_securitydetails s where p.prd_catid=pc.cat_id and s.app_sec_securitytype='1' and app_sec_loantype='E' AND s.APP_SEC_ATTACHED='^' and APP_SEC_SECID='^' and prd_code=app_prdcode and l.loan_appno=a.app_no and a.app_no=s.APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO and app_sec_borrower_id='^' and APP_SEC_APPNO='^' and APP_LOANTYPE='P'
select f.facility_code,fm.FACILITY_CATDESC,f.facility_sno,f.FACILITY_PROPOSED from facility_master fm,facilities f,APP_SECURITYDETAILS a where fm.facility_catid=f.facility_headid and a.app_sec_securitytype='1' and a.APP_SEC_SECUTYPE='E' and a.APP_SEC_LOANTYPE='E' AND a.APP_SEC_ATTACHED='^' and APP_SEC_SECID='^' and facility_sno=a.app_sec_parent_facsno and f.facility_appno=APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO and app_sec_borrower_id='^' and app_sec_customerid='^' and APP_SEC_APPNO='^'
union
select p.prd_code as prdcode,pc.cat_name,1 as facilitysno,l.loan_recmdamt from loandetails l, applications a,products p,prd_category pc,app_securitydetails s where p.prd_catid=pc.cat_id and s.app_sec_securitytype='1' and s.APP_SEC_SECUTYPE='E' AND s.APP_SEC_ATTACHED='^' and APP_SEC_SECID='^' and prd_code=app_prdcode and l.loan_appno=a.app_no and a.app_no=s.APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO and app_sec_borrower_id='^' and APP_SEC_APPNO='^'

insert into com_groupconcerns(comgc_appno,comgc_id,comgc_type,comgc_facility,comgc_osasondate, comgc_inttype,comgc_credittype,comgc_bnktype,comgc_sancrefno,comgc_sancdate,comgc_duedate,comgc_arrears, comgc_companyname,comgc_bnk,comgc_bnkname,comgc_fundtype,comgc_limit,comgc_os,comgc_spread,comgc_remarks, comgc_facility_sno,comgc_modtype,comgc_monthly_ins,comgc_cbsappno,comgc_intrate,comgc_repaytype, comgc_drwpower,comgc_prestatus,comgc_parentappno,comgc_parentfacsno,comgc_fac_grp,comgc_factype, comgc_drawingpower,comgc_repaymenttype,comgc_interestrate,comgc_accountopen,comgc_prefix,comgc_suffix, comgc_exposure,comgc_baltype,comgc_ratingcheck,comgc_purpose) select ?,comgc_id,comgc_type,comgc_facility,comgc_osasondate,comgc_inttype,comgc_credittype, comgc_bnktype,comgc_sancrefno,comgc_sancdate,comgc_duedate,comgc_arrears,comgc_companyname, comgc_bnk,comgc_bnkname,comgc_fundtype,comgc_limit,comgc_os,comgc_spread,comgc_remarks,comgc_facility_sno, comgc_modtype,comgc_monthly_ins,comgc_cbsappno,comgc_intrate,comgc_repaytype,comgc_drwpower,comgc_prestatus, comgc_parentappno,comgc_parentfacsno,comgc_fac_grp,comgc_factype,comgc_drawingpower,comgc_repaymenttype, comgc_interestrate,comgc_accountopen,comgc_prefix,comgc_suffix,comgc_exposure,comgc_baltype, comgc_ratingcheck,comgc_purpose from com_groupconcerns_ps where comgc_proposedappno=?

insert into com_companydetails(com_compdtappno,com_compdtid,com_compdttype,com_compdtfname, com_compdtlname,com_compdtmname,com_compdtdob,com_compdtaddress1,com_compdtaddress2,com_compdtcity, com_compdtstate,com_compdtpin,com_compdtphone,com_compdtfax,com_compdtemail,com_comdtpershare, com_compdtshareheld,com_compdtnetworth,com_compdate,capcontribution,com_percent,com_compdsex, com_compdaca,com_compdexp,com_compdstkholder,com_background,com_facevalue,com_compdtdesignation, com_compdtdin,com_compdtappid,com_oldlapsid,com_comprelationship,com_compratinggrade1, com_compratingason1,com_compratingtype1,com_compratinggrade2,com_compratingason2, com_compratingtype2,com_compborrname,com_cbsrelationtype,com_compdttype_backup,com_facility_sno) select com_compdtappno,com_compdtid,com_compdttype,com_compdtfname, com_compdtlname,com_compdtmname,com_compdtdob,com_compdtaddress1,com_compdtaddress2,com_compdtcity, com_compdtstate,com_compdtpin,com_compdtphone,com_compdtfax,com_compdtemail,com_comdtpershare, com_compdtshareheld,com_compdtnetworth,com_compdate,capcontribution,com_percent,com_compdsex, com_compdaca,com_compdexp,com_compdstkholder,com_background,com_facevalue,com_compdtdesignation, com_compdtdin,com_compdtappid,com_oldlapsid,com_comprelationship,com_compratinggrade1, com_compratingason1,com_compratingtype1,com_compratinggrade2,com_compratingason2, com_compratingtype2,com_compborrname,com_cbsrelationtype,com_compdttype_backup,com_facility_sno from com_companydetails_ps where com_proposed_appno=? and com_proposedfacility_sno=?

update facilities set facility_sancstatus=? where facility_appno=? and facility_sno=?
select facility_appno from facilities where facility_group=^ and facility_appno='^'
select facility_appno,facility_sno,facility_sancamt,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc, (case when COM_LOANACC='Y' then (select floor(months_between(add_months(LAPS_RCRE_TIME,FACILITY_MONTHS),sysdate)) from LAPS_AIF where LAPS_APPNO=f.FACILITY_APPNO and LAPS_SNO=f.FACILITY_sno) else (select floor(months_between(add_months(LAPS_RCRE_TIME,FACILITY_MONTHS),sysdate)) from lapsnfb_aif where LAPS_APPLICATION_NUM=f.FACILITY_APPNO and FACILITY_SNO=f.FACILITY_sno) end) facmonths,to_char(facility_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_duedate from facilities f,applications,static_data,facility_master fm1,facility_master fm2,com_otherdet c where c.FACILITY_CODE=f.FACILITY_CODE and fm2.facility_catid=facility_id and facility_id='^' and fm1.facility_catid=facility_headid and facility_headid='^' and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and STAT_DATA_DESC=facility_displaydesc and ^ FACILITY_RENEW is null and borrower_id='^' and facility_status='pa' and facility_category='R' and f.cbs_accountno is not null and facility_appno=app_no and APP_STATUS IN ('pa') and (APP_DELFLAG='N' or APP_DELFLAG is null) and APP_LOANTYPE='^' union select facility_appno,facility_sno,facility_sancamt,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc,(case when facility_duedate is not null then floor(months_between(facility_duedate,sysdate))else facility_months end) as facmonths,to_char(facility_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_duedate from facilities,static_data,facility_master fm1,facility_master fm2 where fm2.facility_catid=facility_id and facility_id='^' and fm1.facility_catid=facility_headid and facility_headid='^' and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and STAT_DATA_DESC=facility_displaydesc and ^ FACILITY_RENEW is null and facility_category='R' and nvl(facility_status,'op') in ('pa','op') and facility_appno='^' ^
select f.facility_category,facility_appno,facility_sno,fm.facility_catdesc as com_facdesc,facility_sancamt, f.cbs_accountno,to_char(fac_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as fac_processdate, facility_group,decode(app_loantype,'A','Agriculture','C','Corporate','Retail') as type,app_loantype, (select count(*) from FACILITIES a,applications where a.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO=f.FACILITY_APPNO and a.FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO=f.FACILITY_SNO and FACILITY_STATUS='op' and app_no=a.facility_appno and nvl(app_delflag,'N')='N') as appcount from facilities f,applications a,facility_master fm where fm.facility_catid=f.facility_id and fm.facility_parent!=0 and f.facility_group='^' and a.app_delflag='N' and a.app_no=f.facility_appno and nvl(facility_renew_flag,'F')!='P' and f.borrower_id='^' and f.facility_status='pa' order by app_loantype,facility_appno,facility_sno asc
select f.facility_category,facility_appno,facility_sno,fm.facility_catdesc as com_facdesc,facility_sancamt, f.cbs_accountno,to_char(fac_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as fac_processdate,facility_group, (select count(*) from FACILITIES a,applications where a.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO=f.FACILITY_APPNO and a.FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO=f.FACILITY_SNO and FACILITY_STATUS='op' and app_no=a.facility_appno and nvl(app_delflag,'N')='N') as appcount from facilities f,facility_master fm where fm.facility_catid=f.facility_id and fm.facility_parent!=0 and f.facility_group='^' and facility_appno='^' and f.facility_status='pa' order by facility_sno
select app_no,'1' as sno,c.cat_name as prd_desc,loan_recmdamt,cbs_accountno, to_char(app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as processdate,'Retail' as type,app_loantype,(select count(*) from APPLICATIONS a where a.APP_PARENT_APPNO=b.APP_NO and APP_STATUS='op' and app_delflag='N' and APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('S','R','P')) as appcount from applications b,per_demographics,loandetails,products,prd_category c where c.cat_id=prd_catid and PRD_CODE=app_prdcode and app_delflag='N' and app_status='pa' and loan_appno=app_no and app_no=demo_appno and DEMO_OLDAPPID='^' order by app_no
update facilities set facility_status=?,facility_clsdate=sysdate,facility_clsusrid=?, facility_clsremarks=? where facility_sno=? and facility_appno=?
update applications set app_status=?,app_closeddate=sysdate,app_clsusrid=?, app_clsremarks=? where app_no=?
select facility_appno,com_facdesc,facility_sno,facility_sancamt from facilities,facility_corp where com_facid=facility_code and facility_adhocfac like ('^%') and facility_status='op'
select facility_appno,facility_sno,fm.facility_catdesc as com_facdesc from facilities f,facility_master fm where fm.facility_catid=f.facility_id and fm.facility_parent!=0 and f.facility_sno=^ and facility_appno='^'
select c.cat_name as prd_desc from applications,products,prd_category c where c.cat_id=prd_catid and PRD_CODE=app_prdcode and app_no='^'
select to_char(COM_FINYEAR_START,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_FINYEAR_START,to_char(COM_FINYEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_FINYEAR from FINANCIAL_RATINGYEAR, CORP_FIN_YEAR,COM_DEMOGRAPHICS where DEMO_FINSTANDARD=COM_APPNO and FINRATEYEAR_APPNO=DEMO_FINSTANDARD and FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO=COM_SNO and FINRATEYEAR_CURRENTYEAR='Y' and DEMO_APPNO='^'
select to_char(COM_FINYEAR_START,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_FINYEAR_START,to_char(COM_FINYEAR,'dd/mm/yyyy') as COM_FINYEAR from FINANCIAL_RATINGYEAR, CORP_FIN_YEAR,FIN_RATING where FIN_FINID=COM_APPNO and FINRATEYEAR_APPNO=FIN_FINID and FINRATEYEAR_SELSNO=COM_SNO and FINRATEYEAR_CURRENTYEAR='Y' and FIN_RATAPPNO='^'
select perbank_sno,perbank_type,perbank_facility,to_char(perbank_osasondate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as perbank_osasondate, perbank_inttype,perbank_bnktype,to_char(perbank_duedate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as perbank_duedate,perbank_arrears,perbank_bnkname,perbank_fundtype,perbank_limit,perbank_os,perbank_spread,perbank_remarks, perbank_monthly_ins,perbank_intrate,to_date(PERBANK_DUEDATE)-to_date(sysdate) as Days,per_drawingpower,per_repaymenttype,perbank_leaderbank from per_otherbank,per_demographics where PERBANK_DELETEFLAG is null and perbank_oldid=demo_oldappid and demo_type='c' and demo_appno='^' order by perbank_sno
select a2.app_no from applications a1,applications a2 where a1.APP_PARENT_APPNO=a2.APP_PARENT_APPNO and a2.app_status in ('op','ol') and nvl(a2.app_delflag,'N')='N' and a1.app_no='^' and a1.app_no<>a2.app_no union select a2.app_no from applications a1,facilities f,applications a2,facilities f2 where f.facility_appno=a1.app_no and a1.app_no='^' and f.facility_oldappno=f2.facility_oldappno and f2.facility_appno=a2.app_no and f.facility_oldappsno=f2.facility_oldappsno and a2.app_status in ('op','ol') and nvl(a2.app_delflag,'N')='N' and a1.app_no<>a2.app_no
select mclr_spreadtype,mclr_caption,mclr_option,mclr_spreadval,mclr_captionval from facility_mclrspreadvalue where mclr_spreadtype='^' and FACILITY_SNO=^ and facility_appno='^'
select m2.mclr_parent,m2.mclr_id,m2.mclr_desc from mclr_spreadmaster m2 where m2.mclr_id in (select m1.mclr_id from mclr_spreadmaster m1 where m2.mclr_id=m1.mclr_id and m1.mclr_parent='^') ^ order by mclr_id
select facility_mclrtype,mclr_tablecode,mclr_spread,mclr_crp_total,mclr_bsp_total,MCLR_MSME, to_char(FBILL_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as FBILL_DATE , FBILL_FRQ from facility_mclrspread where FACILITY_SNO=^ and FACILITY_APPNO='^'
insert into facility_mclrspread(FACILITY_APPNO,FACILITY_SNO,FACILITY_MCLRTYPE,MCLR_TABLECODE, MCLR_CRP_TOTAL,MCLR_BSP_TOTAL,MCLR_SPREAD,MCLR_MSME,FBILL_DATE,FBILL_FRQ)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
delete from facility_mclrspread where FACILITY_SNO=? and FACILITY_APPNO=?
insert into facility_mclrspreadvalue(FACILITY_APPNO,FACILITY_SNO,MCLR_SPREADTYPE,MCLR_CAPTION, MCLR_OPTION,MCLR_SPREADVAL,MCLR_CAPTIONVAL) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from facility_mclrspreadvalue where FACILITY_SNO=? and FACILITY_APPNO=?
update facilities set FACILITY_BASERATE=?,FACILITY_SANCINTEREST=?,FACILITY_INTEREST=?,BPLR=?,fac_mclr_migration_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),fac_roiscore=?,FACILITY_SECAMOUNT=? where facility_sno=? and facility_appno=?
select facility_mclrtype,mclr_tablecode,mclr_spread,facility_sno from facility_mclrspread where FACILITY_APPNO='^'
update facility_mclrspread set mclr_tablecode=? where FACILITY_SNO=? and FACILITY_APPNO=?
update facilities set facility_sancstatus=?,facility_sancintremarks=?,facility_status=?,fac_processdate=? where facility_sno=? and facility_appno =?
select f.facility_code,fc.com_facid,fc.com_facdesc,f.facility_sno,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc,facility_intsubtype from facility_corp fc,facilities f,static_data sd where STAT_DATA_DESC=f.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and f.facility_code=fc.com_facid and f.facility_inttype='Flo' and f.facility_intsubtype in ('MCLR','MCLEC','SMTB','TYGS','EBLEC','FTBR') and f.facility_appno='^' and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code order by facility_sno
select f.facility_sno,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc from facility_corp fc,facilities f,static_data sd where STAT_DATA_DESC=f.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and f.facility_code=fc.com_facid and f.facility_inttype='Flo' and f.facility_appno='05130000347' order by facility_sno
select facility_sancamt from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'
select app_orgcode,to_char(app_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as app_processdate,to_date(to_char(app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') - to_date('01/04/2016','dd/mm/yyyy') as datediff from applications where app_no='^'
select (to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy')-to_date('01/04/2016','dd/mm/yyyy')) as datediff from dual
select to_date(to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')-to_date('01/04/2016','dd/mm/yyyy') as dayval from APPLICATIONS,APP_POST_SANCTION where APP_NO=PS_OLD_APP_NO and PS_APP_NO='^' and PS_APP_SNO='^'
select to_date(to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')-to_date('01/04/2016','dd/mm/yyyy') as dayval from APPLICATIONS,APP_POST_SANCTION where APP_NO=PS_OLD_APP_NO and PS_APP_NO='^' and PS_APP_SNO='^'
select LOAN_PARAMVAL,LOAN_PARAMSLNO from OTHER_PARAMETERS where LOAN_PARAMSLNO='^' or LOAN_PARAMSLNO='^'
select APP_TOTALEXPOSURE from APP_SECURITYCOVERAGE where APPNO='^'
select mclrmsme_SNO,mclrmsme_amt_FROM,mclrmsme_amt_TO,mclrmsme_int_rate from SET_MCLRMSME_EXPOSURE order by mclrmsme_SNO
select max(mclrmsme_amt_TO) as maxval from SET_MCLRMSME_EXPOSURE
select nvl(max(mclrmsme_SNO),0)+1 as maxid from SET_MCLRMSME_EXPOSURE
insert into SET_MCLRMSME_EXPOSURE(mclrmsme_amt_FROM,mclrmsme_amt_TO,mclrmsme_int_rate,MCLRMSME_MOD_DATE,MCLRMSME_USERID,mclrmsme_SNO) values (?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)
update SET_MCLRMSME_EXPOSURE set mclrmsme_amt_FROM=?,mclrmsme_amt_TO=?,mclrmsme_int_rate=?,MCLRMSME_MOD_DATE=sysdate,MCLRMSME_USERID=? where mclrmsme_SNO=?
select facility_appno,facility_adhocfac from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_category='A'
update facilities set FACILITY_BASERATE=?,FACILITY_SANCINTEREST=?,FACILITY_INTEREST=?,BPLR=?,FACILITY_SANCSTATUS=? where facility_sno=? and facility_appno=?
INSERT INTO FACILITY_MCLRSPREAD(FACILITY_APPNO,FACILITY_SNO,FACILITY_MCLRTYPE,MCLR_TABLECODE,MCLR_CRP_TOTAL,MCLR_BSP_TOTAL,MCLR_SPREAD,FBILL_DATE,FBILL_FRQ) select ?,?,FACILITY_MCLRTYPE,MCLR_TABLECODE,MCLR_CRP_TOTAL,MCLR_BSP_TOTAL,MCLR_SPREAD,FBILL_DATE,FBILL_FRQ from FACILITY_MCLRSPREAD_PS where MCLR_PROPOSEDSNO=? and MCLR_PROPOSEDAPPNO=?
INSERT INTO FACILITY_MCLRSPREADVALUE(FACILITY_APPNO,FACILITY_SNO,MCLR_SPREADTYPE,MCLR_CAPTION,MCLR_OPTION,MCLR_SPREADVAL,MCLR_CAPTIONVAL) select ?,?,MCLR_SPREADTYPE,MCLR_CAPTION,MCLR_OPTION,MCLR_SPREADVAL,MCLR_CAPTIONVAL from FACILITY_MCLRSPREADVALUE_PS where MCLR_PROPOSEDSNO=? and MCLR_PROPOSEDAPPNO=?
insert into APP_SECURITYDETAILS (APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE, APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_LOANAMT, APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN,APP_SEC_FACID, APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP, APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE, APP_SEC_MODULETYPE,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG, APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_SEC_SHARECNT,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_FACGROUP) select ?,APP_SEC_SECID,?,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE, APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE, ?,?,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT, APP_SEC_MARGIN,?,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY, APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP, APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE, APP_SEC_MODULETYPE,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG, APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID, APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_SEC_SHARECNT,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_FACGROUP from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_FACSNO=? and APP_SEC_APPNO=? and app_sec_loantype='P'
insert into APP_SECURITYDETAILS (APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE, APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_LOANAMT, APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN,APP_SEC_FACID, APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP, APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE, APP_SEC_MODULETYPE,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG, APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_SEC_SHARECNT,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_FACGROUP) select ?,APP_SEC_SECID,?,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE, APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE, APP_SEC_LOANAMT,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT, APP_SEC_MARGIN,APP_SEC_FACID,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY, APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP, APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE, APP_SEC_MODULETYPE,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG, APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID, APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_SEC_SHARECNT,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_FACGROUP from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_FACSNO=? and APP_SEC_APPNO=? and app_sec_loantype='P'
insert into APP_SECURITYDETAILS (APP_SEC_APPNO,APP_SEC_SECID,APP_SEC_FACSNO,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE, APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE,APP_SEC_LOANAMT, APP_SEC_OUTSTANDAMT,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT,APP_SEC_MARGIN,APP_SEC_FACID, APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY,APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP, APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE, APP_SEC_MODULETYPE,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG, APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID,APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_SEC_SHARECNT,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_FACGROUP) select ?,APP_SEC_SECID,?,APP_SEC_CUSTOMERID,APP_SEC_SECURITYVALUE, APP_SEC_RESIDUALVALUE,APP_SEC_FACTYPE,APP_SEC_FACNATURE,APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE, ?,?,APP_SEC_UNSECPORTION,APP_SEC_APPLICANT, APP_SEC_MARGIN,?,APP_SEC_LOANTYPE,APP_SEC_PRIORITY, APP_SEC_ISCOLLATERAL,APP_SEC_OUTSTANDINGTEMP, APP_SEC_EXISTING,APP_SEC_COLLATERALAMT,APP_SEC_REPAYTYPE, APP_SEC_MODULETYPE,APP_SEC_ATTACHED,APP_SEC_SHOW,APP_SEC_RELEASEFLAG, APP_SEC_PARENTAPPNO,APP_SEC_PARENT_FACSNO,APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID, APP_SEC_SECUTYPE,APP_SEC_SHARECNT,APP_SEC_DESCRIPTION,APP_SEC_FACGROUP from APP_SECURITYDETAILS where APP_SEC_FACSNO=? and APP_SEC_APPNO=? and app_sec_loantype='P' and APP_SEC_SECURITYTYPE='2'
select max(FIN_FINANCEID) as maxid from COM_FINANCE where FIN_COMAPPID='^' and FIN_CMANO='^' and FIN_RENEW='N'
update per_cuscbsaccountdata set modeofadv=? where APPNO=? and FACILITY_SNO=?
select mclr_spreadtype,mclr_caption,mclr_option,mclr_spreadval,mclr_captionval from facility_mclrspreadvalue_ps where mclr_spreadtype='^' and MCLR_PROPOSEDSNO=^ and MCLR_PROPOSEDAPPNO='^' and facility_appno='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'
select facility_mclrtype,mclr_tablecode,mclr_spread,mclr_crp_total,mclr_bsp_total,MCLR_MSME,to_char(FBILL_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as FBILL_DATE , FBILL_FRQ from facility_mclrspread_ps where MCLR_PROPOSEDSNO=^ and MCLR_PROPOSEDAPPNO='^' and FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'
select sum(facility_proposed) as facility_proposed from FACILITIES where facility_appno='^'
select case when FACILITY_GOVTSPONSCHEM=INWARD_GOVTSPONS then 'Y' else 'N' end as govt, case when nvl(FACILITY_SUBSIDYAMUNT,0)=nvl(INWARD_SUBSAMOUNT,0) then 'Y' else 'N' end as subsidyflag, case when FACILITY_SPONSAGENCY=INWARD_SPONAGENCY then 'Y' else 'N' end as sponsagency, case when FACILITY_SCHEMETYPE=INWARD_SCHMETYPE then 'Y' else 'N' end as schemetype, case when FACILITY_SUBSIDYTYPE=INWARD_SUBSDTYPE then 'Y' else 'N' end as subsidytype, case when nvl(FACILITY_AGENCY,0)=nvl(INWARD_OTHERAGENCY,0) then 'Y' else 'N' end as agency from applications,facilities,appinwardreg where facility_appno=app_no and APP_INWARDNO=inward_no and app_no='^'
insert into sharevaluemaster(svm_companycode,svm_companycinno,svm_companyname,svm_facevalue,svm_companynetworth, svm_companynetworthason,svm_companyavgmarketval,svm_companymarketval,svm_companymarketvalason,svm_companypaidup,svm_companypaidupason, svm_sharetype,svm_companyapproveflag,svm_companyreservescapital,svm_companyactiveflag,svm_createdUser,svm_ModifiedUser,svm_ModifiedDate) values(?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)
update sharevaluemaster set svm_companycinno=?,svm_companyname=?,svm_facevalue=?,svm_companynetworth=?, svm_companynetworthason=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),svm_companyavgmarketval=?,svm_companymarketval=?,svm_companymarketvalason=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), svm_companypaidup=?,svm_companypaidupason=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),svm_sharetype=?,svm_companyapproveflag=?,svm_companyreservescapital=?, svm_companyactiveflag=?,svm_ModifiedUser=?,svm_ModifiedDate=sysdate where svm_companycode=?
delete from sharevaluemaster where svm_companycode=?
select lpad(nvl(max(svm_companycode),0)+1,9,0) as companycode from sharevaluemaster
select svm_companycode,svm_companycinno,svm_companyname,svm_facevalue,svm_companynetworth, to_char(svm_companynetworthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as svm_companynetworthason,svm_companyavgmarketval, to_char(SVM_COMPANYMARKETVALASON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SVM_COMPANYMARKETVALASON,svm_companypaidup, to_char(svm_companypaidupason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as svm_companypaidupason,svm_companymarketval,svm_sharetype,svm_companyapproveflag, svm_companyreservescapital,svm_companyactiveflag from sharevaluemaster ^
select svm_companycode,svm_companycinno,svm_companyname,svm_facevalue,svm_companynetworth, to_char(svm_companynetworthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as svm_companynetworthason,svm_companyavgmarketval, to_char(SVM_COMPANYMARKETVALASON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SVM_COMPANYMARKETVALASON,svm_companypaidup, to_char(svm_companypaidupason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as svm_companypaidupason,svm_companymarketval,svm_sharetype,svm_companyapproveflag, svm_companyreservescapital,svm_companyactiveflag from sharevaluemaster where svm_companycode='^'
delete from COM_CASHFLOW where COM_CF_APPNO=?
delete FROM financial_printyear WHERE finprintyear_appno=? and finprintyear_pageid=?
delete from com_finappDSCR where fin_appno=?
delete from com_finappdscrsens where fin_appno =?
delete from com_copmof where com_appno=?
delete from com_comments where com_page=? and com_appno=?
delete from COM_COPMOF_MARGIN where COM_APPNO=?
delete from COM_CASHBUDGETMETHOD where ccbm_appno=?
update COM_FINANCE set FIN_TALLY=? where FIN_FINANCEID=?
select FIN_TALLY from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS,COM_FINANCE where DEMO_FINSTANDARD=FIN_FINANCEID and DEMO_APPNO='^'
update mis_appdetails set mis_appdata_flag='N' where app_no=?
update mis_appdetails set mis_appdata_flag='N' where app_no=? and app_facility_sno=?
select app_no,app_facility_sno from mis_appdetails where app_no='^' and mis_appdata_flag='N'
update fin_rating set fin_status='cR' where fin_finid=? and fin_status='PR'
select to_char(app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as processdate from applications where app_no=(select PS_OLD_APP_NO from app_post_sanction where PS_APP_NO='^' and PS_APP_SNO='^')
update facilities set facility_govtsponschem=?,facility_schemetype=?,facility_sponsagency=?,facility_subsidytype=?, facility_subsidyamunt=? where facility_appno=?
select laps_appno,to_char(laps_sno) as sno,to_char(laps_handoff_time,'dd/mm/yyyy') as laps_handoff_time from laps_aif where laps_appno='^' and laps_sno='^' union select LAPS_APPLICATION_NUM,FACILITY_SNO,to_char(laps_rcre_time,'dd/mm/yyyy') as laps_rcre_time from lapsnfb_aif where LAPS_APPLICATION_NUM='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'
select laps_appno,to_char(laps_handoff_time,'dd/mm/yyyy') as laps_handoff_time from laps_aif where laps_appno='^'
select demo_appno from com_demographics where demo_appno='^' and DEMO_COMAPPID='^'
select (select perapp_oldid from perapplicant where perapp_id=comapp_div_appid) as comapp_div_appid, comapp_id, comapp_div_name, comapp_div_address, comapp_div_city, comapp_div_state, comapp_div_pin, comapp_div_phone, comapp_div_fax, comapp_divisiontype, comapp_div_bsrcode,comapp_div_dist,comapp_div_appid as comappnewID, com_compratinggrade1,to_char(com_compratingason1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_compratingason1,com_compratingtype1,com_compratinggrade2, to_char(com_compratingason2,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_compratingason2,com_compratingtype2,COMAPP_BANKERS,comapp_cbsid,comapp_groupid,comapp_relation from comapp_company_divisions where comapp_id='^' order by comapp_divisiontype,comapp_cbsid,comapp_groupid
select combk_parentappno,combk_parentfacsno,'A' as type,combk_limit,combk_os from com_banking where combk_appno='^' and combk_credittype='E' union select comgc_parentappno,comgc_parentfacsno,'C' as type,comgc_limit,comgc_os from com_groupconcerns where comgc_appno='^' order by combk_parentappno,combk_parentfacsno,type
select sum(COMBK_MONTHLY_INS) as exi_monthly_commitment from (select COMBK_CBSAPPNO,COMBK_LIMIT,max(COMBK_MONTHLY_INS) as COMBK_MONTHLY_INS from (select COMBK_CBSAPPNO,COMBK_LIMIT,COMBK_MONTHLY_INS from COM_BANKING where COMBK_APPNO='^' and combk_bnk='Our' and COMBK_CREDITTYPE='E' union all select COMGC_CBSAPPNO,COMGC_LIMIT,COMGC_MONTHLY_INS from COM_GROUPCONCERNS where COMGC_APPNO='^' and COMGC_COMPANYNAME in (^) and comGC_bnk='Our' and COMGC_CREDITTYPE='E') group by COMBK_CBSAPPNO,COMBK_LIMIT)
select comapp_div_id, comapp_id, comapp_div_name, comapp_div_address, comapp_div_pin, comapp_div_phone, comapp_div_fax, comapp_divisiontype, comapp_div_bsrcode,comapp_div_dist,comapp_div_appid, com_compratinggrade1,to_char(com_compratingason1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_compratingason1,com_compratingtype1,com_compratinggrade2, to_char(com_compratingason2,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_compratingason2,com_compratingtype2,COMAPP_BANKERS,comapp_cbsid,comapp_groupid, comapp_relation,lc.CITY_NAME as comapp_div_city ,ls.STATE_NAME as comapp_div_state,to_char(PERAPP_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_DOB,PERAPP_SEX,PERAPP_CBSID, PERAPP_FATNAME,perapp_marstat,indinfo_spouse_name ,sd.STAT_DATA_DESC1 as COMAPP_DIVISIONSUBTYPE from comapp_company_divisions c,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,PERAPPLICANT p,INDIVIDUAL_INFO i,STATIC_DATA sd where comapp_id='^' and COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE ='^' and p.PERAPP_ID=c.COMAPP_DIV_APPID and i.INDINFO_APPID=p.perapp_id and lc.city_code(+)=trim(comapp_div_city) and ls.STATE_CODE(+)=trim(comapp_div_state) and lc.STATE_ID=ls.STATE_ID and COMAPP_DOCEXECUTANT='Y' and sd.STAT_DATA_ID='^' and sd.STAT_DATA_DESC(+)=c.COMAPP_DIVISIONSUBTYPE and lc.active_flag='E' order by comapp_divisiontype,comapp_cbsid,comapp_groupid
select com_oldlapsid as perapp_id, com_compdtappno, com_compdtfname, com_compdtlname,COM_COMPDTTYPE,COM_FAC_DOCPRINT,COM_FAC_DOC_ACCOPERATED from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno='^' and com_facility_sno='^' union select DEMO_COMAPPID,c.DEMO_APPNO,p.PERAPP_FNAME,p.PERAPP_LNAME,'a' as COM_COMPDTTYPE ,c.DEMO_DOCPRINT,DEMO_DOC_ACCOPERATED from COM_DEMOGRAPHICS c,PERAPPLICANT p where DEMO_APPNO='^' and c.DEMO_COMAPPID=p.PERAPP_ID order by COM_COMPDTTYPE desc
select to_char(FACILITY_MCLR_RELDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FACILITY_MCLR_RELDATE,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,FACILITY_SANCAMT,FACILITY_DOC_BRANCHCODE,facility_group,FACILITY_CATEGORY,FACILITY_SANCINTEREST from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'
select FACILITY_APPNO,BORROWER_ID,FACILITY_SANCTIONED,FACILITY_CATEGORY,FACILITY_MONTHS,FACILITY_INTEREST,FACILITY_BRANCHNAME,FACILITY_SANCAMT,FACILITY_TENOR,FACILITY_INTTYPE,FAC_PROCESSDATE,FACILITY_PURPOSE,PERAPP_TITLE,PERAPP_FNAME, FACILITY_PROPOSED,CBS_ACCOUNTNO,perapp_cbsid,FACILITY_BASERATE,(FACILITY_SANCINTEREST-FACILITY_BASERATE) as spread,PERAPP_AADHAAR,to_char(FACILITY_MCLR_RELDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FACILITY_MCLR_RELDATE,FACILITY_REPAYTYPE ,FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD,FACILITY_PERINSTALL,FACILITY_SNO,FACILITY_CODE,to_char(FACILITY_DUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FACILITY_DUEDATE,FACILITY_INTERESTCHARGED,FACILITY_SANCINTEREST,FACILITY_SANCTIONEDROI from FACILITIES,PERAPPLICANT where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^' and BORROWER_ID=PERAPP_ID
insert into sharevaluemaster_history(svm_companycode,svm_companycinno,svm_companyname,svm_facevalue,svm_companynetworth, svm_companynetworthason,svm_companyavgmarketval,svm_companymarketval,svm_companymarketvalason,svm_companypaidup,svm_companypaidupason, svm_sharetype,svm_companyapproveflag,svm_companyreservescapital,svm_companyactiveflag,svm_createdUser,svm_ModifiedUser,svm_ModifiedDate) select svm_companycode,svm_companycinno,svm_companyname,svm_facevalue,svm_companynetworth, svm_companynetworthason,svm_companyavgmarketval,svm_companymarketval,svm_companymarketvalason,svm_companypaidup,svm_companypaidupason, svm_sharetype,svm_companyapproveflag,svm_companyreservescapital,svm_companyactiveflag,svm_createdUser,svm_ModifiedUser,svm_ModifiedDate from sharevaluemaster where svm_companycode=?
select svm_companycode,svm_companycinno,svm_companyname,svm_facevalue,svm_companynetworth, to_char(svm_companynetworthason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as svm_companynetworthason,svm_companyavgmarketval, to_char(SVM_COMPANYMARKETVALASON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SVM_COMPANYMARKETVALASON,svm_companypaidup, to_char(svm_companypaidupason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as svm_companypaidupason,svm_companymarketval,svm_sharetype,svm_companyapproveflag, svm_companyreservescapital,svm_companyactiveflag,svm_modifieduser,to_char(svm_modifieddate,'dd/mm/yyyy hh:MM:ss') as svm_modifieddate from sharevaluemaster_history where svm_companycode='^' order by svm_modifieddate desc
select distinct(com_oldlapsid), com_compdtappno, com_compdtfname from com_companydetails where com_compdtappno='^'
SELECT CST.CUS_SEC_ID as CUS_SEC_ID,CST.CUS_SEC_TYPE as CUS_SEC_TYPE, CST.CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION as CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION,CST.CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY as CUS_SEC_NETSECURITY,CST.CUS_SEC_REIDUALVAL as CUS_SEC_REIDUALVAL ,(SELECT SEC_NAME from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CST.CUS_SEC_TYPE) AS SEC_NAME, (SELECT SEC_NAME from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CST.CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION) AS SEC_CLASSIFICATION, CST.CUS_SEC_JOINT_HOLDER as CUS_SEC_JOINT_HOLDER,(SELECT SEC_COLLATFLAG from SECURITY_MASTER WHERE SEC_ID=CST.CUS_SEC_TYPE) AS SEC_COLLATFLAG,CUS_COMPANYSHARE_CNT FROM CUS_SECURITIES CST WHERE CST.CUS_SEC_ID IN (SELECT CUS_OWNER_SECURITY_ID FROM CUS_SECURITY_OWNERSHIP WHERE CUS_OWNER_LAPS_ID='^') and cst.cus_sec_statusflag='Y' and cst.cus_releaseflag='N' and CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION='40' and CUS_SEC_SHARETYPE='^' order by CST.CUS_SEC_TYPE
select loan_recmdamt from loandetails where loan_appno='^'
select comapp_div_id, comapp_id, comapp_div_name, comapp_div_address, comapp_div_pin, comapp_div_phone, comapp_div_fax, comapp_divisiontype, comapp_div_bsrcode,comapp_div_dist,comapp_div_appid, com_compratinggrade1,to_char(com_compratingason1,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_compratingason1,com_compratingtype1,com_compratinggrade2, to_char(com_compratingason2,'dd/mm/yyyy') as com_compratingason2,com_compratingtype2,COMAPP_BANKERS,comapp_cbsid,comapp_groupid, comapp_relation,lc.CITY_NAME as comapp_div_city ,ls.STATE_NAME as comapp_div_state,to_char(PERAPP_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_DOB,PERAPP_SEX,PERAPP_CBSID,PERAPP_FATNAME,perapp_marstat,indinfo_spouse_name ,sd.STAT_DATA_DESC1 as COMAPP_DIVISIONSUBTYPE from comapp_company_divisions c,LAPS_CITIES lc,LAPS_STATES ls,PERAPPLICANT p,INDIVIDUAL_INFO i,STATIC_DATA sd where comapp_id=(select PERAPP_ID from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_OLDID='^' and (perapp_renew is null or perapp_renew='n')) and COMAPP_DIVISIONTYPE ='^' and p.PERAPP_ID=c.COMAPP_DIV_APPID and i.INDINFO_APPID=p.perapp_id and lc.city_code(+)=trim(comapp_div_city) and ls.STATE_CODE(+)=trim(comapp_div_state) and lc.STATE_ID=ls.STATE_ID and COMAPP_DOCEXECUTANT='Y' and sd.STAT_DATA_ID='^' and sd.STAT_DATA_DESC(+)=c.COMAPP_DIVISIONSUBTYPE order by comapp_divisiontype,comapp_cbsid,comapp_groupid

select FACILITY_APPNO,FACILITY_SNO,FACILITY_WHT_CGTMSEAPPLY,FACILITY_CG_SPLIT_INT_RATE,FAC_ROITYPE,FAC_ROISCORE from facilities where FACILITY_APPNO='^'
update facilities set FACILITY_CG_TOT_INT_RATE=? where FACILITY_APPNO=? AND FACILITY_SNO=?
select FACILITY_WHT_CGTMSEAPPLY,FACILITY_CG_SPLIT_INT_RATE,BPLR,FACILITY_SNO from facilities where FACILITY_APPNO='^' AND FACILITY_SNO='^'
update facilities set FACILITY_CG_TOT_INT_RATE=? where FACILITY_APPNO=? AND FACILITY_SNO=?
